Header: check the female ground socket for fit
Review: i ordered this device to replace an insteon light bulb which came out of the box defective problem with those bulb is that you have no way of testing or troubleshooting connectivity they don t have a status indicator led to tell you if they are linking the on off module ha a green indicator light i plugged this in used the find new device feature on my isy dashboard and wallah instant connectivity it cost a little more than the bulb but totally worth the price given that it s more flexible and can be used with motor up to 100hp and or total load of 1800 watts you can use it with a small heater two criticism the plastic casing could be a little heavier duty for what you pay and also my device seems to have a defective ground socket i tried to plug in a grounded three pronged plug and i could not get it to go in i didn t want to force it because pressing hard on the module actually deformed the casing next one of these i buy if the ground plug socket is a problem i ll send it back bottom line if you buy one of these first thing to do is make sure you can plug in a three pronged plug

Header: adequate be prepared to return one
Review: the device when it work work a described programming is improved over the previous generation after the initial pairing with a controller like the insteon hub it scene membership can be adjusted without having to press the set button which cut legwork performance is fine it mostly work with dimmable leds with the normal led gap between off and about 10 doesn t seem to make any singing noise when dimming receives command more often than not dual band is a real improvement over wireline only the onboard button are a courteous design gesture the unit is smaller than the previous generation but it lack the pas through plug which mean you ll be shopping for outlet strip with orthogonal plug the packing material is minimal and convenient except the the unit itself is wrapped in clear tape to protect it finish removing the tape is the clumsiest and slowest part of unpacking and installing the device in short a user who is already invested somewhat in insteon will find this unit to be more of the same someone who doesn t already have other insteon device should be sure to consider alternative while insteon work well enough and is easy enough to use and to maintain the device are prone to failure it s a strong effort from the designer and engineer but the factory seems to let unit out the door that barely pas testing compounding the frustration of losing a failed device is the requirement that you factory reset all the controller that were paired to it there is no other way to unlink a device if it isn t working the control network is also somewhat fiddly the design is reasonable and it s impressive that it work at all but in practice in a typical house signal are often lost so these thing are fine for a few room they make for a nice to have just be prepared to send one or two back eventually
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: all this insteon stuff is silly expensive but it doe work pretty well i hope it all last because if it dy out of warranty i ll be one unhappy camper
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have a switch in the master bedroom that only control a useless outlet but i wanted to control the nightstand light so i bought one of these and a togglelinc dimmer i wired the useless outlet live all the time and replaced the switch with the togglelinc i plugged the lamp into this lamplinc and it work great added benefit the togglelinc ha an led that lead me to the switch in the dark the lamplinc ha up down button so i don t have to get out of bed to turn the light off or on or dim i can t reach the outlet from the bed so i plugged this and the lamp in an extension cord and placed it near the bed there is a red green led in the lamplinc to stear me to the switch in the dark the lamp can be dimmed for romantic atmosphere and when you turn it on or off it ramp up down so it doesn t shock the system with a rapid light change it s quiet no loud click like my old x10 control a little pricey but i ve been using insteon for year without any issue well the wall switch dimmer died last year it wa 3 year old and the lamp module just died it wa also 3 year old i opened each and found burnt component figures they have a 2 year warranty so between the 2 unit it costing me about 30 a year to control my bedroom light
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great for outdoor device control just not for the long term
Review: these are great for controlling outdoor plug in item two nit 1 these have a tendency to fail after three or four year and you will be replacing them so be prepared to do so in the future i have about 4 of these outside that i bought when i built this house four year ago two have failed after about three year and have been replaced since they re outside and subject to weather i guess that s not bad but i do think they should last longer 2 the most recent one had it address sticker the one that ha the insteon xx xx xx address on it on the top of the device so it s very likely to get bleached by the sun or washed away by the rain it would likely be better on the bottom where you plug in your device that is to be controlled since that part face the ground and is protected from weather and the sun
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good product design lousy post purchase support
Review: the design of the insteon system with this on off outdoor plug in module is very good and when it work it work really well i employ two of these module one to control a garden fountain and the other to control the fountain light after connecting them to an inston hub via wifi turning either one on or off is simply a matter of opening the insteon app on my iphone and pressing an on off button so what s the problem here well both on off module have failed le than two year after purchase there is a two year warranty but the manufacturer ha denied warranty coverage on the ground that the device failed due to power fluctuation these insteon people are really something they evidently have the gift of sight to be able to come to that conclusion without even examining the device insteon outdoor smart plug on off works with amazon alexa i am disappointed with their post purchase behavior a i had expected that they would stand behind their product rather than invent reason not to without any examination of the failed product
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: led bulb glow when device turned off
Review: these device provide a very small amount of power when turned off reading through various web search i thought it had something to do with the built in load sensing however there is a way to turn load sensing off which i did however the device still provide a very small amount of power in an off state as a result my led bulb glow in the past when i wa using incandescent light bulb this wa never a problem but led bulb have been around long enough to where there really is no excuse for these device to peform so poorly until insteon decides to listen to it customer and make a dimmable lamplinc product that turn the load completely off i m done spending any more money on this technology

Header: terrible support poor product life complex installation
Review: terrible customer service he wa trying to explain how a regular switch on a different circuit that ha nothing to do with my 2 lamp module or my insteon hub can become linked to the insteon system these randomly turn on at any time i have only 2 lamp module nothing else on the hub i wa trying to understand what he wa talking about then he hung up and the place is now closed so i will be returning my 2 insteon module and my hub that i received today and i will cancel the order for my echo after deleting all my scene and my device and deleting my account and doing factory reset on the 2 lamp modules and my hub many time nothing ha changed i have followed the procedure exactly for doing factory reset i followed all the step on both lamp module i have simply plugged them in to the lamp and manually turned them off with the dimmer after a few minute the light turn on no account ha been created the hub is not plugged in and the other lamp module is not plugged in still the light turn on by itself this happens with both lamp module maybe both are defective this is a simple lamp with a cree dimmable bulb it ha been used for year with a corded dimmer from leviton with no problem at all it is my fault now for continuing to spend time and energy it look like i have solved the problem this answer to my problem is not documented anywhere i searched and searched the answer is that load sensing is the default and it doe not work it wa the cause of the random turn on problem again the problem occurred with both module call support if you want to learn how it is supposed to work if you are having problem tech support is a waste of time but most of all if your lamp module are turning on randomly disable load sensing the instruction for doing this are in the provided instruction these dimmer with load sensing disabled actually work better than the leviton one they are replacing i can set the led bulb to 10 percent with no flicker edit many many month later still this product ha functioned perfectly the hub and my echo dot are not a reliable but seem to get better a the update come i am so happy to have my insteon system and my 3 echo dots 2nd edit complete failure i m switching to the z wave standard
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: convenient but quality control could be better along with no question asked return policy for manufacturing defect
Review: i don t know if this is a problem for all insteon 2457d2 lamplinc insteon plug in lamp dimmer module dual band 2 pin device but my personal use wa for a remote switch for an led light string installed well out of routine reach to the electrical outlet powering the device and attached lighting i happened to notice on a particularly dark night that even though the light were switched off the 2457d2 wa obviously delivering low voltage current to the led light my advice since according to seller it wa too late to return the device is to plug the device into an outlet immediately upon receipt and use a tester to detect any electricity leaking through the device when turn in the off position if you get any voltage at any amperage above that of ambient or free space reading return the device on a final note programming instruction for this device are not entirely clear and they are presented in such small print that you may find reading the instruction and implementing them to be a challenge you ll eventually figure it out but you shouldn t have to do so
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the small power leakage build up over time and every few second the led will flicker powering quickly on and off like a flash
Review: these device will not work with led bulb led string light or any low wattage consumption leds in general what end up happening is that even when commanded to switch off there is still some power leakage through this device to anything plugged in in this case when a low wattage consumption led is plugged in the small power leakage build up over time and every few second the led will flicker powering quickly on and off like a flash and continue going through this cycle indefinitely there is a serious hardware engineering design flaw with these device in general throughout the entire insteon product line that involve on off and dimmer module regardless whether they are micro module full size outdoor etc i would stay away from insteon in general if you plan to use them with low wattage led bulds under 50w load
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buyer beware read and trust the reviews stay away
Review: do not buy this insteon system the system doe not perform the installation instruction are not clear on what need to be done for it to work properly upon calling tech support and finally getting someone on the phone i wa able to get clear instruction on how to install everything i wanted the hub in my tech closet out of sight with the rest of my hub and server etc unfortunately there wa too much noise on the electrical circuit for the system to work and for the app to see and connect to the component it sends receives signal through the house s electrical circuit and with too much noise on that circuit in the closet the hub wa not able to communicate effectively with the other component the hub must have an ethernet connection to the router therefore wifi is only used for the app to connect with the hub once i found a circuit with an ethernet connection near by which is in my living room where everyone can see much to the chagrin of my wife i wa actually able to get everything to work fine for about a month now all of a sudden it stopped working for no reason nothing has changed i am done with this junk i do not feel like spending another hour or so on the phone with tech support only to tell me i have to move it again

Review: during a remodel the electrician could not run a single dimmer switch to control cabinet lighting for cabinet on either side of the fireplace there wa wiring for outlet on each side of the fireplace so there wa power their solution wa to use a dimmer switch for each set of cabinet this would mean that i would have to walk from one side of the room to control one cabinet walk to the other side of the room to control the other cabinet and walk to another location in the room to control the overhead lighting i purchased the iinsteon 2477d switchlinc insteon remote control dual band dimmer along with two insteon 2457d2 lamplinc insteon plug in lamp dimmer modules and put the switch in the existing switch box connected the lamplinc module to the cabinet light and programmed everything to work a if the light were being controlled from a wired dimmer switch installation wa easy and setting up the lighting that wa being controlled wa easy a well
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the unit is a minor improvement from the appliance module it can handle small load although the construction is much more flimsy than the appliance module my biggest complaint is that the ground pin go the opposite direction of the wall wart i need to control it s a 50 50 shot and all but they picked wrong for the one device i wa wanting to use it on non polarized plug are much easier to deal with in a perfect world the unit would have a swivel on both the wall plug and the unit s controlled socket but it isn t worth any extra money to be sure for people trying to decide on which type of control system to go for there are a lot of limitation with insteon each system ha it own pro and con and a of january 2014 thing sure don t seem to be well resolved the cost really go up a you add a controller modem and the control device
Product: Insteon Outdoor Smart Plug, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: ordered the wemo smart plug on 16 apr 16 prime shipping 32 99 2 23 tax installed it in minute when it arrived it s been in use for over 5 month at the time of this review 19sep16 overview i use this and several other wemo device with my echo aka alexa which mean i only use this device locally i don t have any application where i count on this device to respond to me when i m abroad this wemo outlet work flawlessly when house power is stable see below i have other wemo device that i have programmed on off time of day my personal application of this switch doe not require any daily routine to be programmed my only interaction with this device is voice command e g alexa turn tv off the outlet control the power to the tv there are time when the tv ha been left on and the remote is not within eyesight walking through the room i can simply command alexa to turn off the tv and walah for a one time expense of 40 buck i have solved the family conflict of where s the remote and the button on the new tvs are too stealthy for me the pro s part of the wemo family wemo s simple but stable cloud programming allows me to set up time of day to turn my device on or off times of day can be absolute e g 11 00 pm turn off or can be relative e g turn off 30 min after sunset really if you aren t familiar with wemo power in your home read up or just buy a single device to test it out simple home automation done affordably well the con s large protrusion from the outlet bulky on the wall as you can see i gave it 5 star because i don t care about the bulky protrusion but this feature still exists doesn t always recover from a power outage a power outage can be hard on device since it s often not a clean drop in line voltage but more of a brown out situation low voltage still present not cool for electronic component or worse a surge in power before a brown out this condition also impact my wireless router randomly so the inability for the switch to come back online following a power outage is also affected by my router s ability to come back online in the 5 month i ve had this switch i ve had to walk over an manually press the reset button on the rear of the device no biggee unless i used this device in a remote control scenario again this feature hasn t diminished my 5 star rating net evaluation none of the con take away from why i purchased this device it s stable provides lot of flexibility and is a recommended buy would i buy another one the 40 price tag drive a fair amount of need on my part before i ll part with the cash i ve tried other competitor with a slightly lower price however the cloud support set up doesn t hold a candle to wemo disclosure wemo nor anyone else gave me a single nickel to write this review it s absolutely unbiased i m motivated only by the desire to share a good thing with others when i come across it happy automating
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa
