Review: i did not receive any discount nor did i get this product for free i paid full price my husband ha been into making our home automated from cat wiring to light turning on with voice he s an it major and he sure is putting it to good use laugh out loud he wanted this wifi light control so that we could turn off light with our voice or from our phone if gone so he got this one well he wa so wanting it to work but it failed he say it s not very reliable works sometimes he hooked it up through our amazon echo and it barely worked it would work great for a few testing then it would say sorry i do no understand that command but yet it would turn the light on off so if you have a huge house you would think that it s not working and have to walk to check it and find that it wa working after the firmware update this started happening before the firmware update the echo worked fine with it app doe not work well not easy to set up took him 30 minute to set up when it should have taken way le than that the whole set up wa just a nightmare so i can not give this product more than a two star and the two star is only because it worked half the time or it would have gotten a one star hoping this issue can get fixed so needle to say this product is not reliable at all
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: is this product ready for the market
Review: i bought this a few month ago and only today decided to try it out i relied on the past reputation of belkin had a read some of the review i probably would not have purchased i want it to work with the echo dot 2 i finally wa able to set it up and get it to work after considerable time and effort at least an hour i only have an engineering background the instruction are completely useless it appears from other reviewer that their customer support capability are among the worse since many if not most customer support staff are relatively bad this is saying a lot obviously belkin no longer care what their name is attached to it is clear that this product is not ready to be sold and used by the mass market but perhaps only more suitable for techie type in the wireless data field overall it is really quite a shame that the management of this company would want to stand behind this type product this is the type of product we use to laugh about 50 year ago when some foreign country were just starting to produce and sell good on the world market if belkin management ceos etc are willing to stand behind these product then that say it all the question remains though should amazon
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: runs my 1500w oil heater with smartthings
Review: i bought this belkin wemo plug to use with my smartthings v2 hub i a man extremely happy the integration wa flawless and it work like a dream i first downloaded and installed the wemo app to get the plug set up with my home wifi network it wa just a couple step for smartthings to add the plug to it system and voila it is easy to add whatever automated process you want to it and for those not running the smartthings environment you can run automated process from the wemo app too i currently run the plug on an electric oil heater the heater is a max of 1500 watt and the plug is rated at 1800 watt it wa no problem running it i certainly plan on buying more
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: simple device if you only want to automate a few thing
Review: i ve been doing home automation since the x10 day my current system is mostly insteon and is controlled by an indigo server this setup is rock solid reliable if you have a wi fi network and don t want to invest in any home automation hub or controller this device and it s sibling will probably work for you it s pretty simple to set up and control from your handheld device the device seems to be well made the downside is there are only a few module out for wemo right now i don t see any dimmer module all of the lighting requires investing in a hub the upside is belkin and some other company are actively promoting it so it doesn t look like it will die off soon
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve had my echo since december 2015 i like it but it wa pretty limited a to what it could do time weather what s the meaning of life etc i liked the idea of adding voice control to the house i started with the hue and liked it but it s crazy expensive so i thought i would give the wemo a try it work great great price point i love it but the problem is the set up with the experience of setting up my gopro and hue this setup process need work hint hint software engineer at belkin i followed the setup procedure to the letter and it wouldn t accept my wifi password i finally got it to work after shutting everything down several time and then poof it started working now that it work it work great i have the light by the bed plugged into it if i m reading in bed and i want to sleep alexa lights off she turn off the light and say ok if i wake up before the sun alexa light on i love it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have these all over my house love them i especially love not having to purchase a hub or any other device to make this work made it feel like a more affordable choice for me to control kid room energy consumption every morning my kid would leave the light or ac on in their room when leaving for school with wemo product i have their light and ac on schedule to turn off when we leave the house everyday they don t leave thing on to power on off light outside my house on schedule to run on at dusk and turn off love controlling the light in my backyard with this to power on room when i arrive at home i have some light setup inside my home foyer living room kitchen when i arrive at home so that if i am carrying package i don t have to stumble on my way in getting thing powered on i purchased several amazon dots because i have electronics grouped by floor or other identifier i can now i can turn thing on or off just buy asking alexa to feels so spoiled at kid bedtime alexa turn off the light in the kid room or alexa turn off all the upstairs light or alexa turn off all christmas device i love this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: it arrived today and in a few minute i had it set up so that all i say is alexa light on and in a half second the light is on alexa then say ok same for light off during setup you can change the default name of the device the default wa wemo switch which i changed to light so if i automate more light i will have to add an extra word like bedroom light or kitchen light i deducted one star because the setup using the wemo app is a bit obscure you download it open it up and it tell you to go to setting which you cannot get to in the app ok so after a minute or so of huh i realized that they wanted me to go to my tablet setting not wemo setting they could have made that clear it also temporarily fiddle with the wifi while setting up and in my case froze when it wa finished just reboot the app and your wifi connection after the wemo is set up just tell your echo alexa discover device alexa will say the device she find and your switch should be working on alexa voice command
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i wa skeptical about this i wanted something to be able to easily turn on and off my scented wax warmer which is plugged in and placed on a shelf that is up high it arrived last night and i got it all plugged in and set up myself im not tech savvy so you know it wa super easy if i did it myself and within 15 minute i wa able to control it from my phone the only complaint i had is that i purchased this to work with our echo and this wemo advertised itself a echo compliant but had no instruction on how to connect it to our echo even with that information void i wa able to look it up online and get it synced it all work a it should we will be buying more in the future to automate more of our lamp and such
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love wemo switch for enabling remote control of my entire home
Review: love my wemo switch my entire home ha every lamp plugged in with a wemo switch many of the switch i have a power strip plugged in so that multiple light are all plugged into one switch and thus i have more than double the number of light a switch the reason wasn t so much for cost saving a sheer space having 3 4 light in close proximity and using one wemo switch each becomes quite bulky and space is at a premium i am eagerly awaiting the dimmer wall switch so that i can complete my full home automation and eliminate the last thing that i have to physically go and turn off on which is the ceiling light controlled by wall switch i wa not willing to sacrifice the dimming option on my ceiling light which is why i have not used the already available wemo wall switch for it in a few month the new wemo dimmer will be out i have all my wemo connected light connected to my google home a well a ifttt so i ve had a lot of fun experimenting with setting rule that pick up my location and when i arrive home ifttt ha turned on all the light in my home for me at other time i can say hey google and then turn off everything and 17 light instantly go off
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a great smart outlet that automates any device in your home
Review: the wemo switch is a wifi enabled smart plug which allows you to turn electronic device on and off and create schedule using your smartphone or tablet the wemo switch is compatible with android and ios device and it allows you to control your home device from anywhere you have a wifi 3g or 4g connection the wemo switch work with amazon echo alexa which give you voice command over your device it work with nest to sync up with your thermostat home and away mode to automatically turn your device off and on based on your location the wemo switch is also ifttt compatible you need to install the wemo app from the google play store or the apple app store to control the wemo switch there are two way to operate your device using the wemo switch first off there is a power button on the front that you can manually turn on and off if you don t have your smartphone or tablet handy when you open the wemo app it look for switch once your device is found you press the power button to turn the device on and off besides turning device on and the wemo app can also set schedule or rules to tell device when to turn on or off i recommend this device to anyone looking to power device on and off whether at home or away watch the video review from our youtube channel smart home tech to get a more in depth perspective on the wemo switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: bought my second switch in july after the first quit working now the second switch quit again i have searched the web for fix and tried all of the method to get it to work with no success the first switch worked perfectly until it quit the second switch would let me turn it on at sunset but wouldn t actually turn off at the selected time it would only turn off at sunrise while not ideal it wa acceptable today it failed it started by not being detected reset did not work uninstalling the app and reinstalling did not work i m done i will either find a wireless alternative or i will go low tech and install a light sensor or a plain on off switch i would not recommend this product to a friend hell i won t even recommend to an enemy
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i bought 2 neither work anymore get another product
Review: first of all connecting them can be a pain for example there s a point in the setup process where the app say something like please wait connecting to wemo for about 30 second and then it will fail try it a second time and it will work immediately go figure and that s just one example there are 3 separate issue i ve had with my wemos each wemo ha had all 3 of these issue at some point the first issue is that the app is no longer able to communicate with the wemo reliably sometimes this mean that you try to turn off a wemo remotely and the app hang indefinitely without turning off the light then if you force close the app and open it back up it might happen to work that time but maybe not half the time you ll end up having to walk over to the wemo and turn it on or off manually however the rule might still work when this happens meaning the wemo work okay in an automatic sense but is not in your manual control the second issue is that the wemo disconnect from the wifi spontaneously this can happen a day after setup or 3 week after setup but it always disconnect you d think it would just reconnect when the signal strength wa appropriate after all each wemo switch doe save a copy of the wifi credential but nope once it disconnect it just give up the only way to reconnect it is to do a factory reset and perform the entire setup all over again including connecting it to wifi and setting up the rule one thing to note is that the rule sometimes still work a in the example above but half the time it will also inexplicably forget the rule you ve programmed into it the third issue is that it forgets the rule spontaneously usually this happens within 24 hour of the factory reset you just performed because your wemo disconnected itself from the wifi and wa too lazy to reconnect when it forgets the rule naturally you ll try to set up the rule again the app will claim that the rule have been saved into the device but the device won t execute them and when you open the app again you ll find that there are no rule listed this ha been the most frustrating and disappointing product i can remember buying with the exception of my lg nexus 5x that tell you how bad lg suck
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great now that i have reserved an ip in my router
Review: i now own 12 of these wemo switch and they have been working perfectly for the last 6 month but that wasn t always the case i got my first wemo switch before christmas 3 year ago to control my christmas light every month or so they would drop off my home network and the wemo app showed them a not detected they just quit working i would have to unplug and plug them back in to get them working again it wa frustrating but i thought it wa a small price to pay for the convenience i purchased more wemo switch to control table lamp and my porch light but the more i had it seemed the problem go worse i wa resetting these thing weekly and sometimes more than once in a day i wanted to throw them out and customer service didn t have clue this may be a bit too techy for some people but this is what i did one day i had an idea i know that when a network device ha a dhcp assigned ip address the ip is leased and will change once the lease expires typically 24 hour i thought what if i set a static or reserve an ip address in my router that never change voilà that did the trick i haven t had a single problem since and that wa about 6 month ago that i made to change i would recommend to anyone having problem with these switch a i wa to try setting a static ip address before giving up it s not too difficult and for me it wa well worth the 20 minute that it took
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great for turning on a lamp or two or for your spaceship bridge
Review: if you plan to use this switch to perform smart home function connected through ifttt google home it ll do the trick every once in a while there is a one or two second delay before it switch on off i d say it fails to even trigger once ever 50 us or so but this is all subject to your wifi setting and condition if you happen to play artemis space ship bridge simulator you can tie this into your simulation using a free program called bridge tools great for a red alert light when compared to philips hue the wemo switch fall short this is understandable since hue ha it own hub for dedicated signaling if you only want to turn on off a few light the wemo is a cheap option but if you need to do more than a couple you should look at other solution that said the cool thing about the wemo is that it will power anything you plug into it not just lamp
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this is a review for the regular wemo smart switch not the insight switch i have four of them controlling two table lamp in my living room and two in my bedroom they are large but not too big the official wemo app is slow but other than that the setup is straightforward make certain that your wifi router is transmitting at 2 4ghz and not 5ghz also make certain that wifi security is set to wpa2 only and not wpa or wpa wpa2 i suspect people having issue with the setup have incompatible router setting i am using these switch with my google home and ifttt for voice control i also use the timer function built into the app which turn one living room lamp on automatically in the evening before i get home so that i walk into a well lit house the app s timer then automatically turn off all lamp at bedtime i considered going with phillips hue bulb or smartthings but the total cost for the same automation would have been much much higher plus those product require a hub i love my setup and the lower cost
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: switch appeared previously used and would not connect to wireless network
Review: i had high hope for this product a my wemo light switch work perfectly and are very convenient but there were a couple problem that ultimately made me return this switch first although the shipping box wa undamaged and the product box appeared unopened the switch wa visibly scuffed a if previously opened and used see attached photo i decided to overlook that and use it anyway at which point i found the switch simply would not connect to my home s wireless network again my wemo light switch experience wa flawless so i expected this to work equally well after following wemo s troubleshooting instruction multiple reset of the switch and digging around for anything else that could help i gave up and returned it amazon is exchanging it and i really hope the replacement work properly nevertheless first impression last and i can t recommend this based on the experience i had with it update the replacement unit arrived and strangely it also had slight scuffing near the prong after 3 factory reset and reinstalling the wemo app it wa finally able to connect to my wireless network compared to the wemo light switch setup experience the wemo switch s wa just awful bumping the rating up to 3 star because it doe finally work and is really convenient but the setup process need vast improvement
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought this switch to test out my amazon echo s home control function i use it on the lamp on my bedside table the echo seems to take longer a few second but all other command are recognized immediately to understand command to the switch but otherwise they work together well i d like to replace my wall switch with wemos to give my echo control of all my light and ceiling fan but i m waiting for belkin to add dimming capability to them something that in my opinion they sould have had from day one
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great a a sleep timer and easily connected to echo
Review: my wife like to watch tv in bed before she go to sleep of course she always fall asleep with the tv on the tv ha a sleep timer but it s buried in a menu tree and there s no way you re going to navigate it every night to set the timer i have a harmony remote but it s of no use either i got this switch because it seemed like it wa going to fit my need and it sort of ha it connected to my home s wifi easily and i downloaded the wemo app to my android phone no problem turning the switch on and off i tested in the same room a the router with a lamp plugged in rather than the television this is where my sort of comment from above come in but it s ok what i wa hoping for wa a button on the phone that would set a sleep timer instead i had to make a rule that simply said if this device is turned on between 6pm and 2am turn it off in 90 minute the rule wa very easy to do and it worked without a problem feeling confident i then turned to my amazon echo i told the echo to look for the device and it found it with no problem i wa then able to turn the switch on and off by voice command i then moved the switch to the bedroom and plugged in the tv here s the problem and this is my problem the bedroom is at one end of the house and the router is at the other end of the house i ve had sporadic signal issue in the past and the wemo wa no different point to point it s about 80 foot the wemo reconnected to the network when i moved it but i still had the dresser moved away from the wall once i moved the dresser back into place i lost the wemo i moved it so it would be above the dresser and haven t had a problem since apparently the 80 foot wa ok but the dresser wa a deal breaker this switch certainly meet my need and i think it s kind of cool to walk into the bedroom and tell the echo to turn on the television
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great but expect a learning curve lousy support
Review: you really have to pay attention to what you re doing to get the most out of these wemo thing they work fine but can be very picky belkin s support suck egg multiple sites say you have a couple of wemos at two remote location hundred or thousand of mile apart both network have to carry the same ssid if they don t you won t be able to control multiple location from one phone to make that work you need a use the same ssid e g bobnet you can t call them bobnet_1 and bobnet_2 nor bobnet and bobnet they must be identically named ssids then you ll have to run different sub net e g 192 168 1 xxx and 192 168 2 xxx this work you can control up to the max wemos the app will handle at up to 999 location using this approach wifi v cell say you are using your wemo s at multiple site and you ve got them all setup a above turn off wifi before you tap touch or try to use the remote wemo if you fail to do this the app will wipe the remote wemo from your phone and you will have to re pair it on site when you get on back on that lan because it can t do it over the cell re pairing is a real pia and that lan is mile and mile away firmware upgrading another issue is firmware upgrading be very careful where you are physically located if you upgrade the fw which happens periodically fist off you have to be on the lan where the device you want to upgrade is located at the time of the fw upgrade once that happens the other wemo s won t work on your app anymore until you get on that lan and upgrade the fw from there it also won t power on even manually so either way one of them is going to be a pia until you get back in and get it fixed i don t know if having the app on multiple phone with one at each location at the time of the fw upgrade would make a difference we have it on multiple phone but we are never independently all individual location so i ve never tried that power failures i have z e r o issue with the wemo s and power failure i ve seen a lot of these and given a few minute for the internet connection and lan to come back up then the wemo to connect it go right back to where i left it if i had it powered off it reconnects and stay powered off if i had it powered on it reconnects and stay powered on this is perfect support for each issue above belkin had no assistive support whatsoever don t look to belkin for support just assume you will need to do some homework on your own they did say it wa not possible to use the wemo at multiple site from the same phone which wa wrong that said once you get your wemo s setup they are very handy indeed i use mine to secure electric garage door opener at site about a thousand mile apart bottom line the wemo work reliably and a designed i and many others have issue with belkin s software programming choice but that can be worked around i agree we should not have to work around it but at least we can
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i have 4 of them now make your home smarter
Review: once you set these bad boy up it open a whole world of smart home opportunity we started with just lamp then over christmas we plugged our tree light in to one of these using ifttt at the time we could tell our google home to turn the tree off and on i dropped a widget on my android powered phone and could do it even faster or a we were walking up to the house to admire the tree through the window a we approached now wemo ha a direct integration with google assistant so no need for ifttt to do the same thing you can also use the wemo app although it s slower and clunkier in my opinion in the winter i plugged a space heater in to this for my garage because it turned on off with a knob instead of digital button i setup another ifttt to turn on the space heater 30 minute before i planned to workout in the garage it helped warm thing up before i started sweating the last setup we created wa a crock pot for those recipe that only need a few hour instead of 10 you can turn on the crockpot while at work and get home just in time for it to finish and still be piping hot something our second digital crockpot struggled with i will say we have a strong wifi signal which probably help but i have had no connection problem setup is easy through the app and wemo is generally connected with most smart home device a they re a pretty common name in that space overall i d highly recommend we have 4 in our house
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the product is not bad the software is
Review: let s be clear the product is not bad the software is as a matter of fact the software is terrible you can trust me on this one because i have 14 different device installed at home they are all working sort of but it is not that easy setting up is ok and it s not the main problem in the last few year i had all sort of difficulty but the last one is far from preventing me from posting this negative review i had everything working fine after many many problem it took me a few month and contact with belkin to get them to work and then a firmware update came to mess everything you cannot avoid the firmware download so the application just tell you that is installing the new firmware and you have to wait after that happened all my device keep showing downloading in the app and you cannot control them in an effort to get them working i tried a different phone because mine is an android i thought that maybe my wife iphone would work so i downloaded from the apple store and installed but the same thing happened on my phone i tried do uninstall and reinstall it many time but the problem persist tried on an ipad on a samsung galaxy tab2 and 2 different android phone but with no success i even tried to turn off all my house electricity turn back on to see if would stop the problem but it did not so what point am i if i open the wemo app in any of my phone or tablet all them keep showing the downloading message and don t let me do anything with them what wa programed is working but i cannot access any switch to change anything there is an alternative app that is far from perfect much slower but at least let me control the switches and insights it s called memo widgets i also have 2 motion sensor and they trigger the corresponding light but i cannot change any setting any more hope that this ha helped you just so you don t think i am a total idiot i am an engineer with 35 year of experience in digital technology and i have 117 ips taken in my home network aside from the wemo device everything work flawlessly best regard
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i can say the switch is working great amazing accurate to programming dusk
Review: this lowly little switch is only a piece of the puzzle a few month after install i can say the switch is working great amazing accurate to programming dusk dawn etc suffers power fails nicely and i will probably buy additional switch for other lamp appliance it is a 3 wire dry contact relay not an electronic switch so it will handle other than purely resistive load and several 100 watt of lighting it is 802 11x wifi based and need a good signal for proper function i have not yet tried enabling off site access if you have a wemo system this switch is a must the somewhat bigger piece of the puzzle is the smart phone any idevice or android app that control the switch and any other wemo device you have the app is confusing unreliable and want it s hand in every part of your smart device such is why i have not enabled internet access it took several hour of setup update reset setup update reset to finally get the phone switch and wifi to agree with each other once done it is pretty stable do your research well on the installation process and what it is doing there are web site and review that explain the whole process including what it access why and how to keep it in check at this point i am please with the whole system
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this item does not work we are a very tech savvy family and could not get this device to sync to our wifi in fact the app never even gave u the option we tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app at least a dozen time and reconfigured our entire router modem combination until we eventually gave up and returned this would be such a great item if it actually worked we returned this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: wemo switch smart plug wi fi works with alexa
Review: i really purchased this light for a bedroom lamp and a living room lamp you plug it into a wall outlet and you plug the lamp that you want to work off of it into this device you follow the set up instruction to set it up off of your smart phone it work with alexa or the dot now when i going to bed at night and i forget to turn off the light i just tell alexa to turn off bedroom or i tell her to turn on or off living room i don t have to get up and walk all over the house and find switch i m lamp it is wonderful it is so wonderful in fact that i just purchased wall switch to control some ceiling light in my home if you know electrical wiring and are careful you can put them in yourself if not i would recommend that you hire a licensed electrician to install the wall switch the spark plug that i purchased initially don t require any professional installation you just plug them in to a wall outlet and plug the lamp whatever it is you want to control into the smart one once you pair it you can control it by voice you can set up a timer or you can turn your light on and off from an app on your phone when you are a way from home i love it and i don t know where i m going to stop putting them in
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: took a little patience to get it working but actually pretty simple in the end i wa connecting to echo dot without the use of the wemo hub so going through their website didn t work to configure a a hub wa needed turns out that their app worked fine so connected my phone to the wemo wifi found it configured added the wemo skill to alexa pasted the macaddress and worky worky does exactly a i want well pleased and no hub extra equipment needed
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the good doesn t block the bottom socket if you use
Review: after toying with the idea of throwing a relay and arduino nano in my wall socket to automate the socket i decided against possibly burning my house down i ended up buying the wemo plug and a cheaper alternative and i wa impressed with neither the good doesn t block the bottom socket if you use a normal size plug beneath easy to setup and connect to wifi automatically recognized and added into home automation by alexa the bad drops wireless connection frequently and i return to find the light amber sometimes it just need to be power cycled sometimes i need to go back into the app and remove the wireless setting and reconnect it get super hot when the switch is on you can hear a super high pitched ringing that slowly drive you insane if you want to plug in anything that s not a standard 2 3 prong plug like an ac adapter below the device you re out of luck the final verdict i won t be buying any more wifi switch until the tech come along more the outlet i wanted this device for is right next to my couch for a 3in1 reading lamp the high pitched wine wa distracting and there s a basket with blanket in front of the outlet and i didn t want anyone tossing a blanket on this hot device so it s moved to the basement for that purpose it work fine to control a light and fan that i don t want on 24 7 and when it drop connection and i don t get to reset it for a few day no biggie
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: nice for convenience not for critical applications
Review: works fairly well you will need to pair it up with ifttt to get the most out of it i could never get the built in scheduler to work correctly when it did work it wa always an hour off and most the time it simply did nothing using ifttt to schedule turning the switch on or off work considerably better and you can use a variety of recipe to trip the switch currently i have it set to turn on my air conditioner whenever the outside air temperature go over 90 degree the only hitch is that occasionally my switch will decide it cannot be found neither by the native belkin wemo app or by ifttt the only fix is to unplug the switch for a few moment then plug it back in to reset it obviously this is not something that can be fixed from afar a you need to be physically present to unplug and replug the switch because of this you could never ever trust this switch to critical application for non critical or convenience application however i recommend it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: seamless install with a learning curve and i am thrilled work exactly a i hoped
Review: i bought three of these recently and i m very satisfied important advice do not be in a hurry when you install your first smart switch because there is a small learning curve and you ll probably thrash around a bit thankfully i had read the review here on amazon so i knew to expect the setup to be a little bit trying but after i learned what to do it wa seamless when you get your switch just plug it in to a wall outlet within range of your wireless network and also plug a lamp into it for testing next connect your smartphone s wifi to the switch s temporary network which will be called wemo switch xxx where xxx are the last 3 digit of the serial number instead of to your local area network then open the belkin wemo app on your smartphone android 4 0 or later or iphone while connected to the temporary network the very first time you connect to one of these temporary network it will ask you to help the switch get onto your local area network lan so at that time you need to type in the name of your lan called ssid in the documentation and it password if you buy 50 switch you ll only need to do this once because belkin will then store the information in the cloud for any future switch in your house to use after that the belkin wemo app should switch back to your regular lan and then should open a screen when you can name the switch use the name that describes the device you ll be switching i named mine bird lights green up light and red up light for example once that s done you can if you wish create rule for the switch in case you want to use it a a timer for example also once this is done if you have an amazon echo device just say alexa discover belkin wemo device and it should find them within a reasonably short time perhaps minute but in my case only second once it ha found them you can command the echo to turn the switch on off by saying for example alexa turn on bird lights or whatever your switch is called or alexa turn off bird lights it s that simple i didn t have a single issue with any of the three switch once i understood the procedure note also that soon after installation each switch wanted to get a firmware update this is new software for inside the switch that get downloaded from the belkin website it will ask you when you connect to the belkin wemo app if the firmware update can proceed and when you give the go ahead the switch may be unreachable for a few minute while the firmware downloads and the switch reboots give it 20 minute to be sure everything should be back after that i had none of the problem reported just a few week ago with echo it found them quickly and turn them either on or off a requested i also put two device in a group using the belkin wemo app and the echo let me turn them on off all at once using the group name good product worth the staggering 40 per switch cost for those few device that have special need in my case that wa one set of light that i wanted to come on at sunrise and off at sunset the bird lights and without needing an actual light sensor also two lamp that sit in corner where it s difficult to reach their switch i turn them off later at night to prepare my eye for bedtime so the smart switch allow me to turn them off without having to climb over furniture just to reach the physical switch of the lamp yay for home automation amazon echo and belkin wemo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great when it work frustrating software troubleshooting
Review: nice gadget for use with alexa we use the switch to turn on fan and small low current electric heater when watching tv or when in the bed it s nice to be able to get alexa to turn on off a fan or small heater setup is a usually straightforward but some situation are difficult to resolve if there is a software update for alexa or for the wemo switch odd thing can happen it is possible that they will all work with alexa but alexa cannot discover them the wemo app might word fine for controlling them but alexa cannot discover them and once wemo couldn t find any switch nor could alexa but alexa would control the switch i ve been able to resolve these problem usually with a router reset in case of a problem i m never sure if it is with alexa wemo or my own network often there are month of operation with no problem i don t know if any competing vendor have equipment that is more reliable just plan on occasionally having to troubleshoot the device and otherwise enjoy the convenience of the switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i saw this and thought it would be perfect to put on the plug that i connect a small electric heater to to be able to turn off when i leave the house or turn on a few minute before i need to go in the room where this heater is the wemo work fine for this in fact it work better than the g e quirky pivot power genius which doe not seem to be able to work or sense the state of it switch reliably yes i have one of those too the belkin is much better done because for one thing it ha the mac address of the device printed on it so setup is easier the app is easier and more intuitive to use and it actually work better however every time i set a wemo up and i have 3 of them now i always got an error but then they always started working at some point i don t really know what happened but it work you can turn off and on these switch from anywhere in the world and with the belkin you can know whether the switch is on or off at least better than you can with the quirky one thing i really do not like is the large housing the switch come in that is so big it really make the other plug in a receptacle a problem to use i can only put smaller thing in the plug beneath my wemo because the housing is so large that it cover some of the area my extension cord need to plug in that could have been noticed and fixed before they sent this out and there s no need for it that i can see one of the first device of it kind be aware that you need a connection to the internet to work the way i think this work is that your cellphone us the internet to connect to belkins s server somewhere and the wemo device maintain some kind of vpn connection to server a well when your phone app connects it must go out on the internet and then back to your phone this is why there is occasionally a fairly large lag and if there is an internet or server problem it might not work at all at least for a time i think it would be nice if the apps were smart enough to know when they are connected to the home network and to be able to directly communicate with the wemo over the local network without having to run everything all over the world being a network device and having a vpn right into your network it is possible that hacker of the nsa could exploit that and access your home computer video camera or other device you have set up on the internet
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: when they work they are great but i d say save your money for something more reliable and user friendly
Review: while i purchased two of these switch from amazon to complement my amazon echo i must say that i now regret having made this purchase i have other wemo switch purchased elsewhere a well totaling 8 my initial thought about the setup process wa that it wa a cockamamie process but it did seem to work when the switch work they work quite well my particular installation ha them in spot that are difficult to access requiring a ladder or crawling on the floor to reach them this is the rub they are flaky in that they work quite well almost all the time but they lose a connection and become inoperative belkin s support service is unreliable and in my opinion deceptive i have had an engineer reputedly contact me and ask what time were good for a support call obviously i responded and never heard from them again i want reliability not something i can t count on to work when i want it to work i have spent a fair amount of money on these and i will be getting rid of them and moving to another product which i guess i can t mention here
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i really wanted this belkin wemo set up to be the solution to my smart lighting goal specifically for iphone controlled outdoor lighting with auto on off around sunset sunrise i started with a wemo light switch pretty easy to switch out the current light switch but serious difficulty getting wemo onto home network and it kept insisting on firmware update that took much more than the up to 10 minute that pop up in the app but after a few hour i finally got it working and the app is reasonably intuitive to create the on off rule i wanted so then i went on to a wemo switch and a couple of wemo bulb with a hub total 2 week nightmare first the bulb were slow to pair but then when i had them paired and tried to group them they both went out as in no light and no way to get the light to come back even following the reset procedure on the belkin web site or trying them in another fixture like a lamp after an hour call with belkin tech support responsive and friendly but just had me run through standard procedure that i had already done they thought it wa a hardware issue and had me request an exchange with amazon so i did that got the new bulb and the same thing happened belkin confirmed i had followed the correct installation procedure and after another 1 5 hour on the phone they agreed to exchange them directly but i had to argue for 10 minute that they should pay for the shipping two week later the replacement bulb arrive and still grouping cause them to short out you could even see black streak inside the bulb meanwhile the wemo switch took a while to install and be recognized but it wa working even for the switch and initial light switch the app constantly loses them and the only way to find them again is to go off wifi on the iphone verizon lte always refinds them then i can switch back to wifi complete pain this is the short version of the saga not smart not easy not reliable meanwhile two week ago i saw that samsung smartthings hub version 2 had come out read some good review and ordered one while waiting for it to arrive i got some cree connected bulbs from home depot ten minutes of installation and i had the bulb and smartthings hub up and running bulbs recognized instantly hub ha no wifi accessibility issue and on off response is very quick in the app so i ordered a ge smart switch to expand installed that on the garage overhead light switch and right away it showed up in the app so easy so much better than wemo more accessory on the way to my house right now only downside just like a cnet review say is that the smartthings app is quite confusing you really have to work at figuring out how to set up rule but i figure that the key is for the hardware installation to be straightforward and then it s much easier to improve the app in coming month
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works great for me with amazon echo dots the wemo app is dumb and doesn t always let you see the newest firmware update even though they are available opening the app on a different device iphone ipad etc allowed me to get the prompt that new firmware wa available to update despite that slight annoyance i m overall happy because alexa control my light and otherwise the wemo app work fine you can even schedule them to come on turn off at different time which is kind of an obvious feature but still smarter than a regular switch because you can set it to sunrise sunset which will constantly be changing throughout the year but it will auto correct it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not just a switch a computer with a wireless transceiver
Review: updated on june 14 2015 i maintain the five star rating of this product the original firmware version wa wemo_us_2 00 2176 pvt which cause a problem with amazon echo but this is fixed with version wemo_us_2 00 3949 pvt the problem wa that if you ask alexa to turn on the light she will but after about half hour if you ask her to turn the light off it will not be turned off unless you re discover the device turn on then turn off an inconvenient workaround to update the firmware open the wemo app on an android device and reset the device by pressing and holding the restart and the reset button for five second and then releasing them the light on the wemo switch will blink to green then amber which mean a successful reset at this point a message will pop up on the wemo app saying a new firmware update is available let it update the problem then go away original review there are 3 step to get this to work with an android device or ios 1 download and install the wemo app 2 search for this switch in available wifi network just like you d be searching for your router and connect to it 3 run the wemo app which will ask you to pick your actual router and credential to connect to it done the wemo app will revert back to your router connectivity and this switch will appear in your list of device for wemo if you have amazon echo simply say alexa search for my device wait until she find the switch then you can say alexa turn on the wemo switch or you can change the name of the switch in the wemo app to something like the light and let alexa find it for you
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it s a bit bulky and buggy but doe the job that i need it to do
Review: i had a bit of an issue right out of the box when it attempted to do a firmware update it seemed like it did download the update however the app really never indicated that it wa finished i left it on for well over an hour before finally manually powering it down and crossing my finger when it came back on luckily it took the update although i wa a bit worried that i bricked it also a con is the size of the unit itself it s bulky and take up the whole outlet that aside i have maintained a pretty good wifi connection i wa able to change the name of the unit from wemo to tree since i ve since hooked it up to turn on off my christmas tree it work pretty well with amazon alexa however there wa a few time that it disconnected from the wemo skill app within the alexa app and i had to use the wemo android app to recover from this i have not used any of the rules yet but hope to set this up a an on off timer in the very near future overall i would have to say this is great device but need a bit of work on the android app and integration into alexa it s a must have for an automated smart home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: lousy instruction with product and the help file is horrid
Review: original feedback followed by update original never left a 1 on anything before i programmed the timer after i finally got it to connect to my wi fi set to come on from 8 to 11 30 in the evening and 4 40 to 7 30 in the morning maybe it come on maybe it doesn t sometimes it turn it self off in the middle of an on cycle and then it may or may not come back on sometime later this morning it came on at 7 40 when i wa leaving the house updated feedback when creating a rule do not use the away mode in the automate section a a template i wanted to set the time for when i wa away so i clicked on this rule and modified it this is the wrong way to configure this device away mode seems to ignore the time and date you set what it does do is it turn the switch on and off and random interval i did see it come on at my schedule but every 30 to 40 minute it would turn off then a while later back on again this is not in the minimal instruction in the box and the help file doesn t help instead use the by time sunrise sunset setting in the control a device section then it work perfectly do not use the setting under automate that caught my eye and so i kept going back to it wrong section i have it set to come on a half hour before sunset and turn off at a specific time this is perfect since it get dark about 5 pm in the winter and about 10 pm in the summer i am not going to have to constantly change the mechanical timer remember do not use the automate section for controlling the on off and you will be happy a a clam
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: arlo wemo great after a work around
Review: before purchasing this item i tried to determine if it would work with my arlo motion detector camera and ifttt if this then that website i couldn t find a confirmation but i did find a rule in place on the ifttt website that led me to believe it would work what i wanted to do wa to plug a lamp into this wemo switch and have it come on if off or turn off if on at the time that my arlo device detected motion the purpose is to deter a would be burglar at night i received the wemo switch and had no problem setting it up it connected immediately to my wi fi and i wa able to connect to ifttt a well the problem arose when i attempted to setup the rule that i wanted it continually failed apparently the arlo wasn t working a i had hoped however and i provide this information for others to use if needed i found that i could have arlo send me a google email and use the google email to trigger the wemo switch it work perfectly now my lamp is blinking on and off all day i need to re think having the arlo on 24 hour a day but the point is that the switch doe work exactly a it should i can also easily turn the lamp on or off using the wemo app on my phone or ipad now i plan to see what other security us i can find for the wemo product i don t really understand the negative review this product work perfectly
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: won t stay connected long enough to set up wireless stop transmitting
Review: just go the amazon echo and wa pretty impressed wanted to hook up this wemo to it and it arrived today wemo boot fine i connect to it via iphone app connect give it the lan credential then it go into a discovering device phase on the app for several minute until the wemo seems to timeout or shutdown app say we ve lost connection with the wemo device please quit this app reconnect to the wemo network and reopen this app at this point the iphone can t see the wemo wireless connection at all so i re initialize the wemo and i can repeat this same process over and over the wemo seems to stop transmitting while the app is in a discovering device loop it ha a very strong signal and is close line of sight to the router which ha plenty of open address space and is ready to play instructions say to update but that s hard when it won t connect i ve reinstalled the app rebooted everything and moved location of the wemo just to be sure this is an incredibly frustrating experience spending hour on something simple don t need this kind of headache the device seems to be poorly made and make alexa sad
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: promising but headed for the trash bin
Review: i say avoid it worked fine for a while then unit began failing after a few month spent a lot of money on this system and i had to pull them all and i am looking at a pile of them right now and i am not happy about this here are some of my experience 1 out of the box they worked great that prompted me to invest in quite a few of these plus the coffee pot the humidifier and the air freshener 2 wifi went down had to do a reset wemo unit all needed to be reset manually unplugging and replugging did it the app worked fine on my android tablet very nice to hit all the house light make coffee all from my tablet 3 several unit began acting weird some just refused to flip off and on invested in echo to control them once i got that it really went downhill a more and more of the unit stopped working began flashing and could not connect anymore to wifi bought some range extenders no dice 4 now none of them work bought a cheap push button model etekcity zap that doe 90 of what wemo did all lying on a table doubt i will try them again next step once i get sick of looking at them is the trash
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: other than the difficulty setting up my phone kept reverting back to the house wifi it work great as an added bonus i wanted
Review: i got this for a light that is hard to reach to turn on and off in my den other than the difficulty setting up my phone kept reverting back to the house wifi it work great as an added bonus i wanted to be able to control it with my echo so i did the setup and there it wa the echo saw it with the name i gave it the true test wa alexa turn on the den and 1 2 a second later the light went on alexa turn off the den and 1 2 a sec later the light went off what a great product for the price i wa considering building one my self with a photon or a cheaper arduino but this thing work great if you have a echo and need a light or other appliance to control that is difficult to get to then this is for you love it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i wa excited when my switch arrived before my amazon echo i thought it would be nice to set up the light switch to the car port and in the living room so we could access them remotely to make it look like we were home when we were out or to light up the first couple of room when we come home at night after a couple of hour of frustration i am going to have my first return of something ordered through amazon i keep having the following problem 1 the application will not detect the switch and the only solution is to uninstall and reinstall the application reset the switch and try again 2 the application finally detects the network for the switch and connect to the switch in the time it take to type in living room light a the name for the switch the phone loos connection to the wemo network if i am lucky i can just unplug and plug the switch back in and reconnect at other time it connects to something called 3g and the only way to get it to connect to the wemo network is to uninstall and reinstall the app again 3 the application finally detects the switch allows me to set my desired name but loos connection to the wemo network when it try to connect to my wireless network if i am lucky i just unplug and plug the switch back in redetect the wemo network rename the switch and try again if not it connects to 3g and i have to uninstall the app download it again reset the switch and try again i haven t even tried the light switch yet but if this is how poorly the wall switch work i am not uninstalling a light switch and wiring in a wall unit just so i can have the same frustration
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: intermittently doe not respond to alexa have this switch hooked up to a lamp when it chooses to not work alexa responds with a sorry your device is not responding please check your network connection blah blah blah this ha become an everyday occurrence i have completely reset both system to factory installed firmware update etc works great for a day then back to the same error contacted belkin tech support explained everything i did and of course i get a response back asking me if i reset everything and updated the firmware this obviously demonstrates that belkin tech support themselves are pre programmed not even reading what i had already done now i could take it upon myself to re prioritize my wifi device change device lease in the router etc but i shouldn t have to i bought a product that doesn t state only work sometimes but we can fix it by doing this this then this then that oh yeah and then this too and if you ever change or upgrade your network you will have to call tech support back not what i signed up for do a web search of how many other people are having the same issue before purchasing this product i got one to try for this reason before i bought a bunch on to the next supplier for me i hear zwave maintains a very reliable connection so i will try that one next
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i desperately wanted to like this i bought two one for myself and one for my parent in hope that they would like it and i would get them more for different room of the house thankfully i tested mine first what a disappointment the point of this is to not have to get up and turn the light on however it would constantly lose connection with the app my first clue that it wouldn t go well is when i went to download the app to my phone and the app rated poorly so they are both getting returned oh and i figured the product would be on the large size but seriously this thing is massive save your money and buy something else
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: these are great the very first one wa a bit challenging to set up after a call to customer service the rep wa very helpful and got me up and running in no time the other one i bought were a breeze after that i have them linked to my echo dot and ask alexa frequently to turn them on and off three of these are connected to himalayan pink salt lamp i have in my home and the first thing i do when i wake up in the morning is to ask alexa to turn on all of the salt lamp and poof they are on i also have one connected to my christmas tree light which i ll find another purpose for when i take it down in a few day it is also very simple to use the app to turn them on or off and i wa particularly happy that the app worked fine with my kindle fire unlike many other apps that are supposedly available there but no longer supported and won t work at all like philips hue what a nightmare that one wa highly recommend these were my first foray into the smart home world and i m thrilled
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the product becomes undiscoverable when i leave my house
Review: the product becomes undiscoverable when i leave my house the app worked outside the house for maybe a week
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: great inexpensive product to have on hand used to leave light on all day so a not to come home to dark house in the winter but with this simple product wa able to program a few light switch to turn on right before it get dark have also programmed some to turn on and off on certain day when i know we ll be getting home late to give the appearance of someone being home very easy to set up out of the box fyi it may appear like the app is crashing but it s really just going into the background still a bit annoying so i save on electricity can also remotely turn on off anything light radio etc when on travel and not on a predictable pattern
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: does it job well with some nagging thing that irk me but don t impact the core functionality
Review: works very well with amazon echo alexa the response time is nearly instant especially compared to my hue bulb and the build quality seems good my only con are the physical design these plug take up a lot of real estate on an outlet or standard surge suppressor and you can t rotate the plug so on some 6 outlet surge suppressor you may get two open outlet plus the one on the smart plug knowing that this is a gadget designed for people who are likely already desperately low on outlet this seems kind of shortsighted although this feel substantial enough to run a whole surge through it so perhaps that s why the engineer made that choice but for me controlling a couple lamp on a single plug and a fan on the other it feel kind of silly the packaging there s literally four or five piece of clear tape holding this complicated unfolding box that feel like a lower tier apple package dude it s an electrical plug save some dough especially when selling through amazon to nerd like me and knock a buck off the msrp i got mine for 20 each which still feel a bit high
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: smart outlet great for automation software isn t perfect but shouldn t hold you back good buy
Review: i bought this outlet because i like automation in my home and also in the hope that some day i might work myself up to getting an echo or dot i really like using it to charge my phone for a few hour in the middle of the night i like that you can create program using the software that tell the outlet when to turn on and off i also like that i can access the outlet through the app from almost anywhere the down side to this outlet is that the software doe not allow you to do a countdown timer you can set it to start at a certain time and stop after a certain amount of time but you cannot just say be on for 1 hour there is a feature that allows you to cycle the timer but i don t find this helpful because it just keep turning the timer on and off over a set period of time like 1 hour on and 1 hour off and repeat the other problem i have found is that i have an old apartment with old outlet no ground wire no 3rd prong so when i plug this thing into the wall i have to plug it into on of those converter first and that make the device stick out of the wall even further what that really mean is that it sooner or later it fall out of the wall when i have to pull a plug out of the outlet to switch out one charger for another overall it s still a great device and i recommend it for anyone who want some automation to their home the down side with the software is manageable and the other issue are no fault of the device just the environment i live in i would recommend it to anyone
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: review of wemo switch wemo app
Review: update 4 5 2 15 still disappointed that every wemo product is still mashed into this one huge review section this update refers to the belkin wemo switch only a recent firmware update ha increased the responsiveness of my 4 wemo switches so that all respond promptly to on off command also the more aggressive integration of the wemo switch with the ifttt app expands the functionality of the wemo switch significantly the app run smoothly i see no flaw in this product that would warrant it receiving anything but 5 star again can not speak for the other wemo product a do not own any i just posted the following review on apple s app store of the wemo app and how it interacts with the belkin wemo switch i m sure everyone ha noticed that amazon clump the review of all the wemo products into one giant review section i am not sure this is best a it is possible that various wemo product are performing at different level for example i noticed that the wemo light switch ha a fair amount of negative review maybe that is because it is the most often bought item in the wemo line maybe it is a le admirable product in my case i wa interested in the wemo wall switch i found it fatiguing to weed through all the review finding the one on that specific product anyway here is my review of the wemo app in conjunction with the wemo wall switch first my hardware and software for reference iphone 6 running ios 8 1 3 12b466 wemo product 4 wemo switches kind that plug into wall outlet version of wemo switch va01 firmware running on wemo switches wemo_us_2 00 7166 pvt app version 1 10 2 20022 here s the good news 1 all 4 of my wemo switches nicely control the device to which i have them connected 3 light and one tv 2 i can successfully control all 4 wemo switches via my home network via the enterprise network at work and via 3g and 4g for those reason the product and app earn 5 stars i had to take away 1 star because of the bad news 1 the app is not refined and often requires several attempt at various task in the setup before success is achieved luckily i am not a novice user of ios technology and am comfortable with trial and error when i set up several of my device i wa told the device wa trying to connect to my network then it told me it failed and to try again or later i kept trying and it kept saying it failed so i stopped trying only to realize that the switch was connected to my network the developer need to fix this inaccurate reporting a many folk would give up right there trying to set up the device 2 i understand the need for firmware update and am actually glad the company is showing attention to area of improvement by the presence of firmware update my switch needed 2 firmware update each again that s fine my only complaint is after the first firmware update on each of my 4 switches i received a celebration banner saying something to the effect that your wemo switch is now running the latest greatest fw version hooray actually that wa not true at all there wa still one more firmware update and only because i noticed a red dot on the menu bar at the bottom of the app screen did i decide to check if there were more firmware update this need fixing each firmware update take a while 5 minute or so that s ok 4 when i experimented and turned on some of my device from work enterprise network and some of my device via 4g parking lot at work everything went fine when i got home all the device were on great however i wa unable to turn 3 of the 4 device off home network because of past experience with other buggy apps i totally closed the wemo app and reopened it i didn t just put it in the background in the recently used app bar that fixed the problem and i wa able to turn off all the device obviously the user shouldn t need to do this reboot the app and some user may not think to do it this is another area for the developer to refine the app all in all i really like this product i have no qualm recommending it but novice user would be encouraged to solicit the assistance of an experienced person during setup and remember my review is with regard to the functionality of the wemo wall switch perhaps it applies to the other product perhaps not
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great idea but too much trouble to use
Review: what could be better than operating your light remotely so that would be burglar wouldn t know that you weren t home lights on a timer are predictable which i understand burglar figure out however this wemo smart plug wasn t quite smart enough for my purpose if the power go out you have to set the thing up on your wifi again and it s finicky in the set up it wa too much trouble it s now in a drawer
