Header: this work great i want to get a few more
Review: this work great i want to get a few more the only reason i did not give it 5 star is because it wa not easy to set up out of the box i had to contact support for further instruction that were not included in the box with the product i had to turn off mobile data first before doing anything but support wa helpful and able to get me all set up i just wish he would have reminded me to turn mobile data back on after setting it up i went two day trying to figure out why my phone would not connect to the internet when i wa not home finally remembered that i turned off mobile data and got it turned back on ooops on my part
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: updated finally found the app works well set security protocol on your wifi
Review: update i finaly found the wemo app on my ipad it is listed under iphones only it wa easier to install via the app store app than the android app it appears to be working as an aside note after installation the app wanted to update it s firmware due to a security vunerability found they found a vunerability by whereby hacker could hi jack the device and get on your secured network that s why i didn t like the android app with all of those permission and my echo operates the switch nicely original post as of this writing i can find no free wemo app for ipad or iphone in the app store for this switch they say there is but there is none there are paid apps i tried the free android app it want permission to my contact calendar photo call camera and on and on for a switch you ve got to be kidding me i even tried the android app and it basically make you connect to the wemo s unsecured wifi and then try to get it to connect to your personal wifi a bit convoluted if you ask me and it didn t work i have the amazon echo which i love and wanted to try this a an accessory i have a smart thermostat which echo handle nicely this switch doesn t even work on it s own app will look for another brand or system
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the android app request access to contacts identity location and a long list of other phone service it shouldn t need this is offensively invasive to the point that i consider it unusable wemo only support being used through the phone app so i guess this thing is useless to me until they fix their app
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: 4 star for now product may not last depending on the electrical situation in your building home
Review: wow so many recent bad review it make me worry about this product you need to download the wemo app on your smartphone first pair the switch your phone then to your router over wifi in order to use this switch fail to do any one of these step and the socket switch will not work i have read horror story about having to wait for hour for belkin tech support from their customer service line after your product no longer pair with the router and i do not intend to do that since this is amazon and what break can easily be replaced i also have alexa the amazon echo smart device a voice activated speake with internet connectivity really for your home pairing it with the wemo app allows you to use voice command alexa turn the light on and alexa turn off the light alexa will do a asked and respond with an okay after the task is completed if you do not have an amazon echo that is okay too using the wemo app on your smartphone will allow you to use the wifi connectivity to turn the light switch on and off it is lightning fast in response to pressing the app s power button i will update this review and possibly drop star rating if the switch dy or malfunction like i have seen in other review hopefully that will not be necessary
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: we have bought several of these to use with amazon alexa they were great and are easy to set up we put some in a family member s house a she ha trouble with her vision and they make it much easier for her to turn light on a she s entering the room we used them for the christmas tree light and other light around the house it s great to be able to turn on and off light remotely we used to leave our front light on all day in the winter time so it would be on when we got home at night now we can put it on a timer or simply turn it on when we re on our way home while in our home i guess you could call it a bit of a luxury for the disabled like my family member this ha been a lifesaver there is another more upgraded model but the only difference i could see wa that it measure electricity usage that just wasn t something we were looking for the only con to this is it s size i noticed recently that they have come out with smaller one so we will have to look into that if we purchase any more
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: my only smart device that does not connect to wireless
Review: bought this to replace the automatic timer on my living room lamp i wa tired of constantly adjusting for changing daylight and wanted something i could flip on my from car so i didn t have to enter in the dark or turn off from my bedroom when i choose to go to bed early and it s great when it work it is having a lot of trouble connecting and staying connected to my wifi i have excellent internet speed and a modern router my amazon dash button and nest thermostat both in the same area of my house a the wemo work perfectly wemo doe not even after i tried all of their troubleshooting tip changing channel on my router etc so it s just an expensive automatic timer without the extra i wa excited about i m returning it today
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: this product is the worst product i have ever purchased off of amazon and
Review: this product is the worst product i have ever purchased off of amazon and i returning the pair of floater i purchased 1st the app doe not work with alexa or ever itself it will not provide you with a page the step asking for your home router information instead acting like it is it own network tried it on an ipad 2 of them and on my cell phone total piece of garbage alexa should be plug and play and i find the fact that amazon advertises this work with alexa without explaining how tortuously retarded and unusable the app is to be reprehensible i do not normally leave review you you should run from these like the plaque interesting belkin ha no support line for their product i now know why they suck stay away from this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought a couple of these and i ll admit i m on the fence a bit after reading other review i bought them for a couple of lamp to work with the amazon echo here s what i got i downloaded the wemo app and echo identified with the device but one of them work perfectly without any issue and the other work about 85 of the time sometimes i ll tell echo to turn on the 2nd one two or three time till it finally work other time it work without fail my faulty wall adapter is within 2 foot of the router echo the wemo wall adapter and my router are all within a 10 foot proximity but i am not yet prepared to blame the product so far i have had no negative issue with the wemo app to report it ha worked perfectly with it s product without a problem i am still in the learning phase of the whole amazon echo smart home thing but if i can prove it is user error and not the product i will tack on a couple more star but right now i can t say that s the case i have purchased the wemo wall light switch a well which work flawlessly through a wall with plenty of obstruction so i am pretty impressed with it performance
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well away mode in particular
Review: i use this product for two main purpose first when i am away i use away mode to randomly turn my light on and off to convince a possible intruder that someone is at home because the product is compatible with ifttt i can also use my motion detecting camera to turn the light on immediately if anyone come to the porch when i am not away i use the wemo to turn on a fan or old air conditioner when my wifi thermometer climb to a specific temperature essentially giving my very old air conditioner a thermostat therefore saving me money i have also used the wemo for my christmas tree light at some point i will purchase another few outlet so i can do all of these thing at once but at this time the cost is still a little high to outfit my whole house i got the unit i have when there wa a sale and they were around 20 i am hoping that the price will fall a competition continues from other maker the only thing keeping me from giving five star is the price point and the fact that the app and wifi connection can be buggy at time and i have other wifi connected item in my house that aren t buggy so i know it isn t my wifi but overall i am very satisfied with the product and can recommend it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well unless using multiple echos
Review: set up wa a bit confusing and i have other wemo product it always happens with new product and their newer firmware update this wa really troublesome because even after an hour of updating the app product it still wa not finished and i have a fast connection had to force stop the app restart and restart my phone after that it operated a advertised connecting to my echo wa easy and work well just not great we have multiple echos in the house and the switch is in the bedroom connected to an echo in there if i give the on command in the living room and the off command in the bedroom there is a 50 50 shot that it will not turn on or off a commanded if i consistently use just one echo it work almost flawlessly for me i would like to turn the bedroom light on before i go in there otherwise it would be quicker to use the switch i have now just begun using the on command while walking in to the room and pause 2 second for it to turn on the light
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use a pair of these with an amazon echo to control two lamp in the living room despite several firmware update sometimes it take issuing a command to turn the light on 5 6x half the time it just work most of the time both lamp turn on with the same command not sure if the echo is transactionally issuing the command when both are receptive or they just happen to become receptive at the same time like others have said the insane amount of permission requested by the wemo android app is just insane for what the app should actually require to do it basic job but fortunately with marshmallow you get prompted a they are used the actual device setup in the app wa flakey at best but it did get both setup in a reasonable amount of time with only mild frustration once setup firmware update are fully automatic which is awesome hopefully firmware update will ameliorate the connectivity issue
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: if you are thinking about it just buy a switch and try it out this is a solid product i started with just this one switch i now have 4 and two motion sensor an energy monitoring switch is on the way the system is very easy to program however setup can be painful now that i know the issue setup is not so bad first close and open the wemo app if it is acting funny second the app may say it ha problem connecting a device to the network even though it connected to the network once it setup however it is ha been great i dock a star for the setup issue what i love is that i can change the rule from anywhere this mean if i going on vacation i can program the front light to turn on and off at various time from the airport and turn off the light that i don t need off it modular so you can re purpose the switch and motion detector a needed i use wemos it to control various plug in heater on the house that just get left on from time to time if i know we will be using the basement i can turn on the heater manually a few hour before using my iphone also i have rule that turn off the heater at night no matter what so they are no left running the light in my house are programmed to respond to motion sensor my bedroom light turn off at 11pm to remind me to go to bed and turn on a 7am to wake me up if i oversleep just on work day it will also turn on the light if there is any motion in that room for 30 minute minimum from sunrise to 11pm if there is motion at the front door a light turn on and i get a message on my iphone the light in that room is programmed to turn on at sunset and off at 11pm but will respond to motion from 11pm sunset the next day it wa very easy to program all this i wish the motion sensor were battery run since they need to be plugged in outlet not putting one in your shed for example unless it ha power the protocol used is proprietary which is sort of a bummer long term you may need to upgrade the software a few time when you open the box it seems that the upgrade are not all done at once overall this is a very cost effective way to get into home automation its a mass market offering which should make you feel more secure i have other belkin product and they have been great if you are like me you will find that it very empowering to be able to control multiple aspect of your home from your phone with rule my kid love playing with the app given there are no monthly fee the app is free and the sophistication yet ease of the rule setup the value of this product is very high
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i could not hate a product more
Review: the interface instruction for this product are awful i consider myself pretty tech savvy but there s no way i m buying these for my 73 year old father given how much trouble my first one of these is giving me there d be no way he d ever get it figured out the demo video is one of the most incredibly annoying and useless help video i ve seen for a product sending it back and will look for another
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: just ok i doubt i will buy more wemo stuff though
Review: so far this is just ok first off the box seems much larger than it need to be i think some of the other wifi outlet control are smaller even the wemo insight plug control seems much smaller in size while it seems to offer more feature secondly the android app is pretty poor not straight forward or obvious enough to the newbie and no info at all on the packaging you must first connect to the wifi offered by the wemo device to get the process going then you have to switch to your main wifi to complete the job it is very similar to setting up a chromecast except the app guidance is le good third the last on off state is not remembered re established after a power outage belkin say this is for safety and i can see that in some case but in others it make no sense at all this should be an end user option for each device don t hold your breath for it i am only using it so far for simple on off from the app or mostly via a 3rd party command line interface on linux which work well enough so i have not looked into rule and schedule but one thing i that is not clear is what happens to rule schedule after a power outage if there is no wifi available do the rule schedule persist over the power outage if there is no wifi how is current time established is there an internal clock with some form of battery backup to survive power outage if not then without wifi schedule are likely to fail after power outage since internet time cannot be reached one would expect much better from the like of belkin so in a way this is a real disappointment
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: edit 12 10 16 added a 4th basic switch tonight amazon warehouse purchase for the christmas tree and in order to connect i needed to restart my phone otherwise it went just a simply a the others enjoying the automation so much i broke down and ordered an echo tonight too think hue light strip are next i discovered these switch while researching the echo didn t get the echo but now have three basic wemo switch one from home depot and two from amazon after studying review i went with the basic switch rather than the insight and i love them turning out light after i ve left the room mean no more tripping over dog toy or the cat i especially like the ability to turn on light remotely when i m going to be late connecting to my note 4 wa simple firmware downloaded without incident each time i connected one definitely getting one more switch for the christmas tree
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love the function hope you can find someone who know how to set it up
Review: i bought this for my mom for christmas she ha the amazon echo which she love but wa using a clapper on one her primary light in the living room the clapper is okay but man that thing been around for like 25 year and i don t think the technology ha improved you had to run around her living room clapping away until the light would finally cut on my mom life by herself and by the time she get home from work it s pitch black out in the winter so something more effective seemed like a necessity so once set up this thing work great she can just talk to alexa and ask her to turn the light on or she can turn the light on with the app on her phone before she even walk into the house or if she hears something downstairs while she is sleeping she can talk to the echo remote which she keep in her room and have the light come on this is all awesome the downside is that set up is not easy if you buy this for your parent or grandparent be prepared to come set this up for them setting up everyone s technological device in the family ha somehow become my job by default and this still took me 30 minute to get it working 40 if you count the snack i had to have halfway through the process there is a quick start guide included in the package which good luck opening the freaking package by the way but it is not enough to get you started and it certainly isn t quick it essentially just directs you to download the app and then the instruction are in the app which isn t a great user experience because then you have to toggle back and forth on whatever device you are using between the instruction in the app your wifi setting on your device back to the instruction back to the app itself with instruction closed back to wifi setting pain in the rear anyway once this wa set up it wa awesome my mom only ha a lamp plugged into it but i imagine the possibility with this are pretty endless so long story short if you are relatively familiar with network setup stuff or you know someone who is and they owe you a favor this is definitely worth the setup but out of the box this is not something that just anyone would be capable of setting up now i just hope that if my mom decides to move this plug to a different outlet we don t have to go through the whole process again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: spend 10 more and get the wemo insight instead
Review: it will work remotely and let you program your light to come on and off only this unit will not act a a dimmer the insight by belkin allows you to also monitor your electric usage and ha several other function that make it much more desirable than this model the insight allows you to record the usage of whatever it is plugged into it it will also tell you how much it cost to run whatever is plugged into it and it can send usage spreadsheet file to your email the insight also tell you when thing turn on like a space heater each time it turn on the insight outlet via the wemo app it van be set up to send an alert to your phone my point is the spend the extra 10 and get something that ha tremendous multi function capability these unit are handy a timer and you can check them remotely to insure they are working
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: first the good it s easy to install albeit somewhat mysterious it work so far ten day the app ios work ok usually the not so good the biggest issue in my case is the necessity to have local access to my lan to set up the app on a new or different device if you re not at home there is no way to do this so you can control the wemo remotely with competing product you set up an account with a password and the device information is stored there adding another controlling device is simple a long a you remember your account information wemo also set up an account somewhere but this is not visible to or accessible by the user one of my home is empty for eight month of the year i want to be able to turn light on and off at random time when everything is working correctly it s fine if i were to lose my cell phone or trade it in i m on the at t next plan i will have no way that i m aware of to teach a new one about wemo from 997 mile away i also had some problem with firmware update with two of the unit the update took a very long time and at the end said update failed the wemo is ten foot from my router with a very reliable 50 mb sec internet connection after several try i checked the firmware version and it wa the same a the first one i updated which completed normally they also seem to work fine so possibly the error wa the error message we ll see
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: by far easiest to set up remote switch ever
Review: i don t understand the bad review this is by far the smoothest and simplest and i ve tried every remote relay and switch you cant think of remote switch you can think of the app setup wa a breeze it instantly found my wemos and it worked right away no complex set up with dhcp remote or local ips gateway or none of that complicated stuff wa needed to get it to work the other awesome thing is not only doe it work right away from your wifi network it work remotely i wa surprised that it had this feature automatically without any set up on my part this mean you can control security and turn thing on and off camera light security feature recording a show from work or even if your mile away on vacation this may not seem like a big deal but i ve tried a lot of chinese vendor and us vendor remote relay and ir device and spent hour if not day trying to get them to work and they had glitch after glitch with the wemo it wa so easy just opened the app and it seemed to set all this up right off the bat my only gripe is i wish they had more than one electrical connection they take of a lot of horizontal space so they fill up nearly 3 electrical receptacle on my electric strip this also make it difficult to place multiple wemos on the same strip a well perhaps they have one with 2 to 4 electrical outlet already but didn t see one when i purchased this one
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: a long after purchase this product ha continued to flawlessly allowing me to remotely reboot my computer system and log back in when it ha locked up wemo ha also pushed out two firmware update since my original purchase showing they stand behind their product after the purchase firmware update are automatic from the app after you approve the new firmware availability update message i e no complicated step of downloading the firmware file and manually installing like most other peripheral firmware update the user interface is clear simple to use and attractive if you are using this wemo item to reboot a computer remotely and wishing to log back in to be able to log back in after powering down remotely many computer system require that you quickly press the power button on the wemo app again shortly meaning a soon a you see the power button on your wemo app change to power off to keep the computer in an on state allowing you to log back in too if i press the off button the wemo and wait too long the computer will remain in an off state even after the wemo is turned on again meaning you would then have to physically be at the computer and press the computer power button to reboot this is not a wemo issue but an issue with the computer system s bios if that s confusing think of it like this if you wait to long to power back up the wemo it is like you pushed the power off button on your computer if you cycle the wemo off on quickly within one second the computer reacts a if you instead pressed the reset button allowing the computer to remain on so if your cycling of your wemo power is with a goal to log back into your computer remotely if you don t do it quickly you re merely cut the power to your computer by turning off your wemo and the computer will remain off even when the wemo is turned back on from the app and you will be unable to log in remote because the computer will remain off
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: there wa a today s deal lightning sale on this it took a bit to get up running because of some wifi issue which wemo acknowledges and tell you the workaround but once it worked well it work cool thing 1 alexa enabled i can tell alexa to turn the switch on and off 2 android app for it i wa enable to have a timer on this thing what would have been cool is if alexa could also turn off the timer but she wa unable to recognize it so i m assuming the record keeping of the timer could only be done from wemo app you enabled it from oh well for the price i paid i m happy with it it s a good starter for somebody who doe not have any smart home appliance experience a it wa easy to use it work and it give me idea on how to alexa enable the house a i move forward with time i ll move forward with other purchase but will start looking for appliance that smart enough to turn themselves on and off via sensor and some minor programming i e turn on the outside light when the sun go down and turn it off at 10 pm
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: nerd heaven when paired with my echo updated 10 27 2017
Review: sure i could have gone with a remote control wall plug but that would have added another remote control to the pile in my bedroom and i d likely turn on the tv or stereo i could also have gone with one of those clappy device but they ve been around forever and anytime i think of those thing i picture the old lady from the original tv commercial from the 80 s no i have an amazon echo and i want to be able to say alexa turn off the light when i m ready for bed yes i named the device the light my imagination wa bored feel free to post better name in the comment if you can think of any set up wa honestly a easy a the pictograph on the card that come with the device and the instruction you scroll through after installing the wemo app even being disabled and working from a walker plus having to go hunt down the router s password it took maybe ten minute to get up and working with my echo and the switch did a firmware update while i wa in the shower i m in nerd heaven being able to tell my echo to turn on and off my bedroom light that s just too cool update for the most part the last two year have been reasonably problem free tonight for no good reason my wemo switch acted up nothing i could do would resolve thing amazon support ran me in circle it took over an hour and i had to rename my switch it wa a nightmare
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buy it if you want a cheap frustrating product that simply doesn t work a advertised
Review: this product simply doesn t work i purchase two one of them i wa able to fully setup and the second one i wa able to setup but could not enable remote access both device became not detected in the wemo app almost immediately after setting them up i restarted my router and reset the device after initally a soft reset and then a hard reset i still wa unable to get them to connect after manually turning on the device they would be detected in the wemo app for a few second enough time for me to quickly turn them and off a few time and then return to the not detected state i have other device connected to my network which work flawlessly including 2 of the amazon echo a nest thermostat and even a wemo insight switch these were very disappointing
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have two wemo plug in switch and one wemo wall switch one of the plug in switch doesn t work on a broadband connection i ve reset the device several time enabled remote access etc but it still doesn t work read through the amazon review and check out the wemo community board on the internet many complaint and low rating apparently belkin customer service is even worse this is a buggy product find another brand of wireless switch wemo switch are not worth the headache i m returning mine to amazon update well i decided to keep the switch and see if i could get them to work turns out there are a couple of thing that make thing easier first patience it take several minute for these thing to reset for the wall switch you have to push the right button followed immediately for five second until the light begin to flash by the left button both are in the front of the switch toward the bottom on the plug in switch push the button on top while inserting it into the electrical receptive and continue pushing the button until the light begin to blink in both case you then need to wait up to a couple of minute until the light begin to flash alternating color at that point the switch s wifi designation should show up on the network list on your phone connect to the switch then open the belkin wemo app and finish the set up you need to install the app before you try to set up the switch you can t set these thing up on a 802 11ac network it ha to be 892 11n also the network name ssid must be being broadcast i typically don t broadcast the ssid to set up the switch i changed the router setting to broadcast then changed it back to no broadcast after the switch were working another tip although you need the belkin app to set up the switch there is a much better app for controlling them it s available in the google play store i don t know if it s available for ios device look for wemo manager it set up a server on your phone so you don t have to use the belkin server much faster response time and the app developer is wonderful with customer service finally i have an amazon echo and i ve never had a problem with it not recognizing the switch go to the echo app in settings under connected home you can have alexa search for your device sometimes if she s being ornery you may have to ask her to search twice to pick up all of them hope this help i m still giving this product three star the switch get a four belkin s terrible customer service get a zero but i m feeling generous today so overall three star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: initial setup wa very easy plugged them in
Review: initial setup wa very easy plugged them in detected right away and i wa able to control my lamp no knock there so far i ve had it for 2 week and i already had one issue where creep up twice the device just show up a not detected by my echo or the wemo app first time i unplugged the wemo plug and plugged them back in and they started working less than 48 hour later they showed up a not detected again the issue i believe wa because my router by default ha multicast routing igmp proxy disabled a well a efficient multicast forwarding igmp snooping as soon a i enabled those my wemo device went from not detected to online and i could control them i am using an asus rt n66u router with the latest firmware a of 9 25 16 3 0 0 4 380_3831 i don t know what other issue will crop up in another 2 week but when they work they are great when they don t work you wonder if it s worth the hassle and expense this is me dipping my toe into home automation and if i have anymore issue with these simple device i ll probably wait another year or two until i invest anymore into any home automation equipment
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought another brand before buying the belkin and i had to return it a it wa impossible to set up with the belkin i wa able to connect but couldn t quite figure out how to program multiple on off setting one quick call to belkin solved the problem i love it and bought another one a well a a light switch which i have not yet had the chance to install very pleased with the product will most likely buy again
