Review: i could not get this to work with the echo it would constantly drop the wifi connection and the echo never recognized it s existence it wa a a huge let down and hour spent going through customer support and youtube video trying to get this garbage to function i would love to hear from a customer that found a suitable replacement for this piece of junk
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great potential but bad glitch in the app
Review: this is a product with great potential but unfortunately it software is pretty poor at this point i have an above average capacity for learning and using technology and have had several issue with the glitchy app and firmware when you first get into syncing the app and the outlet it will probably tell you that there are update i updated this thing exactly a the instruction said to it ran the update cycled through the power down that it warns you about and then i restarted it only to get the exact message saying that there is an update i tried to run the update on this like 3 or 4 time following the instruction exactly and it keep thinking that the firmware in the outlet is outdated also it won t let me set rule parameter for the timer function i can get into the menu to create the rule but then it never let me save them saying that it requires an update which i already tried multiple time and that it can t save at this time on top of that every now and then when you try to just use the basic on off function from the phone it will show a yellow circle and not connect for whatever reason this is not a very frequent problem but still annoying sadly the timer fucntion wa the main reason i bought this a my lamp plug in behind a dresser and i wa hoping to avoid messing with a mechanical timer that i would have to constantly lay on the floor and reach under the dresser to change i think this could be a 4 or 5 star product when they iron out the issue with the app but at the moment it s nearly unusable for me
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great with or without alexa make sure you download the correct app
Review: i bought this to help control light when i cannot easily reach them or cannot get up medical and because it can work with alexa i read the instruction which were somewhat minimal basically download the app and follow the instruction there the important point here is to look at the icon in the instruction and pick that one when you go to the app store i opened my apple app store put in wemo for the search but the one that came up looked different and cost 1 99 the one shown in the pic did not show up at all unfortunately this is not the first time this ha happened to me at the app store but then again i knew what to do i had to go online using my browser put wemo app in the search then select the apple app result and it take you right to the one shown in the set up instruction and it is free don t ask me why set up did not take too long except there wa a firmware update that did take a while to finish just put it down and come back to it i had no problem with alexa identifying and connecting to it using the alexa app under smart home the only problem i had is that i want to tell alexa to turn on the living room light but instead have to say turn on the living room wemo might be a way to change that but there is no direction for that but i am also new to alexa and need to read up more in how to work it i can play music but not much more i found that you can also control the switch through the wemo app there is a big circular computer like button that is the power button press on press off very simple i bought a second one that i plan to put in a different room so i hope that will go well too
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: wemo app need updating otherwise work well
Review: i love me some smart product so since alexa had a 20 deal i thought why not the device can in a nice package the plug itself is larger than expected sturdy and pair easily with your phone once paired work pretty seamlessly however it almost take over the entire outlet so using another plug on the outlet is difficult i have had a tp link plug and this work better plus it ha ifttt support the wemo app however need work the part of scheduling naming etc of your plug work easy enough unfortunately syncing to ifttt using the device remotely and connecting to an account are much more complicated on this app than on others it make the overall experience pretty buggy i m hoping with the new wemo mini and app improvement will make the experience a lot better
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: easy to use and convenient great for home safety too
Review: i have owned my echo for a while but hesitated to try the smart home product a i wa not sure which to select this item came up on a deal before christmas and with lot of positive review i thought it wa time to get my foot wet i have 2 unit and have both in use with light set up wa pretty easy with the downloaded app for android some slowness connecting the second unit however nothing major what i love is that i can now turn on light if we go out and i forget to leave one on i love the away mode option with random on and off when we go away this mean a lived in look to the home also what a great add on to our alarm system should if ever go off turning on light would add another incentive for anyone breaking in to just get out great product that i hope work well over time if so going to be one of my better purchase
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buggy but doe what i need
Review: 12 28 2015 it wa working well for a few week but i found some new glitch i setup mac address dhcp on my router so it would always get the same address but that caused more issue also when i reset my router one day it knocked the wemo offline and i had to do a full setup again 12 5 2015 once or twice a week it stop responding looking at the device there is a flashing light and it need to be rebooted and sometimes reconfigured my motivation behind picking the wemo wa needing a device that would turn on a lamp at sunset but would also interface with my kodi medium player running on a raspberry pi 2 the lamp ha a 40w equivalent cfl that offer enough light for getting around when the main light are off it s also in the room with the tv and if i wa watching a movie i would get up and turn off light manually being the lazy tinkerer that i am i wanted a way to automate the light kodi ha a plugin for wemo that will turn the wemo light off and on based on playback setup right away i wa unable to complete the setup it wa not connecting well to my wireless i tried their listed troubleshooting even gave customer service a call but wa offered nothing beyond the troubleshooting i already tried i finally figured out it wa my guest wireless network that wa causing the problem having two strong signal at 2 4 ghz wa causing a conflict once i turned off the guest network setup wa easy even after the setup i wa unable to enable my guest network without killing the wemo i now have my guest network on only the 5ghz band and this is not causing a problem i offered this solution to belkin customer service but the guy in india i wa talking to did not understand what i wa talking about function it work a advertised and the app is easy to use i m only using this with one wemo device in the house but overall i m very happy with it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: smart plug will eventually setup but is predisposed to lose network connectivity also response time from when a command is given and the light switch on or off is excessive this contrast sharply with the tp link smart plug which maintains connectivity and ha lightening fast response both smart plug require a 2 4 ghz network though your cell phone can remain on a 5 ghz network when controlling the plug both plug support alexa well
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works but the insight switch may be worth the extra money security tbd
Review: the device wa properly labelled with it mac address simplifying use on a wifi network that doe not broadcast it ssid and that us mac filtering to restrict access the app ha a feature to save network setting to simplify successive device setup where to the cloud just the phone the setting include security type and password this is a significant security breach if the data is anywhere other than the phone or the wifi switch nothing tell you where it is saved nor how to direct that it be forgotten there have been time where the app ha not had access to the switch e g if unplug replug the wemo switch briefly re enabling ssid broadcast can leave mac address filter in place might help with that but it may also be coincidental with time moving forward and some software action in the background that the user is not aware of the insight switch seems to be quieter when toggling power and though chunky is smaller in the sense of not being a tall
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: wemo switch i m giving this one star because although they do work the app and the setup is a nightmare i purchase 2 of these to use with my amazon echo and no the echo is not the problem 1 the wemo app is crap it only a few step but getting the app to find the device and your router is very difficult 2 if you have a android phone you have to disable wi fi setting so the app can get through the second step and if your successful the first try good for you 3 i had to run the setup several time for each device to get mine to work 1 to 1 5 hour 4 after all that and you finally get your device connected the app will ask you to update the device firmware witch i thought at the time would be a good thing the only problem is when it start the update it only found the 1st device and never try to update the 2nd after it finish the app will ask you every time you open it to update firmware i m afraid to unplug 1 device to get them both updated they may not work when i plug them back in note like all electronic device always use a surge protector a brown out or storm could fry your investment
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great product when paired with an amazon echo
Review: i ve ready many review of belkin s wemo product which were not all that flattering i too had some issue a few year back but i have to say that a lot of these bug have been squashed since 2013 as for the many other issue that are current 2016 i have been fortunate to not have them i decided to pick up the switch smart plug to supplement my amazon echo which so far ha been great setting up the device didn t go the first time but a quick unplug and start the process over took care of it the needed wemo app needed to set up ha much matured in the backend but the user interface ha pretty much remained the same it s easy to use and not difficult to get around for the most part you set it an forget it i ve had a few wemo device running for over a year and i haven t had any issue so i m hoping the switch will do the same it s my opinion that while on it s own work wonderfully especially on vacation mode or simply setting timer for daily cycle it s further enhanced when paired with the amazon echo essentially giving it the ability to use voice command this pair i would highly recommend as for an individual product it doe well but it s still a bit pricey for a switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: doesn t work well with alexa half the time alexa
Review: doesn t work well with alexa half the time alexa won t recognize it then you ask her 5 min later and it work needs some updating
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: potentially nice product ruined by terrible app
Review: this could would should be a nice product sadly the app make this product bad if not downright unusable for most people it is riddled with lock ups crash poorly designed ui and even force you to relaunch the app to setup device the setup process is just a tutorial it took a ridiculous amount of try on multiple device to get this to work fortunately once your device are discovered and setup it seems to work pretty well and flawlessly with amazon s alexa my tip use an older device or rather older version of android with an older version of the app so if you re using an amazon tablet for once amazon s delay in updating android version and app version is in your favor belkin have done a terrible job not only with giving needed update but also giving update that actually make the app better or more usable frankly if i were to buy another smart outlet it would be another tp link while the plug is not a pretty a the wemo a it at least work without any problem and they have done a very good job with their app furthermore they are generally a couple dollar cheaper tp link wi fi smart plug works with amazon alexa controls your electronics from anywhere hs100
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have multiple other wemo device that work just fine but the two of these i got on the bf special will absolutely not connect to my network i ve tried different router and different phone both android and iphone 7 and i figure an hour of messing around with them to no avail is enough update i had a friend that ha zero wemo device try to set up and he wa successful and able to update the firmware which then allowed me to connect to my network clearly you don t want it talking to other device if the firmware are not in sync what a pita
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i installed this once and it worked ok but i had to move it because i wanted something else plugged into it after moving it i could not get it to link to my wifi nor alexa i had to call the company because there were no troubleshooting instruction of what to do if xyz happens the girl on the phone walked me very slowly and deliberately through the whole process of rebooting the plug and getting it set up easy peezy then wish that had been in the direction a i could have done it myself have not had a problem ever since and i have even lost my internet connection several time since due to weather etc i do wonder though how is this really any different or better than a run of the mill timer cons it s big take up 1 2 a normal sized power strip or an entire outlet difficult to reboot pros love telling alexa to turn on and off
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great in general but need reset every week or two
Review: i bought this to work with my amazon echo and to voice control one lamp the setup wa pretty easy but you need to follow the instruction once set up alexa can control the switch there is maybe a one second delay but that s fine i really like the switch but it just loses connection every one or two week and i need to reset the device and start all over this is somewhat frustrating also it will not detect or connect to your 5g home wireless it still work even when alexa is on the 5g but i have no idea how but here is what i did connect to wemo switch using your phone it will ask for a wifi i gave it my 2 4g wifi network and password i have time warner and both network come with the router once it connected there the app switched me back to my 5g wifi on the phone for whatever reason alexa wa also able to find and control the light even though it should be on a different network so yeah no idea how it work but it doe i hope that make sense just bought a second switch but from a different seller this one i could not make work at all for whatever reason it doe not connect to the network and keep timing out with password incorrect for my wifi i tried on both ios and android reset the switch a few time but no success hoping that belkin support can help update belkin support wa really great they called me and we did troubleshooting over the phone my issue second switch cannot connect to wifi wa resolved by unplugging the first switch during the setup of the seconomy switch everything work properly now very happy and huge thank you to belkin support
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great once set up is done
Review: i have 2 of these controlling different light in my home via echo they work great once you get them set up however the direction are lacking and setup is not a easy a it could be i would have given 5 star had instruction been better i had to google to find answer to some of my question and i actually found the answer in amazon review not the wemo website one thing i wa unaware of wa how to reset the switch one of the switch stopped working and i simply could not get it to pair with my amazon echo after researching online it wa recommended to reset the switch and restart the pairing process the reset restore button is on the very top of the switch above the pair button and light here are the direction to restore once i figured this out i can quickly get the plug repaired when needed fyi i have only had to do this 2 time so it is not frequent that they go down here are the reset instruction step 1 unplug your wemo step 2 hold down the restore button labeled on the top step 3 while holding the restore button down plug the wemo into a power outlet and continue to hold the button down for at least 15 second step 4 release the restore button it should take about 45 second for the wemo to restore and reboot it will blink blue and amber when finished
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: this is not a finished product
Review: this is not a finished product it is completely hit or miss a to whether it will work and is very finicky depending on your network hardware setting etc in troubleshooting support will tell you thing like you need to remove any special character from your wifi key and make sure your router is on channel 1 or 9 what kind of device force you to re architect your network around them i had one of these that actually worked well when i first installed it so i bought a second one that second one work locally but will not pair with my amazon echo or work from outside my home network it ha been very frustrating i ve spent probably 6 hour troubleshooting it and talking to their support and am about ready to give up and ship it back it s probably the first time i ve had to do that normally with enough finagling i can get these type of thing working anyway i do not recommend this product and eagerly await something more stable hitting the market belkin and wemo should be ashamed of themselves for selling this a it is
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: we have had two of these for about 6 month now and just got our third they are easy to set up read the direction first though set up is not completely intuitive they function well we have never had a failure to function and work with multiple device and platform we use the iftt software and alexa to do thing like light turn on at sunrise light turn on when alexa alarm go off light turn on or off when our cell phone connect or disconnect from our wifi we re arriving or leaving home and of course we use alexa to verbally turn the light on or off if the wifi on off system doesn t work it s always worked but if someone else leaf our house after we have for instance we can easily use the app on our phone to make sure electricity is not being wasted the app also allows u to set up vacation mode so it appears a if we are home when we are not we are now entertaining getting more for thing other than light might even get their crock pot
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the belkin wemo switch is simple easy and it integrates flawlessly with the amazon echo
Review: set up and use of this smart plug is flawless the belkin wemo app is simple and the set up instruction are quick and easy to follow once the smart plug is set up it can be turned on and off through the app anywhere there is an internet connection my favorite part is that you can add photo and a name to each plug this is the device of this type that i have owned so i can t compare it to others like it but i can t image any other being much better the wemo switch also work perfectly with the amazon echo and there wa virtually no set up alexa automatically detected the device and i can turn it on or off by name depending on your budget they aren t exactly cheap but once you realize the benefit and convenience of owning a smart device it s worth it i have already purchased a second one and i plan on adding more smart device to my home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use wemo for home automation and connecting to amazon echo when working with all network device you may or may not encounter issue what i do is some research in case i run into issue here are some of my note reset wemo resetting or restoring your wemo device to it original setting may be required in the following scenario setup ha failed the router setting have been changed the wemo device is not detected by the wemo app the wemo device is not detected by the wemo app after firmware update the wemo device is blinking blue after firmware update forget wifi your android device may not reconnect to the wemo if the wemo ha no internet so you need to forget or delete the wemo wifi connection to delete a saved wifi network from your phone or tablet all you need to do is go to the wifi section of your setting menu find the network you want to get rid of long press it then chose forget router if you haven t upgraded to a new wireless router in a few year you might want to seriously consider it that old router may still be working but newer one will give you better wi fi new wireless router support new wireless networking standard that offer higher speed and le interference you aren t getting everything your new laptop smartphones tablet tv streaming box game console and other network connected device have to offer if you re using an outdated router that s why thing like streaming netflix in hd over wi fi just aren t possible if you re using too old a router wifi signal check your signal strength the performance of a wi fi wireless network connection depends in part on signal strength between a computer and wireless access point the signal strength in each direction determines the data rate available on that connection troubleshooting check out wemo support article troubleshooting your wemo connection to the wi fi network issues check out wemo support article common issue with wemo device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: after a dozen attempt to set up i finally connected to wi fi it work a advertised with one exception my switch only function if it is in the same room a my router otherwise it say out of range unfortunately i bought this to use in another room on another floor i had to use two ipads and my kindle to finally set up connect to wi fi what if i did not have a kindle it actually helped more than the ipad another area of frustration wa this download the wemo app ok which one the green app or the pinkish app i see both but i could not locate both in the app store i could only download the green one on my ipads iphone and kindle all device now operate my switch and the rule i created were successful four star i like it perseverance paid off i deducted one star for the cumbersome connection and confusing app selection belkin doe not control my wi fi strength but it can specify which app i select i have not even attempted to install my light switch yet downstairs i fear that it may be out of range a well so avoid the aggravation i m thinking
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great way fo control a c unit when travelling
Review: we purchased two wemo switch one for each 120 volt air conditioner in a smaller condo unit once installed these work very well allowing u to turn the a c on early when returning from travel getting the att uverse modem to recognize the unit wa not so easy three port on the modem must be open port 80 http port 110 pop3 port 443 ssl thanks to my son and his engineering friend at work i learned about these modem port one note if the power shuts off storm or otherwise the wemo switch may not recognize the internet command without a reset this ha only happened once to date
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought 4 of these to work with my new amazon echo do to some user error on my part the installation took longer than i had hoped the key is to install the we mo app on your phone 1st and sync all of them with that app before attempting to link them to your echo once i got it all set up i can now turn light on and off using a voice command while at home and i can control the light from anywhere that i have a connection to wifi or to a cell tower handy for turning the light on before arriving home at night i love it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i thought they had gone bad but not so fast
Review: im using several of the wemo switch and all seem to work well however on occasion they will have to be reprogrammed after a power failure depending on the length of the outage on one occasion two of my switch simply wouldnt come back even after factory reset i thought they had gone bad but not so fast i saved them in a drawer and after getting a new cell phone and installing an updated version of the app they came back my fault for not uninstalling and reinstalling the app on the older device it wa recommended if factory reset failed all in all im very happy with the product i own 2 switch 1 insight switch which work well for showing power consumption and just ordered one of the new mini s thanks belkin ps these work great for turning xmas light on and off both indoors and out so you dont freeze your backside off just to plug in your light
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this device ha possibility you can remotely connect from anywhere using the app you can set timer for auto on auto off it can connect to alexa and use your voice to turn on any device you plug in to it it connects to your wifi and you name the device that s connected it s so simple to use i bought three now the only problem is it doesn t stay connected you would constantly have to unplug it and start the connection process constantly at first i thought it wa my wifi not being a strong enough signal but that wa not the case then i thought it wa my echo not staying connected but from other review you will see it is a defect with this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i love these i wa concerned about them loosing connectivity or just not working properly i have now installed 7 of them throughout my house and 4 month later they are all working wonderfully i have had zero problem with them they can be a little finicky to install but then they are golden i would still highly recommend i plan to update again in a few month my original review from early december 2015 is below i ordered one of these to operate my living room floor lamp it took a small amount of time following the included instruction and following online advice from some reputable source after that it wa a piece of cake i have gotten two more to use echo to turn on and off the christmas tree the floor lamp and now a table lamp so cool and the kid love it the last one i had set up and in the system in mere minute the wemo switch is a great product it ha definitely enhanced our amazon echo and no more trying to find the lamp switch in the dark now we just use a voice command to turn it on i finally feel like we are living in the future i also love that i can use them independently with the echo without having to purchase a separate hub like most other product require i did get one that i had to return because it came dead on arrival but i think that wa more an issue with the third party seller than the product and amazon promptly refunded my money so i could get a replacement so far i am very pleased
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have four of these in my house and let me just say they work the only issue i have is that i can t really find a whole lot of use for them when i m not away on vacation my house isn t huge but am i really at a stage of laziness that i can t get up to turn a light switch versus sitting on the couch and doing it from an app thankfully no the app ha become better and better a time go by which show an active support from belkin in making sure it doesn t become an antique the android app even ha a widget toggle button now what can sometimes be helpful is to set up static ip address for each plug so that if you lose power your router will find them more easily it s also compatible with many voice control system good product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: warning for galaxy s4 galaxy note owner
Review: warning for galaxy s4 galaxy note owner the wemo android app may not work on those device for the initial set up i bought the wemo switch this week so i could remotely control a heat lamp for a rescue cat who recently adopted me i am often away from home in winter and don t leave any heat on in my home which the cat us via a cat door this switch sounded like a great idea and after reading about the incredibly easy setup i wa anticipating getting this up and running in no time after about 4 hour of incredibly frustrating trial and error trying to set this up i finally threw in the towel and called belkin support the customer service rep had me repeat everything i had already done which wa basically just to follow the direction but to no avail finally she asked me what kind of phone i wa using and when i said it wa a galaxy s4 she put me on hold for a few minute then came back on and asked if i could use a different phone huh no it s the only phone i own she then told me there wa an issue with the setup being run from an s4 and if i could find a different phone to do the setup with i then shouldn t have any problem using my s4 to operate it so that night i borrowed my girlfriend s iphone and ran the setup it got past the point where my s4 had been failing starting the app after connecting the wemo wifi signal did nothing but show me the setup instruction over and over again but failed to activate the remote control after a bunch more trial and error i found that i had to change my wifi router setting it didn t like wpa2 security with tkip and aes so i changed it to wpa2 with aes only and it finally worked i then tried operating it with my s4 and it worked fine now that it s finally set up it work great i have a foscam ip camera in the room where the cat sleep so i can log on remotely and see if he s there then pan over to a thermometer to see how cold it s getting if it s getting cold i turn on the heat lamp for him it s great fun this is a great little device that so far is working flawlessly and if setup had been a easy a all the advertising said it wa going to be i d be giving this 5 star but it wa a royal pain in the a to set up mostly because belkin failed to provide a decent set of instruction with an explanation of known setup issue and incompatibility with certain device had they communicated those issue to me i couldn t even find it in their faq or troubleshooting section of the website it would have saved me a lot of time and frustration hopefully they ll resolve this issue with a new version of the app
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve been wanting to make my home smart however i rent i didn t want to invest in hardwired item switch and plug that i would either leave behind or uninstall and replace everything i wanted something easy to take with me as i looked at different option i found that almost all item needed a bridge that s when i came across wemo i purchased a single switch for my bedroom light i also purchased an amazon echo dot the wemo came first and wa easy to set up and using it alone wa simple i downloaded the app plugged it in and turned my bedside light on and off from my phone when i m not home for a while i turn it on off to give the appearance someone is home when echo arrived it wa also very simple to integrate the two now i can either tell alexa to control it when i m home and still have the remote ability a well my only issue is the profile it s a rather large so when you plug an item in it will protrude out quite a bit so don t plan to push any furniture flush to the wall it s a small sacrifice for the convenience i m looking forward to adding to my wemo collection to increase my home automation it delivers at a great price point no need for a bridge and compatible with any smart phone and echo definitely deserves consideration if you are stayingt home automation but don t can t purchase expensive starter pack i would recommend to family friend
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well once it s finally configured be patient
Review: i bought two of these discounted in a deal of the day promotion they work well and i would have given them five start except they are not a easy to configure a indicated i use android device and they had an annotation on the instruction sheet to take specific step to disable certain network action while configuring the device the instruction on their web site did not match the current android configuration short story is plan to call wemo customer service to get help with configuration i am quite computer savvy but in this case i needed help
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: 2nd update wemo customer service fixed the problem android phone data must be turned off settings mobile data under bluetooth off this allows the app to connect with the switch all work now minus one star because i couldn t find this answer online update it s an app fail my first 2 year switch disconnected i tried to connect it and the app wouldn t connect it android app shame the plug is now useless original i received one of these a a gift it connected perfectly and still work today after 2 year of moderate use i ordered another one and the plug will not connect to the app this step ha nothing to do with the router it is a plug to app problem in the end i made the decision to return it controlling the outlet really isn t worth the hour it would take to troubleshoot replacement i don t really need to control the outlet enough to take the chance of another dud 3 star is the average of a working unit and a non working unit
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a gadget that turns your cell phone into a remote light switch and more
Review: as a security system i purchased 3 of these device because i wanted to be able to remotely turn 3 separate lamp on and off with a cell phone application app when my family and i are not at home for one or more day this switch come with a quick installation guide however it wa over simplistic for my taste accordingly here is how i installed the device 1 i plugged the lamp into an outlet and manually turned it on 2 i plugged in the wemo switch to my wall outlet and plugged the lamp cord into the wemo switch 3 i opened the play store app on my samsung cell phone and typed in wemo on the search engine selected bekin s free app downloaded it to my cell phone installed it and moved the wemo icon to my cell phone home page 4 i selected the settings app on my cell phone turned off my bluetooth setting and turned on my wi fi setting 5 i tapped the wi fi icon again to view all available wi fi network and waited for my wap wireless access point to locate wemo device software 6 still viewing my wi fi setting screen on my cell phone i selected the wemo network 7 next i selected the wemo icon on my cell phone homepage and waited for it to notify me that the wemo switch wa connected to my wap and then selected the program option to save those installation setting 8 i followed the same procedure to install my other 2 wemo device to my wap and cell phone and then selected the option to install the latest update for the app the wemo app come with a drop down menu list that includes o edit device o setup instructions o remote access o connect to ifttt if this then that programming o tell us what you think o help center o settings about when you open the wemo app there is an icon for each wemo switch and a place containing the name of each device that can be edited from the drop down menu at the top of the screen to the right of the name of the device is an icon depicting an on off button touch that icon and it becomes circled and highlighted in green indicating that the associated electrical device plugged into the wemo switch my lamp ha been turned on touch it again and the button icon change to gray and black indicating that you turned the lamp switch off currently listed at 39 99 each these device may seem a bit pricey however my remote use of them a a home security system make them very cost effective over the long haul when compared to an alternative home security service additionally when it is dark outside it is very convenient to turn the light on from a remote location and not have to stumble around turning light on in an otherwise dark home i am thrilled with this product and bet you will too
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: does what i need it to do
Review: we have 6 of these and love them they help u turn on the light when we are out of town and turn them off if we are in bed and don t want to get up we use them for lamp in our room and by the front door it make it look like you are home when you re not and allows you to come home to a house that isn t in complete darkness if your internet isn t the best sometimes these wont show up in your app so make sure you have the streaming available to do everything you want to do i have had a few of these for over a year bought 2 new one to expand my collection a bit bulky but doe what i want it to do
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i would not recommend this product
Review: well what can i say i wanted to like this and this is the first smart home plug i have ever owned i wa using it through my echo from the start it wa trouble like a new puppy peeing everywhere this plug just would not cooperate it would take it time to switch on and the same with switching off sometimes it would not do either at all now i did think to myself that maybe it alexa that is being the bad doggie but no i also have two of these tp link wi fi smart plug works with amazon alexa controls your electronics from anywhere hs100 and they work flawlessly now a i have said i am new to smart home technology but after giving this plug approx 10 day to make itself at home i had to give up i would not recommend this product not sure if it just my house a it doe get some great review but it certainly did not work for me pity
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: we have a different switch for our living room light and that when you actually say alexa turn off the living room light so i fi
Review: i purchase this in a bundle with the wemo switch for my husband who ha been complaining that our bedroom light is not on the alexa lol the first day we received it he said it up immediately by plugging it into the outlet and then downloaded an application for his phone which help you control it and sync it up to your amazon echo within minute he had it up and running however when alexis search for it even though it s listed a bedroom light you can t just tell alexa to turn off the bedroom light you have to tell her to turn off the quote unquote light we have a different switch for our living room light and that when you actually say alexa turn off the living room light so i find this to be a little weird however we only have one switch right now so if that s fine though it may pose a problem when we have multiple switch have them to the location
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use this in conjunction with alexa it work great when it s working i don t know whether to blame the alexa app or the wemo app every once in a while alexa will say sorry i couldn t find a device or group named _______ in your account in the alexa app it say offline for that particular device however i can still control it manually through the wemo app which show that it s still connected to my wifi this make me believe it s more of an alexa issue but i m no tech wiz trying to forget the device in the alexa app and then trying to discover new device doe not work after a period of time usually the next day everything is working fine again i would definitely have given 5 star if it were not for this glitch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: 2 wemo device for several year and have been happy with them
Review: i own 2 wemo device for several year and have been happy with them i bought 2 more to use at different location and could not set them up when i called technical support for the product they advised that you could not control device at different location with the same ios or android app has something to do with the wifi setup they said so you can control your wemos from anywhere it seems but not when they are in multiple location unless you control there with different cellphone or tablet for each location a rather poor and unexpected product limitation i d say the 2 new one i bought need to go back because of this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the future of home automation are you kidding me
Review: succeeded in connecting this plug switch to the wemo network got to the point where the wifi credential are entered in the app and down the hill from there the app could never complete the setup due to loosing connection yet it look like the switch itself might have acquired the setting because it would stop advertising it own wemo network however it could not be located on the network that it wa getting connected to reset repeat same thing spent 30 minute with belkin s tech support to no avail was told it must be a hardware problem returning with no plan to replace the android app by the way is atrocious wrote a separate review on that in the play store beware consumer this is a beta product you are considering two start because it doe work a a dumb outlet switch at least you got that piece working belkin
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: simple design and so many us
Review: i bought this little guy almost three year ago when it wa still cutting edge i paid a pretty penny for it and debated quite a bit a i wondered it it would really be worth while or if it wa just an extravagant indulgence these type of switch are an indulgence but i will say i ve used this far more often than i would have expected and it s still going strong i m pleased i purchased it and am back to buy a few more one of my favorite us is the sunset timer with a traditional timer plug you have to specify the exact hour it will turn on and off with this i can set the time via the app on my iphone to auto adjust you can use an offset too based on the sunset i ve used this with decorative christmas tree lava lamp fairy light in lantern hard to reach switch etc i love that i can set up rule to turn it on and off and not have to worry about it i ve never had any problem with either the switch or the app this is a well designed product and easy to use app
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i love these thing have them about the house with various light fixture have no problem been able to turn light on off from 2000 mile away i know i had a friend in the house to check only thing to drive you crazy is first use there must be four plus downloads of upgrade to the device and that take time bit of an update while on vacation i received a notice on my app that a firmware update wa available now being over 1 000 mile from home i had a concern but did the download anyway and to my surprise and gratification all went off well i had a friend stop by just to see if the lamp connected did go on off and complete success some may have issue but these work well for me i use an iphone 5 with latest os
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: very nice but a bit slow
Review: a very good plug quite large but i m sure that will be changed a the technology develops firmware upgrade wa needed immediately and hung for quite some time but eventually installed there is an audible click when turning it on and off via wifi which most likely ha to do with the physical switch works well my amazon echo but is very slow i have lifx wifi bulb that turn on off with 1 second delay usually not even noticeable the wemo switch will take anywhere form 3 10 second on average
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great now needs to be at a better price point and i will buy more need to better communicate firmware download status
Review: if a company could mfg and sell these thing for 10 15 a piece i believe they would sell ton more while the convenience of this device is nice the actual value in comparison to the cost is not there to friend and relative you look lazy when you spend 30 40 to get one of these if it wa 10 15 you would look smart and they would want one a well that being said this device work great now when i first purchased it i connected it to an outlet installed the app on my phone connected from the phone to this switch and got it on my wifi similar to setting up a chrome cast but the similarity would end there once on my wifi the app on my phone would find the switch and when i went to configure it the app told me that the firmware on the switch needed updated that made sense to me a the switch had probably been on a shelf due to price point and many firmware version had probably been released since it wa originally programmed so naturally you would tap the upgrade firmware button right i tried several time however the button wa grayed out a if something else needed to be completed before it could be tapped so i looked for indication that something else needed to be done i found nothing not in the manual not in the app i did go online and found many others complaining about the same thing and lot who just sent it back i decided to check the mfg page and see what i could find there it took me some time but i found an article that suggested that the switch itself that once connected to the wifi would go out and download the firmware on it own and that this could take some time that seemed to fit the scenario that i wa in so i decided to reset the switch to default and start again this time when i got to the app notification about the firmware and i let the switch sit plugged in i left it this way for several hour incase the download wa large i checked back and nothing still no update i got frustrated uninstalled the app and intended to return the switch a defective the switch stayed plugged in for about 3 day and i decided to give it one more shot this time i installed the app on the phone it found the switch and lo and behold the firmware update button wa not grayed out i tapped it the switch updated rebooted and ha been working fine ever since it seems the disconnect is communicating firmware device status from the switch to the app had i known it wa doing something i would have let it sit and attempted to update when the status indicated the firmware had downloaded being that there wa no indication of download status i wa left to believe nothing wa happening
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not so easy to set up
Review: this is my first smart home device the first time i set it up it said that it failed to connect and then after that the wemo wireless network i wa supposed to connect to in order to set it up wa no longer available i had to look up online how to reset the device then i went through the process again and i got the same error message wemo ha lost contact with your device but then i went on and sure enough it was connected after all after that the device worked perfectly i then enabled the wemo skill for alexa and linked the two together that process went through without a hitch i am now able to turn the lamp plugged into the switch on and off by speaking to my spot however the instruction included with this device were laughably inadequate i think perhaps the idea is to not give you much instruction a a way of suggesting that this thing is brain dead easy to hook up but it didn t work for me and i had to go online to belkin s website and search for the device then search the faqs in order to find out how to reset it and start over there wa no help available in the wemo app on my iphone either i would have been a lot more impressed if there had been a page of instruction on how to set it up along with a troubleshooting link straight to the right page on their website to solve problem with it having to go to the belkin website and search for the troubleshooting instruction wa clunky most people might not bother why is it that so many thing you buy today force you to do research on the internet just to use them what s wrong with written instruction i will come back and update my review after a couple of week to see if the device stay connected meanwhile based on this one experience i would be inclined to look at other brand for my next smart device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: they are awesome when they don t
Review: sometimes they work sometimes they don t when they work they are awesome when they don t no comment postable i bought 5 of these for an elderly parent to enable her to safely turn light on off throughout her home i bought 4 of these for myself to replace aging non working timer and to use a a morning alarm clock wake to light rather than noise for the first 6 9 month life wa lovely however recently that is not the way it is in each home some of the wemo s work some of them don t and it s not always the same one that work or not since it ha been more than a year since some of these were purchased returning them is not an option at 50 a pop i m out about 450 plus hour and hour of time plus additional 75 for wi fi extender which did nothing to help the situation i have done everything possible to try to get these back to a stable working condition i have spent hour and hour and hour resetting the wemo unit reinstalling the wemo apps making major change to the wi fi network new ssid new password new frequency etc and yes that mean all device that use the wi fi had to be reset to the new information all to no avail i ve read through other review and the link provided by belkin support lead to a page that is no longer in service i have posted to the belkin cares twitter and community forum belkin does not care i suggest you purchase at your own risk
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: wemo switch periodically reset since i purchased on jan 15th 2015 i had the product for four month now may 12th and wish i hadn t purchased the product the switch disconnect from router even though router show connected and i get the blinking orange light the latest instance will not allow the wifi on my android device to recognize the switch even though i can pick up one bar signal on about seven house in the neighborhood so know it is not the phone wifi let the switch plugged in for day but no luck with the reset sometimes the switch will autocorrect itself this is not one of them i feel that the wifi on the switch ha gone out when it wa working it worked well a had the unit to turn on at sunset and off at sunrise i have spent way too much time on this crappy product trying to get it to work since it wa purchased do not purchase
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have three of these unit when they work they are great they will work fine for several month then a firmware upgrade happens and it ll be a struggle to get these unit back online one would not work at all and after hour with tech support the agreed that it wa bad but i couldn t return them via tech support i needed to call customer support to date i have not been able to get through to customer support to get an rma i also have wemo insight switch it ha also failed so out of 4 unit 50 have stopped working terrible product terrible support stay away 5 1 14 contacted wemo per the comment posted to this review and arranged for a replacement unit when i asked about replacing my defective insight switch i wa told i needed to call tech support and have them first verify that the unit is bad after it s verified then and only then will belkin be willing to discus sending out a replacement unit talked to the first level manager who could do nothing they claim they aren t able to provide a technical evaluation of the item that s fine but they should change their name from customer service to shipping department because they provide no service at all asked to speak with the manager s manager to make a long story short after 40 minute on the phone with belkin i finally have rma number i provided my creditcard info to guarantee return of the defective unit and they are cross shipping replacement for both unit so far i ve spend over 3 hour on the phone with belkin tech support and customer service 9 14 14 it took several month for them to cross ship my replacement unit got them installed and they worked for a few week but currently all 4 unit are not visible on my iphone my original review stand terrible product terrible support stay away do not use if they offer to pay you money to use them
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: needs password protection from your kid
Review: i would love to give this 5 star but the the app interface need some work pros this is an absolutely fabulous device plug it in launch the app and it connects just like that the app is easy to use i ve got it hooked up to my bedroom lamp and i can turn them off remotely or set timer for them cons it took my 16 year old son 30 second to download the app and connect to the wemo outlet see the pro above he then started turning my lamp on and off and on and off and started to set on off timer to turn my lamp on at 2 am there is no method in the app for authenticating who can control the outlet from the app to prevent kid from messing with you there is a section in the app setting called remote access that list my son s phone with an on off toggle making it look like i can bar his access but toggling it off didn t do anything not to mention that the app installed on his phone had my phone listed with an on off toggle making it look like he could bar my access i realize that most people would want to leave password protection off so that a family could turn off household light but i think it would be extremely helpful to make the user interface more secure
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have two of these that replaced lamp timer in the ios app you can set them up to turn on at sunset then off at a specific time e g 11 30pm you can add another setting to turn on at a specific time e g 5 00am and turn off at sunrise so i have lamp set up to light up the house when it s dark outside if you want it on outside of that time you can use the app but i use my echo dot alexa turn lamp on pro tip set up outlet per the app then do alexa discover device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this product work great when it work i wa amazed on how cheap this product wa the ability to control electricity with a command of your voice this reminded me of a time when the clapper wa very popular i had owned an amazon echo for the longest time and all i really did with it wa just listen to music check the weather or set my alarm clock never would i thought to control the light in my room and game tv anything that required an outlet this will require you to have wifi in your house in order for wemo to work now if you have a crappy wifi make sure you change it out and get an extender or a good access point were the wemo ha strong connectivity like i said it work well when it doe i replaced all of my access point i have very strong signal in all of my room and i still have issue with it working again i don t know if it is my house that is the issue but i did spend well over few hundred dollar replacing everything in my house to get this to work and i think now it not me it maybe the wemo right now it 50 50 for me
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa
