Review: i bought a couple of these switch one is used to turn on a lamp in my living room at sundown and off at bedtime works great and i have it connected to my amazon echo so can use my voice to turn it on or off manually the second one is in the kitchen and i use it to turn on a mini crockpot an hour before i get up so it will cook my oatmeal that s great except the wi fi doesn t connect reliably where i want to use it the signal is good for my phone but the antenna in the wemo switch isn t a good i guess so i have the crock pot set up at a le desirable outlet so if you are going to use these consider how far they are from your router they are great but not infallible
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great with ifttt but oem app is clunky and difficult
Review: the lamp in my entry hallway is plugged into this unit and i use two ifttt recipe one to turn it on at sunset and one to turn it off at sunrise i also set up an ifttt recipe so i can turn the lamp on or off using my google home for those dark day when you need the light on before sunset the wemo app for android is clunky and difficult to use thankfully after initial setup you don t need to use the app for automated task that can be handled by ifttt
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: had to change wifi setup not new purchase
Review: we had to reprogram our wifi on this plug we bought it a few year ago but centurylink sent u a new modem router and we had to change our wifi network we had problem doing this even after following your instruction for changing this so we called your customer service 3 time we could not understand them at all they barely spoke english and they could barely understand u or me just trying to spell my last name which really easy you have got to get your customer service rep back in the state or at least teach them english we had to hang up all 3 time and we finally did it our self which brings me to this review since you think i just bought this plug when this plug work correctly it s great when you have to talk to a customer service rep or even tech your service suck
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: straightforward installation and work a advertised but not entirely happy with the app
Review: i bought this to replace a orbivo switch which would work in the home on our network but would not work when away from home on other network i bought one in the us to operate a light there a a trial and it worked fine when at home on our network and when on public network so when we came back to the uk i bought this and set it up set up wa relatively easy and it is working well except that in setting the app up on my phone it search for device on your network first of all and wipe out access to other device you may have on other network so i have lost access to the wemo in the us which is disappointing i had expected that once i had a dece connected to the app it would stay there anyway the device in the uk work well on all network i suppose that i can set up another wemo account on a different device maybe a tablet when we get back to the us but that complicates matter my application well my power company require monthly gas reading so i set up a cheap camera and light in the meter cupboard to turn on when a meter is required i then note down the digit and turn off the light and camera time they had a remote way of reading the gas meter a they already do with the electric meter
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: because i have discovered that the wemo switch doe not work good with the rule
Review: i m modifying my rating from 5 star to 3 because i have discovered that the wemo switch doe not work good with the rule i have worked with tech support and followed several of the post on belkin s support page and i can get one rule working but not both belkin support continues to ask you to jump through a 8 to 12 step reset process and then re setup and reprogram the device to get it to work that process did work for the first rule but the second rule still fails even if it worked the fact that this is what is considered a normal procedure for any time you add a rule or make a change to your wireless router is insane the device work great with amazon echo but i m hoping they fix the rule problem and wifi change problem asap if not i will be buying the tp link device next they have much better rating
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: easy to understand setup i just had a problem get it connected to my network my ipad saw it fine but the network connect step with password entry never appeared moved closer to router and i breezed through setup and i wa up and running quickly the switch is actually located farther away and through a wall away from the spot my first setup failed to connect with the router i have it controlling a grow light in the greenhouse it come on 30 minute before sunset and then turn off later in the evening also if it is a real cloudy dark day i can turn the light on from wherever i am with my ipad or iphone it work fine with amazon echo alexa turn on the greenhouse light okay now the test of time will be the final trial
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: but there are worse thing in life
Review: wemo switch it is bulky so it does cover the other outlet this is the reason for 4 star instead of 5 but there are worse thing in life and hey i am able to turn stuff on and off remotely also it is compatible with echo alexa so overall i would recommend this product wemo light switch it took me a while to install it because i needed to buy wire connector or so i thought apparently it come with wire connector so i hate myself for wasting time and money the video instruction were very helpful i installed it myself with no problem it suck though that i wa able to install it only in the kitchen which ha a neutral wire required but could not install it in the hallway because for some reason that location doe not have a neutral wire too bad that wa my first location choice again it is compatible with echo alexa so overall i would recommend this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i have several of these and wa initially very pleased with them
Review: i have several of these and wa initially very pleased with them but now they are becoming more and more unreliable do not connect to anything that you are depending on they become non functioning with the app indicating not detected if the switch is on when it go out it remains on and the manual button will not function if they are off when they malfunction they will remain off and the manual button will not function i have sent problem report to belkin and hoping they will resolve these issue but i am not optimistic the idea is great but the execution is not there regardless of what is said it ha nothing to do with your wifi or the distance from your router i have checked all aspect of this notion ps to get them up and running again just unplug from power source and plug back in you do not have to factory reset them and go through the activation process all over again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: got this on sale but wished i would have waited for one of the mini s currently have 4 of the plug and one switch overall i like the concept but the product could use some improvement to keep up with competition easy to set up and i like the app and the set up for the vacation mode for when we travel also like the capability of accessing via alexa some of the draw back are that the switch only work on a single plug and not a multi switch set up also would like to see the ability to use plug on different network but with the same app right now i can t use these in our vacation home unless i set them up on a different ios device can t use just one device for both location
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: very nice switch to easily automate your home
Review: this the third one of these i have bought i m still an infant when it come to the whole connected home thing but i am happy with these switches they work really well and they allowed me to automate a couple of lamp and a radiator the lamp turn on when i wake up and off 5 minute after i leave for work and the radiator turn on 1 hour before i wake up to keep my bathroom toasty for when i jump in the shower setup is really easy through the wemo app and because they connect to your wifi the can be controlled from anywhere from your phone which is a big plus and they do not need a hub to work which is nice also the wemo app used to be buggy but there have been several update in the last year or so that have made the app much more stable which is nice you can set up basic rule like on off at a given time or day of the week and you can also create rule with ifttt although their effectiveness is somewhat hit and miss i had a rule to turn on my light at dusk but after a while they either came on way too early or late enough that i wa already too dark in my home to see comfortably another minor annoyance is how big those thing are i have seen some new smart switch announced in ces that essentially should do the same thing and they are easily half the size which mean they don t stand out a much big and bulky is not something i like in my technology at least not in tech like this which is supposed to work behind the scene so to speak and not be obvious or apparent that you even have it on the plus side of ifttt wemo switches are now compatible with a whole host of other connected device such a the nest thermostat so that you can create rule that for example allow you to turn on or off light and at the same time rise or lower the temperature in your home based on certain parameter you set this is very cool but in my opinion it is still in it infancy ifttt rule are often not very flexible and i hope that in the future they ll become a lot more useful and flexible all in all i really like these switch i will like them even more if they can make them smaller and if there is better result when using ifttt rule
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this device is great i don t understand why it get the bad rep here on amazon if your network is configured properly you patiently set up the device and you don t stick this on something that s a mile away from your router you ll be fine i use this for my window air conditioner a i unfortunately do not have a home with central air i can turn my air conditioner on an hour or so before i get home and my place is pleasantly cool when i arrive going to purchase 1 or 2 more to set up something similar i haven t experienced any issue and setup wa easy plug it in get the app on your device and when you run through the setup and are connected for the first time it ll ask you to update the firmware it ha to go through i believe 3 set of firmware to be fully up to date it load the firmware reboots and then when you reopen then app on your phone device it ll find another one this took about 10 15 minute with me just sitting on my couch a it updated it s easy i ve also seen some complaint that there s a lag with turning it on via the app to when the switch kick on there is a 2 3 second lag when you are connected via your mobile carrier which is understandable there is a 0 second lag when you are hooked up to your home wi fi on the same network these are on so not sure what the issue is there some people might just be nit picking
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: be prepared for a wrestling match during initial setup
Review: if you are one of the lucky one this will work out of the box for you however if you are like what seems like 99 of the population getting this to work for the first time will be a nightmare it took me over an hour and i m very tech savvy being a software engineer who wired his entire home 1gbps home network my only suggestion is to make sure you do the initial configuration in the same room a your router once you have it on your network and connected to your phone and once you can use your phone to turn it on and off then take the time to upgrade the firmware before you move it to your desired destination outlet one more thing these device do not seem to do well in those low signal wi fi spot in your home that are farthest from your router
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: can be difficult to set up
Review: i have 6 wemo s when they work they work well they are not 100 locked in and in that you are at the mercy of any switch being grayed out till it becomes recognized again this can take a bit they are difficult to set up if you have more than one wifi in use i have a wifi repeater using the same password 100 foot away from my house and this is where my solid connection problem are the app ha recently been updated and i noticed a few improvement but they need to get on with even better firmware belkin need to attach a login port so you can set up use with more than one tablet or smart phone i m scared to try to use it that way for fear i will make all of the switch drop off resetting the switch to make new setting is cumbersome it involves unplugging the switch and then re plugging it while holding the top button a little more than a one hand operation let go of the button when the light turn solid orange and wait for the light to flash blue orange then search for the switch in your wifi with your phone or tablet the process is time consuming and doe not assure success so the process ha to be repeated till you see it show up in the app as you can see i have done this many time the more switch you have the more difficult they are to install a you add to the app nice concept but still ha bug to be worked out belkin if you are reading this get on with the firmware upgrade and a website with login would be a nice improvement thanks for upgrading the app a little please don t stop with the upgrade note i had some issue setting these up i finally decided to uninstall the app on my iphone and start over that wa a big plus be sure to install the firmware and wait to install all of your switch before you try the setting up rule for them i have been able to use them away from home they function over 3 4g network but work better over wifi
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: update after two month it ha stopped working took support 3 full day to help me and they were slow even though i told them i did all the step they took a day to come back with all the step and asked me to do them again then i get to level 2 and they start over with the same result i am getting a replacement but i have to pay to ship the unit back and i will be down at least 1 2 week day 4 already and i am just shipping the unit back not acceptable i have another unit on order from another manufacture and this will most likely be the last belkin item i purchase end of update works perfect with home assistant it wa easy to configure with the app then once it is named it wa discovered by home assistant and then could be added to a group and automated will be purchasing more
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have 2 of these and one of their switch all 3 are connected to an amazon echo dot setting this device up is extremely easy downloading and installing the app probably took longer just have the wemo app ready plug the device in and connect to the device s wifi through the app you then have it connect to your home wifi through the app and you re done you can control the device at home or remotely with the app you can also schedule time for it to go on off to connect to the dot wa even easier you can do it through the alexa app smart device or just ask for it to search for smart device whatever you named it in the wemo app is what you verbally say to turn off or on ie kitchen light bedroom light etc
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: rocky start but seems to be working reliably
Review: so setting this up turned out to be a bit of a hassle for me an hour and a half of waiting for a firmware update resulted in a midnight call to belkin but the matter wa resolved promptly and professionally and i even recieved a follow up call today to make sure it wa still working so customer service is top notch the switch seems to work reliably i m intending on using this one for for christmas light during the holiday i currently have candy corn light plugged into it and it work reliably and quickly using it with an amazon echo work well too though there is a it of a lag at time more so than with other smart home device i have but it s barely noticeable all and all a very good product with awesome customer support
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this wa my first purchase from belkin i always thought belkin product were the most expensive one on the shelf which is why i always avoided buying belkin product i bought this only because it wa one of the cheapest product in it class i liked the product i must say i am actually surprised by the amount of ve feebback this product ha my installation wa very straight forward it wasn t quick but very straight forward considering the amount of activity on the device while installation it wasn t supposed to be quick bottom line is follow instructions it wa a interactive installation don t expect it to be seamless and that is how it should be the device after all is accessing your local area network once installation wa complete the reaction time of on off action from my cell phone app to the device wa amazing i wa actually surprised by how quick the device response time wa both from iphone android from local area network or from another wifi network from 3g or 4g it worked without a glitch looks are good too my only beef is which is why 4 star is this device can also act a a hub for wifi enabled bulb belkin should promote that this may be intentional by belkin to sell their hub which is no state of the art compared to wink or smartthings i discovered that after a lot of digging dont expect this switch to be a magical hub it will be with least ability now if i just want a couple of wifi bulb and a power switch in my household i can do that within 100 buck pros in it class it is the cheapest device response time thru lan non lan 3g or 4g is brilliant looks nice cons installation took some time not seamless which i guess is justified you have to be careful in each and every step is also a hub but the fact is not promoted
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this device and app need some work here are my comment 1 seems pricey for an electrical switch but i wanted a piece of electronics that my amazon echo can talk to it can 2 if i lose power or unplug it it need to be set up all over again it is not obvious how to reset this thing even though it ha a restore button there is really no user manual so i can t tell what the blinking light blue or amber mean finally found a web page that tell me how to reset 3 when the device is offline and you open up the app it will ask you what device you are setting up and give you several wemo product option e g setting up a light switch crockpot etc except this one product how dumb 4 my app tell me to download the newest version of firmware but it never work it try for about 30 minute and then basically destroys any connection you have had which brings you back to the beginning which brings you back to my 2nd comment very frustrating customer support told me wait a few day as long a it is working i don t think i ll do anything with firmware unless they send me an email no case number nothing just try again in a few day no thank you 5 i am pretty experienced with computer technology but i have spent way too much time on this for such a simple plug if i can t set up and maintain simple plug please have my head examined for thinking about purchasing the more complicated product like a light switch 6 i expected much better from this company i do like belkin 7 on the positive my amazon echo can find this device and i can turn off the lamp with my voice my goodness i love technology but i guess i am so lazy that i will spend this much money on a plug switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great when they worked not so much when they fail
Review: the wemo switch is great when it work but after a few month each one of them becomes unable to connect to the home network i really enjoyed being able to turn off light from bed and to be able to turn on off christmas tree light without crawling under the pine needle to operate light remotely illuminating my home a i return home in the evening rather than entering a dark house perhaps the app update don t support the prior generation equipment i don t know why i am unable to restore my 4 wemo switch to operating order but the technology is not so sophisticated that it should be so unreliable i ll be looking for a more reliable replacement for remote control of a few key light in my home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works exactly a expected but pricey
Review: if you re dabbling in home automation this is a great start the belkin app work well and you can switch it on or off anywhere you have internet access even better if you re even reasonably technically inclined check out the app ifttt if this than that on your smartphone which will let you toggle the switch based on thing like e mail received temperature stock price your location etc i have mine turn on a lamp in my front window when i enter my neighborhood since we don t have street light and the house is hard to find i deducted one star because the smartphone app should do that itself and because the unit is pricey sure comparable unit are comparably priced but that s no excuse belkin i ve come to rely on you for quality electronics at good price so knock off a few buck and start taking over the home automation space
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not ready for prime time but
Review: i wanted to give this one star due to wemo s very buggy software but decided that wouldn t be fair because the switch doe it job if you are willing to grapple with the bug and don t try to get too fancy in your home setup but the bottom line is that for many people this product is just not ready for prime time if you want a home automation device that you can plug in set up easily and forget about while it function reliably day after day look elsewhere when it s working the wemo offer a lot of way to control anything that can be plugged in to an electrical outlet i wa particularly interested in having light come on around sunset and wanted smart logic that could change that time to follow the season but there are a lot of hidden gotchas daylight saving time sent it into terminal confusion lights would turn off on randomly the device would drop out of my network or become invisible in the wemo app wemo support keep saying reset reboot re install every day come on but to be fair after a fair amount of tinkering and some firmware improvement my switch seem to be working more often than not before you buy go to the wemo community forum and read about all the problem and limitation so that you can determine whether they apply to your setup and whether you would be willing to put up with a bit of tinkering to work around them
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: using alexa to control my light awesome
Review: bought five of these to control table lamp in a few place through the house frankly i wa sick of having to walk around to all of our light at night to turn them off then stumble around in the dark on my way up the stair i specifically used these with the intention of controlling them via alexa and it worked flawlessly i created one group for the basement two light and one for the living room three light the wemo android app work really easily too to turn them on off only thing i ve noticed is that maybe once a month one of them will randomly disconnect from wifi and i have to reset it just unplug plug back in not a big deal
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have a reasonable amount of technical expertise having built computer and done some programming a well a having installed my wireless network and a sonos system the wemo system proved uninstallable the idea is good and the software when not crashing is easy to use however i have been unable to use the wemo switch i initially had some trouble configuring the switch i tried three to make sure i didn t have a defective product and a little difficulty upgrading the firmware after i got the switch updated and configured near my router i moved them to their permanent location that s when the trouble started all switch could no longer be found by the wemo app on my iphone 5 i had to reconfigure them to get them back but unplugging and replugging them in the same outlet near the router also caused them to no longer be recognized trying to configure a switch in my living room and family room at the other end of the house resulted in failure a the wemo could not pick up my wireless network i have an extender for that part of the house and all my device work fine there i m returning the switch a even the one that work close to the router are only good until the first power failure
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: best way to dip your toe into home automation
Review: i connected three of these switch smart plugs to various light lamp throughout my house using the wemo app wa easy enough but the real power of these switch come from their integration with google home i connected the switch to my google home using ifttt since they haven t released native support just yet and now i can control all of my light without moving from my couch there s the occasional 3 5 second lag between my command ending and the light switching on but it s never long enough where you d question it being worth the money my one con which isn t bad enough to take away a star would be that the switch themselves make an audible click when toggled so from across the room you can hear the plug switch on and off all in all these switch are a great value for anyone entering into the realm of home automation
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great with amazon echo and home automation
Review: update 5 27 15 i realized the internet connection issue were with the switch distance from the wi fi router these switch need to be fairly close range to the router getting a very good signal so to stay wi fi connected when they are the phone app work very well controlling the switch if installing in area where other wi fi device show 3 bar or le you will have wi fi issue with the switch switch need a really strong wi fi signal to stay connected ps if you install these switch and find the phone app doe not find the switch after installed went ok you need to cycle power off on your router that seems to allow the switch to all successfully connect to your wi fi works really good with the amazon echo and home automation stays online with the echo for reliable switch control i found when only using with the belkin phone wemo app not a good an experience but using the amazon echo with this switch is reliable and slick because both the echo and the switch are always home network wifi connected so both talk to each other and never seem to ever lose communication using with echo great but when using with the phone app iphone android not so good
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: when it finally work it work great
Review: bought 2 of these thinking great idea they were all very easy to set using the wemo network although it constantly showed a not in range when i wanted to start over it connected fine to my home network but i had some issue getting the application to work it just willy nilly chooses not to find a unit even though it had just 15 minute before during initial set up it took 50 minute to find the 2nd unit i d recommend setting up multiple unit all at once rather than one at a time like i did right now they are both working but now it is asking to do a firmware update i want to but am worried that they won t work after that we ll see i ll modify my review after the update for the timer i set up a light in my living room it come on at night and in the morning just like any other light for the light switch i set one up on the fountain out front when it get really windy the water level drop a the wind blow i could now turn it off remotely using the iphone application the last switch i put in the garage to run a flood light the garage is detached and the switch is in the garage the light wa worthless because i d have to go outside to the garage to turn it on at night not the case now i set up a schedule on my porch light to turn off at sun rise with no event to ever turn it on that allows me to turn it off anytime i want on demand and have it automatically turn off at sunrise it work well when it work for the most part everything worked well the problem i have is the iphone app is clunky if i don t wait for the app to refresh itself i will lose control of my device that seems to be the case when this happens there is no recovery unless i unplug the timer and trip the breaker for the switch no other known way to reset these all three device routinely fall off the network on their own when this happens the schedule appear to still work hard to confirm because they are all over night schedule there is nothing i can do but switch the breaker off and on to get them back they do not recover on their own
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great concept horrible execution save your money
Review: waste of bought this to control my son tv at night since he stay up all night if we don t sit on top of him 1st 20 minute he 8 y o found the power button on the unit at turned it on manually also the app for my iphone that allows rules to be set up to auto shut off at a certain time what a joke i have had a rule since day 1 and it ha yet to turn off when it is supposed to over 6 month
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i love this wi fi smart plug i have tried many different plug with
Review: i love this wi fi smart plug i have tried many different plug without very much success this so far is the only one that i have purchased that actually delivered the biggest reason for purchasing these wa to control the amount of time the kid spend playing with their electronic device they are installed in a home automation cabinet even being in this cabinet i can still control it with the app the others are controlling various item in the house another nice feature is that it work with my nest thermostat
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a lot of set up hassle before it work then it s unreliable even once set up
Review: update 1 year owned dropped the rating from 3 to 2 star these plug are entirely unreliable dropping in and out of the network constantly i ve even assigned permanent ip address to these plug and they are still unreliable they will literally disappear from the app and from the network at completely random the router driver are all up to date and all other item on the network are 100 reliable when you get it set up it work great but it is an unholy pain to setup especially if you change your router setting there is a lot of resetting unplugging and plugging back in downloading and deleting and re downloading the app it s so frustrating that i have one i haven t bothered reseting since changing my router password two month ago
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this allows me to turn my upright window air conditioner 8 000 btu honeywell into a smart a c device i use iftt to automatically trigger it based on outdoor temperature and to start it up before i get home this wa easy to set up and is like a crock pot fix it and forget it i chose this based on a combination of rating plus price and it is an excellent value i lso like being able to activate it or turn it off while in another part of my home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the device work just fine pairing with echo wa a piece of cake
Review: after an unbelievably frustrating installation the device work just fine pairing with echo wa a piece of cake however the rating of 3 is due to the frustrating experience of trying to get it connected to my network this wa easily the most difficult installation that i ve ever encountered and it didn t have to be the installation instruction are vague incomplete and out of date they certainly don t match current android 5 1 setup and the beginning of the setup is actually a preview of the installation process although you might not know that until you ve come irritated by the unresponsiveness of the screen i m not going into the detail of my trial and error process there is quite a bit of self congratulatory help on the belkin web site but much is sadly out of date it s even out of date for the connection to echo i wouldn t recommend against purchasing this device but be prepared to be annoyed this is from an ee with 50 year of experience that said i will buy another provided this unit stay connected for a couple week now to update my experience after just over one month the device is no longer connected to my network it apparently decided to seceed from my system after an hour of fussing it still is not connected and echo cannot find it either i would not recommend this device to anyone connecting and maintaining a network connection seems to be hit and miss connecting a device to a network should not require any effort if you know the network password echo ha certainly proved that do not buy this there must be some alternative device that actually work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good luck connecting the wemo to your home wifi
Review: the product doesn t work properly for the first day it performed a expected and then began failing i worked with it for two day and it finally came down to the wemo wifi wouldn t connect to my in home wifi because it wouldn t accept the valid password for my in home wifi and therefore wa useless i have many connection to my wifi all using the same password that wemo refused to validate i then went on an extended web research reading evaluation and ala there were others that had exactly the same experience without a solution i returned two wemo s one to home depot and one to amazon the home depot unit had become complete dead inert
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: initially could not get to work with my android phone
Review: initially could not get to work with my android phone finally installed the wemo app on my android tablet that doesn t have cellular just wifi this time it worked renamed it to something echo alexa could understand and now i can voice control it with alexa the android app really freak out if you try to connect with a phone which ha cellular service i think this is because you have to put the wemo device first in your wifi pecking order which cause you phone to switch to cellular from wifi which totally doesn t work with setup so hopefully you have something that only us wifi once it wa setup on my wifi tablet the wemo app on my phone had it too extremely clunky app hopefully i won t have to use the app very much just alexa
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought one of these and loved it so much that i bought another i know some folk have had a hard time setting them up but i didn t have any problem you can control them from alexa or from the wemo app i find use the app to turn on the light before i come home i am going to get another one but there is a mini version of the product that is coming out next week so i am getting that version my guess is that this one will eventually be discontinued
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i have google home controlling it via ifttt and it work great i just need to say hey google
Review: i m using this right now for my christmas tree i have google home controlling it via ifttt and it work great i just need to say hey google turn on the christmas tree and the tree turn on i also have it set up using the timer feature to come on at sunset and off at 10pm
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i like the idea that this work with amazon echo but it need to work remotely based on my experience and feedback on the belkin website it is impossible for many to set this up to work remotely for use when you are not on your home network to me this would be the main use for this item turn on the light from your car upon arrival or remotely when you are traveling after numerous reset and reinstalls of the app last night with little guidance on the company website that went beyond the basic which i had already done this item just doe not work i m pretty tech savvy but this is beyond me i am returning the item something i rarely do
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve had this switch for about 6 month now and the only problem i have ever had with this thing is when my router used to have problem with intermittent connection loses as soon a i replaced said router it ha been smooth sailing the app that wa installed in my iphone is very easy to use and if you want to use multiple switch you can manually label them any way you like i also have this programmed to run my light on my fish tank and it is accurate to the second another nice thing about using this a a timer is that it will automatically adjust to day light saving time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: caution this won t work on various android device
Review: caution i ve been trying to get the app rule to work and after communicating with belkin for the past two week with no solution i thought i knew the answer the wemo switch work by the wemo app i installed one switch successfully with android 4 3 os i then got the update and installed 4 4 and now it no longer work i thought it wa my updated android os that the current app wasn t updated for i recently received a reply on belkins problem site from a person with the same result with android 4 1 x os so buyer beware i guess i m going to return the switch i purchased here and one that i purchased from belkin a it s not a switch problem but an app problem that belkin is le than willing to admit that there is a problem in my previous communication with their tech support they were blaming everything including my router the time coordination my phone that if i wa using the ios app i should switch to the android app a it is better which should tell you how much they know etc
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: too frustrating and time consuming to use
Review: i bought this product to replace an old x 10 system i spent hour trying to get both wemo smart switch receptacle to work off my samsung s 7 a total exercise in frustration when everything finally worked a short time later my switch could not be found or when the could be found they would not allow me to save the program to the device i just gave up and tried my kindle fire that wa marginally better i would not recommend this unreliable and frequently unresponsive product to others to replace it i bought tp link total set up occurred while drinking one cup of coffee that wa still hot when i finished it 10 hour le than wemo for a fully functional set up
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have purchased two switch about 4 month ago not very happy with them of all my wi fi device connected to alexa those one are the only giving me a hard time they lose the connection at least once a month both in within 10 foot away from the router sometimes they respond very slow pairing them back is a pain considering both of them act the same i d say it s not a device malfunction but rather a faulty design bottom line if you use them for a critical job ex on an automated home control security function they are not reliable you will enjoy turning on and off a desk lamp though can t say how other brand perform but definitely next time i ll try something else
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: turns light on before sunset great to mess with people at home
Review: love these switch i have 3 and want more i also have the tp link plug which are 10 cheaper however the tp link plug do not integrate with the ifftt app if you want to create recipe via ifftt the wemo is for you this plug work just a advertised i set them up for my hallway light and christmas decoration everything turn on 30 min before sunset amazing feature and turn off at 12am i also love how i can turn on light from anywhere even when i m not home it s fun to mess with my husband and flicker his light when i m not home i also have the wemo switch insight 10 more but i realized i don t need all the extra stats that the insight provides
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the app freeze when launched too quickly after it wa
Review: the app freeze when launched too quickly after it wa closed carefully following the non standard setup instruction requires several try the save after edit of previously scheduled task requires save after done the streamlined setup doe not have the granularity for troubleshooting it can and doe in fact work often but it also doe not work part of the time because i have security concern i m only giving this app access to controller for non critical device such a a few light around the house they may have designed their product line for more casual user where performance security and troubleshooting aren t really a factor
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: updated review it work great again
Review: in my last review i gave this product a one star because for whatever reason it stop connecting with my wifi and i cannot get in touch with this seller for tech support after i posted the review belkin contacted me and provided tech support and i wa able to get the wifi switch working again so thump up for belkin service it s working great a before so 5 star it is
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: we have our tv plugged into this so if we re at work early in the morning event venue life we can turn the tv some time in the morning for some background noise for our guinea pig i know we should have a pair working on it he just like hearing voice and usually this help keep his internal clock a little closer to ours was pretty simple to sync up with my phone wemo s instruction were simple to follow i would like to get a few more and preferably a smart thermostat so i could mess with the ifttt programming make a habit of checking the wemo app if you don t always use it because firmware update seem to be released fairly often and take a little bit to download
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i really like these i know that some people have issue but i have never had a problem with one i have 5 total in the house these are much easier to set then a timer when i am out of town i also like the randomness of the away mode for light for day to day use these are great for fan light etc i don t have homelink so the fact that they don t work with that is a non factor for me
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i got this so that my amazon echo could turn on my coffee pot it took a bit of googling but after figuring it out i had to set my phone to airplane mode to set it up and give it a static ip to keep it connected it work perfectly i set a rule in the wemo app to turn it off after 8 minute so my coffee doesn t scorch if i take longer than that to come get it i refill the water and coffee ground after i take the coffee out i named the plug coffee so then all i have to do is say alexa turn on coffee coffee is brewed and it automatically turn off what a time to be alive
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the wemo switch hardware might be good but i never found out because their software
Review: the wemo switch hardware might be good but i never found out because their software is so horrible you must use their smartphone software to configure the device but their android software wa unable to identify and connect the hardware to the router i m a software and network guy by trade so i know how to work around almost any problem but after several hour of reinstallation attempt tweak and frustration i am returning this item their clever comment on the google play store is please don t ask u if we ve seen any good movie lately because all we ve done for the past two month is code code code they apparently neglected to test test test
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use my belkin wemo smart plug switch with amazon echo and sometimes the wemo iphone app to turn on off my living room light a i enter and exit my home i also power on off a small space heater with a preset temp i only wish these also worked with apple home kit and siri a well but there is a statement on their website that say this version of the smart plug switch will not be compatible
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: when it worked it s great but it put itself to sleep too often
Review: setup is ok just follow the instruction a trick on the android moto g4 user turn off the cellular data before setup otherwise there is no way to complete alexa control also worked when it worked it s great it response to alexa but it put itself to sleep too often i have to physically press the power button to wake it up what s the point of having a smart plug that you have go there to power it up in order to use it i have purchased two wemo smart plug and they all have this problem
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works awesome
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: nice idea i had to get three of these
Review: nice idea i had to get three of these after i purchased my google home it wa slightly tricky getting these set up but after i figured out the first one the other two were a breeze every once in a while google home loses contact with it but after a moment it responds a expected these are shaped to where the should fit directly into a wall socket however i never plug directly into the wall without it being connected to a surge protector first so the shape of the wemo doe encroach on the adjacent socket on each of my surge protector all the same i love turning the light on with a voice command
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i love it it s much more reliable than the ankuoo neo wi fi smart switch
Review: first i bought an ankuoo neo wi fi smart switch i installed it on my air conditioner a window unit sometimes it worked but often i d come home to find it hadn t turned on the air conditioner when it wa supposed to after a while i finally gave up on it and returned it to amazon thank you amazon it turned out the ankuoo neo app wa buggy and it store the programming on a remote server that is very unreliable the app would crash and often i wasn t able to access the device remotely using the app to make sure it wa on or to turn it on manually this time i did my research i looked for a device that store the programming on the actual device so it will turn on a programmed not only doe my air conditioner always turn on a it should the app always work remotely whether my phone is connected to wifi or not the wemo switch cost more than the other one but the extra cost is worth it the interface on the app is even better than the other one it s better in every way
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great if you re willing to put in the attempt to get it to connect to your wifi setup
Review: it work great but setup is a pita i must have tried 30 time the first night getting the wemo to connect to my wi fi it would ask for the password and then start over again i have two wemo light switch that work great but they both have issue connecting upon setup or when changing your router ssid i just don t understand why wemo doesn t implement wps and make it simple if the wi fi setup issue were resolved this would be a 5 star product but it took resetting the device my phone my router and two night of attempt to get it to connect and i ve done this twice before
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: nothing wemo work and if it doe it doesn t
Review: nothing wemo work and if it doe it doesn t work for long i m guessing from reading posting that if you want to be a wemo hobbyist you can get stuff working with on going maintenance but if you just want your light to turn on and off plan to spend an hour or two a month messing with it and replacing away 30 device every now and then
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i purchased this device for amazon dot using my voice to control the switch and having the app control the switch from outside of my apartment is great this device doe not have to be permanent wired into the electrical system which is perfect for rented dwelling so far the until and app have worked perfectly i had to come back and submit an update for this product over the past six month it responds to command only once only a quarter of the time often time the command to turn on or off ha to be sent twice the unit is closer to the hub than any of the newer unit so there should be no issue if you could bypass this unit and get the updated version that would work better for you i also have the newer unit and they have responded perfectly every time so far
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i would not say this is an easy setup maybe if you are just setting it
Review: i would not say this is an easy setup maybe if you are just setting it up with wemo app but not if you are setting up with the amazon echo lots of step back and forth i would rate the setup of my first wemo switch a 3 5 but the 2nd wemo switch wa a nightmare difficult sometimes it would be recognized on the wifi network other time not and when a firmware update wa required it wouldn t be recognized at all after that multiple support call it look like this 2nd wemo switch is a failure and will have to be sent in for replacement fortunately it is still under warranty with wemo but not available for return from amazon at this point
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: neat idea but it need work
Review: we purchased this to use a a controllable timer for a light when travelling originally i wa pleased with the setup and operation a we could set different schedule and turn the light on off remotely even though it is a fairly bulky plug that stick out from the wall outlet we have another wemo device so i wa trying to stay consistent and only use one app for lighting however since then it ha disconnected multiple time the app will not recognize the device and you cannot reconnect to the switch s wifi to set it up again the first time it had to be powered on off several time and eventually it came back to life but that s useless if you re not there to do that that s the point of a remote timer i have sent the troubleshooting email from the app but never received a response from wemo probably won t buy more of their product because of the intermittent service
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love it found a great way to not block the bottom outlet
Review: i have 5 wemo switch now and they all have worked perfectly at first i wa upset that when in use it covered the bottom outlet due to it s size i bought a 6 prong outlet 2 outlet in front and 2 outlet on each side and it work very well i can hook up the wemo switch at the top and still have the bottom outlet free plus i gain 4 extra outlet so don t let the size of it discourage you from purchasing the 6 prong outlet sell here on amazon for under 6 a an add on item
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: thesthese wemo switch are by far the most useful and stable automation device in my house we have problem with the wink stuff regularly alexa seems to understand and control these switch better than anything else we di not want a wall o rcountertop switch for our disposal when remodeled so we had the electrician wire a switched outlet into the cabinet under the sink that meant we had to open the cabinet to turn the disposal on and off i put a wemo switch in that outlet and plugged the disposal into the wemo now with our echo sitting on the kitchen island we can imply say alexa turn on disposal and vice versa no more wet hand on the cabinet door
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: disappointing out of box experience no support for complex wifi password
Review: it s a nonstarter for me since you cannot connect the device to a network with symbol in the password what a waste of time i don t think making my password le secure and having to change every device in my house is worth the benefit of having this device another great example of lazy security for the internet of thing my 10 year old timer will have to keep turning on my espresso machine for me really disappointed if they were lazy about this i can only imagine the rest of the product is a disappointment a well from their support website wemo support wpa2 password of eight 8 to 63 character comprised of letter and number only wemo will fail to connect to your network if your wireless password contains any space or symbol in it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: but i m sure the design will only get better and better
Review: these switch are big a little clunky but i m sure the design will only get better and better for now however this product doe the intended job you have to download the app on your phone tablet or computer and the name it in the app we use this particular plug for our christmas light we also have alexa to control the switch so we say alexa turn on the christmas light and walla they turn on syncing the switch with alexa wa easy once the wemo app wa installed on my phone after christmas we will use the switch for something else so i will change the name of the switch that way we are not asking alexa to turn on the christmas light and my diffuser turn on
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought three of these thing with high hope previously i wa using the manual timer with the little tab i wa already resetting them with the changing sunset and dst i bought this product because of the sunset rule that they have i thought it would be nice to not have to manually update the time throughout the year i purchased one outlet timer from amazon and followed up a few day later with a two pack of light switch from sams they were all very easy to set up on the network i had a few struggle getting the iphone application to work and setting up my own icon for each device i hobbled through it no issue there for the timer i set up a light in my living room it come on at night and in the morning just like any other light for the light switch i set one up on the fountain out front when it get really windy the water level drop a the wind blow i could now turn it off remotely using the iphone application the last switch i put in the garage to run a flood light the garage is detached and the switch is in the garage the light wa worthless because i d have to go outside to the garage to turn it on at night not the case now i set up a schedule on my porch light to turn off at sun rise with no event to ever turn it on that allows me to turn it off anytime i want on demand and have it automatically turn off at sunrise it work well when it work for the most part everything worked well the problem i have is the iphone app is clunky if i don t wait for the app to refresh itself i will lose control of my device that seems to be the case when this happens there is no recovery unless i unplug the timer and trip the breaker for the switch no other known way to reset these all three device routinely fall off the network on their own when this happens the schedule appear to still work hard to confirm because they are all over night schedule there is nothing i can do but switch the breaker off and on to get them back they do not recover on their own my router is le than a year old other application such a the honeywell thermostat all work fine with no issue last night i updated the app on iphone and now today i have no control over my device again on some occasion i would try to turn on a device using the application while in the same area and the app would tell me the device is on and it would not be on sometimes i would push it again and the device would then come on after a second attempt even though the button wa already green on my application i believe conceptually these are nice however i believe we have some bug in the software that really need to be addressed soon at the very least the device should be smart enough to connect back to the router automatically or whatever the problem is with these thing unfortunately i cannot count on these device to function if had to depend on them while out of town i ve also played with the if this then that network and that work well with wemo device for now i will not be investing in any more wemo device until some sort of fix is released i ll hobble along with what i have a they do have some function just not what i paid for i m also concerned about how useful these device would be if belkin decided to abandon their internet framework
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i struggled for a few minute at first trying to get the app to connect to the plug but i just kept trying and on the third try or so it connected and i wa able to get it all set up including setting schedule the alexa app wa able to discover the plug right away and i ve never had an issue controlling the plug ended up buying another because i wa so satisfied with the first through the echo i m going to buy two more of them to control various light around my apartment
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: belkin wemo customer support is woefully lacking especially compared to others when problem arise no phone support
Review: this is not specific to this wemo switch a much a it is a commentary on the belkin wemo support for the whole environment which is severely lacking their device have worked well right out of the box and with alexa but when something fails down the road my experience is that their support process suck i co own a cell phone and computer repair and home automation business and use my home a a test bed to recommend different solution to customer for wemo in the beginning i ordered the wemo hub with a couple of smart plug later expanded system to 4 wemo bulb 3 smart plug and 4 light switch the wemo hub failed after around 6 or so month it will not establish connection with my device the smart plug and light switch still work with alexa a they are accessed directly via wifi the bulb don t a they use rf and need the hub to translate so the bulb are useless without the hub and the switch can t be put on a schedule without hub which wa a significant reason to order them to activate light when out of town the only way i found belkin to offer support for these wemo device is via email no live phone interaction in my case the issue is clearly a defective hub been doing home automation for many year so this issue is not rocket science and the email interaction offered is a rudimentary level 1 support dialog script that i already tried before i reached out to them my very simple request wa for them to verify the defect and then send me a warranty exchange they were unable to put this into motion so i requested several time a phone call back to talk to someone for 5 minute to resolve after a month since the latest ask i have yet to receive a call and at this point don t expect one so the hub just sits there reminding me of their lack of phone support and inability to do simple warranty exchange so save yourself a lot of frustration when a problem arises and order a different manufacturer switch plug my experience with other vendor like tp link which have live customer support and functionally identical unit are they are competent and have always resolved issue quickly and to my satisfaction one specific similar example wa a warranty issue with a smart tp link motion detector that happened a couple of week after the wemo hub failure tp link resolved it quickly i reached their live phone support and after walking through the diagnostics with their support person on the line they determined it wa a defective unit cross shipped a replacement and i wa back up an running in le than 4 day contrast this with belkin wemo which still unresolved almost 2 month later
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works but tends to disappear from my echo intermittently update 12 16 16 when this device work it s really great the problem is that the switch is only intermittently available on the echo and the wemo app it s really great to turn the garage or exterior light on using your phone when you are coming home however the app is only available about half the time setup wa also very difficult and i wa only able to finally complete setup with information i found on the internet i like the feature of the switch but i think the manufacturer ha a ton of work to do to get this right the plug in wemo switch although difficult to set up keep working all the time i d buy more of these if they worked better
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: now the software wa very crappy wi fi connection get disconnected every once in a
Review: i own two of the light switch and two of the switch they are some very poorly designed product and software the light switch can not be used a a anything but a single switch if you have a two way or even a three way switch configuration it doesn t work the switch are a bit bulky so you can t really plug in a large plug into the other outlet now the software wa very crappy wi fi connection get disconnected every once in a while so you end up not seeing the control the switch are very bad with the wi fi connection their support for android is very lacking i posted in their forum about the status of android 5 support a few week before the actual release of android 5 there wa no response until about 3 week after android 5 release for them to say that it will be ready soon other wemo developer had their app working for the android 5 release but not belkin it s their own product and they don t have a release that work it s not like android 5 preview were not available to the public since the preview were available for month before the final release totally lacking support for android maybe better on iphone but since i don t use iphone it s useless to me the rule don t work too well and very limited there is no option of just having it run for x amount of time and then shut off did i mention how bad the wi fi connection are the switch are about maximum 3 foot away from my ac dual band router and it still ha wi fi connection problem my advice find some other product for home automation these device are not reliable update 6 9 2015 just installed the app on the asus zenfone 2 and the app crash it s android 5 0 so i don t see where the problem is the level of incompetence from belkin for android support is just staggering stay away from this product if you own an android phone
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great device for use with cell phone or with amazon echo
Review: bought this to use with my new amazon echo it work great both with the echo and with our iphone and android phone apps it wa easy to set up when traveling it allows u to pre program time when our light will turn on and off but unlike the timer we ve used for year which were limited to just turning thing on and off at the same time every day the wemo switch smart plug allows u to also turn the light on and off with our cell phone from anywhere in the world whenever we want you do need to make sure you give each switch a unique name that is simple and that you will remember if you re going to use it with the echo or the echo won t recognize what you want to do
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great device if not a a little chunky and clumsy
Review: wanted to try the wemo recipe in echo so took the dive so far it s been neat but a bit underwhelming we have a home full of philips hue and iot tech so this device ha been a little disappointing we have used our wemo outlet a a way to smarten up a christmas tree and have now swapped it to a lamp we want to keep an edison bulb in rather than add an ugly hue bulb i do recommend this product but i wish i had waited to get the smaller new version a this one take up a full set of two outlet not a deal breaker just kinda irritating if you like smart home stuff and have an echo this is great just maybe spend a bit more and go for the smaller version
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the two unit i purchased have been a disappointment rarely do they stay connected to the echo for more than a day they will operate via the wemo app most of the time but that is no more convenient than the x10 switch these were to replace the switch attached to device which are difficult to reach so the need is more than that of just a tech toy i say the wemo is available via the app but they are fickle sometimes failing and having to be reset i cannot see how it is the echo a the harmony television remote capacity work fine on the echo a do the other device on the network the manufacturer wa dismissive when reached asked for assistance funny how they embed a simple contact form in the app itself which then result in a non response
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this work great with the amazon echo i have it connected to a small heater under my office desk i named the wemo switch heater and heat you can come up with more than one name for the same device so no if i say alexa turn on heater or alexa heat my foot get a nice hot breeze from my heater you could connect this to a wide variety of device but i would not recommend this for light if you want to control light it would make more sense to buy smart light such a the philips hue in my opinion those require a starter set which is costly but allow voice controlled dimming with the amazon echo understandably it could be more cost effective to control all of the light in a room with one wemo switch by connecting a surge protector or something with multiple outlet to one wemo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: did exactly what i wanted it to do i had been using those rf switched outlet to control lamp led lighting my jukebox etc little remote control scattered all over my man cave now i can simply walk into the room and say alexa turn on basement light boom done setup is dead simple and they ve been very reliable thus far i picked them on sale on black friday for about 20 buck each and that s about a much a i would pay for them with competition coming from a ton of different alexa compatible vendor i would imagine that these will quickly drop to 10 15 each
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love it but the price continues to choke me
Review: love this plug wemo switch smart plug works fabulously and seamlessly being able to control it via my amazon echo is great but being able to control it via the wemo app on my phone is even better a it saved me from what i thought wa a life threatening situation turn out nobody wa actually breaking into my house when i used the app to turn on a security device plugged into the wemo switch but at the time i thought someone wa and that s all that really matter lol laughing now but it wasn t funny at the time regardless i love this little plug switch the only reason i am giving it le than 5 star is because of the price i got it while it wa 10 off and even then i choked on the price
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought a used wemo switch to try out with my new echo day one set up wa quick and easy and wemo worked day two there wa a problem with my xfinity router and i had to refresh it afterwards echo stopped recognizing my wemo wemo stopped working and would not reinstall day three reset wemo to it factory default setting and performed the set up again wemo is working again and my echo is now recognizing it again pros remote access when my router is working correctly easy set up works with echo and iphone 6 cons temperamental a router refresh or power outage mean you will have to reset the wemo and do a reinstall cost there is no way i would pay 49 for this device the wemo app is buggy android and ios version both size of the outlet updated 06 10 2015 my wemo switch ha lost connection with my wireless home network several time since my review since none of my other wireless device are having problem the problem ha to be the wemo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: second best gift idea i have had for my mom
Review: mom doe not get around easily and this wa perfect to go along with the echo i got her i plugged her living room lamp into and now she just tell echo to turn her light on or off and it communicates with wemo switch sometimes mom visit family longer than intended and ha not left a light on for the cat and parrot she call me and with the wemo app on my phone i can turn her light on for her this and the echo are probably the most useful gift i have thought of for my 74 year old mother

Review: i bought this device and all the function very well until the energy turn off in my house and the app don t detected the wemo i work in other province and my mother live alone in the house where i installed the wemo is frustred to know that the same wemo don t restart alone and rework alone when the electric energy turn off because if i am away of my home and don t be anyone in my house i can t to active the device conected to the wemo i have a security camera tenvis and they restar the function alone and don t need that e person active it to restart the function

Review: super easy to set up down load the phone app first if you plan on using the laptop app 5 00 it will not work until you set it all up with the free phone app i use this with my phone and with the amazon echo works a advertised with both takes only minute to set up and worked the first time out phone app control these switch from anywhere in the world if you continually wonder if you shut something off after you left for work hook one of these up to it and you will never have to wonder again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this device might be acceptable if you live in a very small home with strong wi fi coverage from a single router in my situation the outlet that i wanted to use this in wa behind a buffet however it wa only about 10 foot from a wireless access point using a wifi analyzer i could see i had a strong signal no matter what i couldn t get it to connect to wifi if i went into my office where my main router is i could get it working searching through post at the wemo community forum there seems to be a lot of issue with wifi connectivity other device seem to have no issue with connecting through the access point so i m confident it isn t a network issue
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have three of these an three wemo wall switch in use for the past 18 month work great i say alexa turn on the fan and the fan come on i also use them with a smartthings hub shedule lamp to go off at 8 00am in case i forget to turn them of before going to work i laso have motion sensor setup light come on when i enter a dark room never had a problem with them just follow the direction when setting them up i think the people that give one star just don t know how to use them only giving 4 star because they don t have a dimmer option other than that they are great
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use two of these switch with my amazon echo i intend to use them when i go out of town to set on and off time so far they have worked very well my only complaint is that they have only one outlet on them which restricts what you can plug into them other than that they work fine set up wa easy but make sure you know which switch is which i geve them name but to them backwards in the set up it wa no big deal to correct them afterwards though and it is interesting to walk into a dark room and tell alexa to turn on a light very cool all in all i am satisfied with them
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i got a smart plug for christmas with my echo
Review: i got a smart plug for christmas with my echo it installed quickly and cleanly i ordered a second and it ha been dismal i tried installing but i could never get everything synched i went through the instruction on the website three time to no avail i tried twice to contact wemo tech support for help and have yet to get a response i have a smart switch too but i am hesitant to even try it because of the poor record i will probably be returning both soon and moving to a different manufacturer
