Header: returned after one day due to high pitched constant sound
Review: i own the device for about 1 day before returning it there wa a high pitched sound coming from the switch at all time it wa a bit like those high pitched notification sound a teenager might use on their phone probably a transformer or rectifier i tried it in another outlet and got the same sound if you look at other review you will find others had this same issue the little i used the device otherwise it seemed to work fine there is a clicking sound when it turn something off and on but that wa a non issue for me the device didn t block the second wall plug
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buggy device not worth the hassle
Review: this switch isn t worth the hassle it failed on u for the last time this past week i ve given up on it and no longer use it it failed on u at least 6 time in the past 3 month getting it to work each time it fails requires a 30 minute process which involves a 10 minute hard reset getting a phone to connect to it s wifi network setting it up again in the wemo app and then disconnecting from it wifi network we also use this switch with our smartthings and our echo which require additional setup after each reset i ve upgraded the firmware and read a couple support article but don t have time to mess with it anymore i ll be sticking to the other more reliable switch brand in the future
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: love it we have it connected to our amazon echo use it to turn on off our christmas tree saves time and hassle of having to unplug our tree at night in case we forget to turn off we use the echo remote to turn it off technology is amazing there is an app a well to use with your smart phone i use it with my iphone no issue and easy to navigate many other function that are helpful and fun must have if you have the echo get the most from it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i wanted to like this it work with the nest product and i recently got rid of my alarm system and remote technology and needed something to replace it with this just doesn t stay connected to my wifi and there is no reason for it when i needed it recently while away on a trip it wouldn t work said it wa offline the whole time i had to come home and reset it i have to reset it a lot it s pretty much useless if you have to be home to use it right
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: annoying to set up but very nice once it is working
Review: i have set up three of these switch now every time without fail set up failed the first time even when i had plugged in the switch only a few foot away from my router every time i have found it necessary to do a hard reset of the switch every time doing that hard reset fixed the problem and the next attempt to set up the switch succeeded other than that these switch have been wonderfully convenient now that there are echo dot scattered around my home i can turn on my bedroom fan without turning on the light or getting out of bed shut off all the power to all the av component in my home theater setup and turn on some light in the basement when i enter via the side door so four star instead of five due to the annoying setup problem but well worth it if you can get past that problem hint if your switch can t seem to join your home network even though you are sure you gave it the right password you have run into the same problem a i have the reset switch is labeled reset and is located along the top edge of the switch unplug the switch press the reset button don t let go plug in the switch while still pressing down on the reset button and wait until the little light turn amber then try setting up the switch again it should work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i cant believe that this device will not support network where the ssid is hidden in order to get this device to connect i had to make my router visible to the world then device will continue to work a long a it is connected to power and the ssid is hidden however if you unplug it or loose power you have to make your router visible to the world it s too bad they couldn t retain the ssid so that when you unplug it to move it or you lose power you don t have to go through a bunch of gyration to get the device back on line i had planned to buy more of these but one is all i will buy until they fix this problem a lot of other device work very nicely with hidden ssid s so it cant be that hard to do please fix it it is too bad because the device is very usable otherwise
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great prefer newer model with power consumption monitoring
Review: this is a great device that wa easy to setup you can check out a plethora of technical info that i have posted here http goo gl nndfpq the iphone app is very easy to use and will support multiple wemo device you can even snap a photo of each lamp etc and that way you know which device your turning on and off within the app my only complaint is that belkin released a newer wemo after i purchased this one that also monitor energy consumption that s the only reason that i didn t rank this one perfectly i d definitely buy this same wemo again but would prefer having power monitoring too this make it easy to turn on light etc while at home or away via the internet i have not encountered any problem with the device and belkin release firmware update periodically which basically install themselves don t feel like you have to be a technical nerd to purchase and or use this device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: note this review is for the wemo switch not the insight switch or the light switch or the motion control i wish amazon didn t lump all the wemo product review into the same list for a first generation product it s not bad it s easy to setup and use with that said the android app is awful i couldn t not set up a timer with the app alone which is deplorable for a product that so heavily depends on a remote control aka the app if you can t use the app or don t want to have to depend on the app remote then don t get this product what turned this product around for me wa the ifttt if this then that website integration you can do quite a lot to the wemo through ifttt including setting up timer the timer can be a simple or complex a you want for example you can have the wemo turn on a light at sunset or x number of minute before after sunset sunrise the on off button on the wemo is nice to turn on a light or other device if i had to only depend on the app to control the wemo i would have returned it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: it exhibit a weird behavior where it keep switching on and off like a dozen time a minute before either finally settling into on which is what i wanted or off which is not i have no idea what would be causing it and they don t have any faq regarding it so i m assuming that this is not a bug they know about or it s not one they know how to fix really really wanted to like this and it is cool to be able to turn thing on and off with a cellie but depending on what you plug in that kind of behavior could be a pretty bad thing to subject your device to
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: there s an awkward layout between my bed and the nearest light switch between that the fact that i own and love an amazon echo and that this wa a lightning deal i figured i d give it a shot took a long time for my echo to get the hang of it but eventually it started recognizing my command to operate the light i m not sure why there wa a delay but it s been working pretty consistently ever since sometimes alexa say okay and the light doesn t respond but it s rare btw i call my light aziz if anyone get the reference
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: delightful product fyi one cannot connect to wemo remote access using a vpn
Review: wemo product live up to their reputation for ease of use and security the initial setup wa easy the programming straightforward after a few month i switched router and ran into a problem accessing my wemo product from my phone but not the other phone and tablet in the house it wasn t the router change it wa because i had my vpn active on my phone it took a while to puzzle that out it s not something i found in the help faqs or initial search of the community one cannot connect to wemo remote access using a vpn
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: we now own 4 of these and have them all
Review: we now own 4 of these and have them all linked to our amazon alexa installation take le than 10 minute only once did i have to restart from the beginning for whatever reason we have now used wemo for over two month and once installed have had zero issue my daughter love telling alexa to turn on the christmas tree light i look forward to buying more in the future
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a while and for the most part they work fine however
Review: i ve had my wemo switch for a while and for the most part they work fine however setup can be a bit confusing each wemo is basically it s own wifi hotspot once you do get it setup be prepared for the switch to download a new firmware version which is kind of pain since you have to do it for each one i have 6 setting up integration with your amazon alexa is also slightly complicated if you want to group your light together if you re tech savvy you shouldn t have any problem but if you re not it s best to get a geek friend to set them up for you
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: alexa do cool stuff for me
Review: love these thing such an easy solution for making a smart home on the cheap works perfectly with alexa but if the power go out or the internet go down they have to be reset which is a bit of a pain also there are constant update for these thing seems like every time i open the app but still the ease of set up the dependability the convenience and showing off in front of the guest make it so much fun to have got them on sale for about 30 each and bought 2 for my parent a well
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good for controlling a limited number of appliance
Review: wemo is great for if you want to control a few item set up wa easy but you need to update firmware at first option i set these up to control some appliance i can effectively disconnect power to the toaster and coffee maker when i leave i use the wemo motion sensor to turn them back on when i am in the kitchen the cons i used my belkin energy use monitor and found out that each switch cost about 2 50 per year to operate that can be much more than the parasite energy consumption of any new appliance you are controlling they also have a slight delay that can be annoying in certain situation if you want to do more or build a smart home go right to smartthings or another z wave controller
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i love almost everything about the wemo switch it s surprisingly quick i expected it to be kind of slow but it s not at all the audible click of the relay is surprisingly satisfying and the power button on the switch wa a nice addition however the device itself is so unfortunately large and clunky and make it near impossible to fit anything else on the same outlet let alone 2 wemo switch it is also somewhat of an eye sore so if you re looking for something discrete this is not for you i d like to think that the new wemo mini is just a fast and a well designed a this one but smaller and le obtrusive but i have not got around to buying that one yet definitely go with that one if you can spare the cash other than that though great product 4 5 star i would and have recommended to friend and family
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: fantastic product i purchased two of these to pair
Review: fantastic product i purchased two of these to pair up with my amazon echo after downloading the app it took le than 3 minute to set up i beefed up my wifi signal and router a few month ago to 5g so i wa certain that the connection would be good the app work great and the amazon echo alexa pairing wa simple and easy based on other review i decided not to update the wemo firmware the switch are working great so why bother fixing something that is not broken until i am certain that the firmware update work and won t cause the switch to malfunction i will keep the using the current firmware version that wa already loaded other reviewer that have complaint may consider updating their router or contact their internet service providers isps and increasing their outage if you updated the firmware and the product is now not working perhaps return the switch get replacement and keep the firmware a is i absolutely love these and plan on purchasing several more to automate my home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great setup wasn t a easy a i had hoped
Review: works great setup wasn t a easy a i had hoped but i managed to figure it out without much difficulty i just downloaded a firmware update so maybe it will be easier in the future i use it with my amazon echo to control a lamp in my bedroom i do plan to buy more of these in the future

Review: just bought 2 of these on black friday and both of them don t work consistently at all they re all updated and i have 5 others in my house but these two will stay connected for about 5 10 minute and start blinking orange until unplugged and plugged back in they re only 20 foot away from my 400 wifi router so it s not a wifi issue these are garbage go buy the tp link switch version i have 9 and they all work and have never had issue in my 7 month of ownership
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the most recent app update added the much needed away mode that will allow you to create a schedule wherein light come on at random interval stay on for at least 30 minute and go off again this is important because a smart burglar will look for lamp on a timer set up wa easy on 5 of the 6 unit the sixth one required a factory reset before it showed up the app still need some work i find myself force closing the app a little too often because it is out of sync with the actual state of the outlet sometimes it fails to load a well on the first attempt it need some obvious thing like zone for easier timer creation and the ability to separate them on the device screen by category lamp fan appliance and custom group created by the user auto refresh would be nice too i have tried and failed with plenty of product in my desire to have some home automation and unless something drastic change i believe i have found my answer update 05 06 14 app version 1 5 1 fw 2 00 4494 i am experiencing some issue now the away mode doe not seem stay within it time constraint it give the home an unnatural look if light are coming on after certain time even with all the away mode timer disabled i have lamp coming on at odd time and some lamp not coming on when scheduled
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great smart plug probably my top choice
Review: i absolutely love these little thing i have smart plug by wemo tp link and iris and i think the wemos are my favorite set up is easy with the wemo app and it connects to my echo with ease i also like that the plug don t cover up the bottom plug on a typical wall outlet you do need to use the upper plug if you want to use both the wemo is pretty shallow too and fit behind pretty much any bookshelf or bed like the plug on a power strip would the construction seems sturdy like it should not like a cheap piece of plastic i haven t had any connectivity problem at all since i started using it and i don t anticipate any all in all i m a fan
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: should be great when it work but in my case it can t connect to wifi once unplugged returning
Review: i guess it s a great product when it work however if something go wrong expect to spend quite a bit of time to search for guidance on troubleshooting starting with url for product or support found it in fine print on the box yes i m aware of google search no i still like to have url on the box for the product i paid for now i understand why overall rating on amazon and on other site is not that great i configured it when it wa plugged in an easily accessible outlet everything work great i can turn it on an off using wemo app i have alexa integration enabled and can see how i m turning it on and off with my voice great right wrong when i plugged it to the outlet few foot from the easily accessible one it didn t connect to wifi ok let me try another outlet that is even closer to my wifi router that is also few foot from all of these outlet no it won t connect to wifi i don t like this fragility at all everything is setup and device ha a simple task connect to specific wifi once you re plugged in wifi signal is strong device fails to connect i m sorry i m not going to spend more of my time fighting whatever is the reason i m returning it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: does not work with amazon echo alexa i wa able to configure it with the wemo app but alexa wa never able to detect it going through support to try all of the obvious failed after resetting the device it became flaky and would work some of the time and not at all other time i ended up returning and replacing it with a different brand of similar device and it work flawlessly with alexa going by my own experience and all of the review this device is not ready for prime time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: which is a very good direction
Review: i put it in my daughter s room and paired with amazon echo reason being my 5y daughter said it s too dark in her room and she dare not go there by herself when it s the time at night now she shout out alexa turn on the light please while on the stair to the 2nd floor she now like to go upstairs earlier than before which is a very good direction
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: kept turning it self off and on creeped me out real bad
Review: worked great until i moved and then it randomly started switching itself off and on it started out slowly at first and just got worse and i kept thinking i wa being haunted which wa ridiculous so i just unplugged it and threw it in a drawer since then i have not noticed any other supernatural occurrence so this product must just suck also wa such a pain to try to set up via the app it would always fail to connect the first time and maybe a couple more time after that was long delay for alexa to turn light off sometimes very annoying i think smart plug technology need refinement at this time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i would hate to have to touch every one of these every
Review: i bought this device to control some electronics with amazon s echo after going through the short setup process through the phone i tried it out with echo and it the echo said my connected home wa not set up and to contact customer support shortly after a message came up in the wemo app saying i needed to do a firmware update on the switch this happened two more time each about 5 minute apart once the wemo app said that the switch wa on the latest firmware i tried again to have the echo find the device and finally had success it worked flawlessly until this morning when i asked the echo to turn on the lamp the echo responded ok which mean it sent the command but the lamp didn t turn on i tried a couple more time with the same result finally i walked over to the switch and pressed the blue on button this seemed to wake up the device and echo wa once again able to control it i m not sure if this is supposed to work this way or not i would hate to have to touch every one of these every morning just to be able to control it with the echo with it being plugged in i would assume it would always stay connected to the wifi we ll give it more time and see what happens but that is why only the four star other than this it ha worked flawlessly
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i love my wemo switch i use it to light up my chrismas tree it wa so easy to hook up it took me just second i use it s integration with alexa so all i have to do is say alexa turn off on christmas tree and wala it s must buy for a smart home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: while i love this when it work it can be so infuriating when it go wrong the setup is kind of easy sometimes it doesn t find the wemo sometimes when i do the hard reset and set it up all the way to the end the wemo will not the found a a device and i have to start over again sometimes it doesn t find the wifi and so i cannot control it anymore sometimes there is a delay from pressing the wemo to the object plugged in turning on this is a problem because i think it didn t turn on and so i press the button again and then it turn it off but then again once it work it s great to have it s another item that i can setup with my smartthings hub i really wish the setup wa easier than they advertise here s my story of trying to get it to work it took me 15 20 minute to do a hard reset because i thought i could just hold down the restore button while plugged in but it did not work the way wemo advertises it should take a lot quicker than that i thought it did work at first because my phone found the wemo on wifi but then could not connect so i have to do the unplug the wemo hold down restore button plug it back in while still holding down the restore button and the release when the light is blinking amber quickly even after that it didn t work completely and i got too frustrated so i gave up and i ll try again later
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: my husband alexa and i all approve one of the best alexa compatible switch i have seen and we have a fully functioning smart home we connected this to our fan in bedroom so we don t have to get out of bed when we forget to turn it on which you all know is awful when you are all cozy and you have to rock paper sizzors for who ha to get cold again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have wasted so much time on this product that i feel like belkin should pay me for my time unfortunately i purchased 4 switch and a motion detector at the same time 2 year ago since then i have spent so much time rebooting resetting and reinstalling these that it boggles my mind every time there is a firmware update the switch need to be reset that process can take a long a an hour multiply that by the number of firmware update and the number of device i have and you have enough time to develop your own product please take my advice and do not buy these they are useless
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: although set up wa quirky i wa initially happy with it until i had to upgrade my home router i have never been able to get it re connected it won t even give me it own wi fi to start the connect sequence i ve tried on multiple occasion thinking somehow it might magically work and i ve been through every trouble shooting technique on the web to no avail it s a complete waste of money if it won t even connect to it own wi fi server much le your home router

Header: recommended work perfectly but hog outlet space and make buzzing noise
Review: works really well and is so convenient i use this to control a desk lamp from my bed pros work perfectly a designed simple to set up schedule are great and very versatile cons it make a high pitched buzzing sound that power adapter and light sometimes make most people might not notice this but i am sensitive to these noise so if you are too be warned it take up a good chunk of outlet space if you are using the other socket for a larger plug this might not coexist there is only 1 plug obviously based on the picture but you realize this more when you lose outlet space

Header: good product when using 3rd party software
Review: had to go through setup 3 time before it stuck once connected to wifi it really struggled with keeping a solid connection although it s only 10 foot from my ultra powerful router no other wireless device have issue with connectivity and there are sometimes a many a 20 between the 2 bridged router in my home as soon a you set it up ditch the native app if you have an android and download automation manager for wemo takes a little tinkering to setup but once you do the possibility are endless regarding rule and tasker integration
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: first smart switch to hook up to my echo dot not much to it use the app switch to wemo wifi found the device configure a name you can change it later in the app set the home wifi access the have the echo discover the device and basically done one note i had ad blocking on when i first tried and it couldn t connect turned it off and worked fine plugged in the extension cord that ha the xmas tree and some other light so i can turn them on and off without getting behind the tree echo turn off christmas killer
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: latest firmware upgrades seem to have really stabilized this product
Review: i have 3 wemo s in total now when i first bought them i had issue with random disconnect from the network but since the last firmware upgrade that belkin have done they seem to be a stable a a rock if you have multiple bridge access wireless zone a i have i did have issue on occasion with being able to access see the wemo from one of more of the remote access point again since the last firmware upgraded that issue also seems to have been fixed i actually love this product i use it in so many novel way example applied to the input to the psu on my gate electromagnetic lock system i can let someone in to the garden from my i phone without giving out the access code to the front panel from anywhere in the world i use the feature on a regular basis example fedex delivery can call me at the gate i let them in by powering psu off from wemo i reset the wemo on and the gate re lock they leave the package at the front door and leave using the internal access exit switch to exit security and convenience all in one
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: update i have now had 2 of my 3 switch fail and not be able to connect to my wifi belkin wemo support is horrible i spent an hour trouble shooting this before i contacted them only to be on chat for over 30 minute before i had to redo everything i already did i am automating my home light and i tried this the ihome and the tplink i returned the others and kept this i don t have a smarthings hub yet but i use alexa to control this and love it so much i use this to control my undercabinet led light just on off no color but i love that when i m cooking and forget to turn on my light i can just tell alexa and she doe it i leave them set to white for cooking i also like i and turn it on manually very easily
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: will not purchase this product again
Review: i tend to wait several week prior to writing a review to make sure that i have ample time to accurately evaluate product performance i found the setup a little difficult documentation is poor relative to other technical product that i have setup i have my wemo switch linked with my amazon dot the one main reason why i only gave this product one star is due to the switch constantly losing connection with my network the switch is located within 20 foot from my router almost line of site i have many other wireless device in my home that are located three time this distance and have never experienced any problem or dropout this ha occurred at least once a week for the several week that the switch ha been installed i had to constantly unplug an plug the switch in order to connect to my network if you read the review carefully you will see that this is a known problem my network is operating perfectly and have not experienced any of my other device dropping off the network except the switch this is a very frustrating problem the next switch that i order will be a tp link switched i have 2 friend that are using tp link switch and have not experienced any problem at all bottom line read the review carefully before purchasing
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: garbage stay far away will die after a few month
Review: garbage worked great for about 2 3 month then started having problem periodically but if i refreshed the wemo it would work fine now it will not connect to my wifi no matter what i do i have refreshed and reset my entire wifi system numerous time and it just will not connect i have tried to contact belkin 3 time because it s still under warranty and i can never get anyone on the phone i ve waited over 25 minute each time and still wa not able to speak to someone so i hang up because i have a newborn and cannot spend a ridiculous amount of time waiting to speak to someone

Review: i got this device when is wa on sale at amazon i already have the amazon and echo and wanted an easy way to turn the light on and off on the christmas tree the device is fairly easy to set up you must make sure that your network frequency and the wemo frequency match i run on the 5 frequency and there wa not a problem for some reason after the amazon echo discovered the wemo it took a short while for the name of the wemo to be recognized but after a short period i can now say alexia turn on the christmas tree light and with in a second the light come on you can hear the relay inside the wemo click on and off if there are any problem with the wemo i will update this review
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: absolutely the worst piece of tech i ve ever owned
Review: absolutely the worst piece of tech i ve ever owned really it s not an exaggeration the worst hand down connecting to this device is an extremely mind numbing experience that entail nothing but every single swear word you can scream at an inanimate object i have owned wireless printer multiple router the amazon echo several laptop switch server among other device and i haven t come barely close to the level difficulty to connecting and maintaining this piece of how on earth did belkin release this or signed off on this it s staggering how awful this thing is
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i have a surge protector not sure if they recommend against that plugged into one of them
Review: i bought two of these setup wa straight forward i plugged it into the wall switched my wifi to the wemo went through the step and within a few minute the switch wa working i have a surge protector not sure if they recommend against that plugged into one of them to that i have a humidifier and a heater plugged in it s been nearly 2 week and i absolutely love it i can be in out and about and a the evening approach i can turn on my wemo switch which will make my bedroom nice and cozy by the time i get home my second switch is for a light in my living room it s in an awkward corner and difficult to get to with the wemo it s never been simpler to turn on the light i have yet to use the timer feature however wemos integration with ifttt make it even better i have my living room light go on when the sun set it work so well that i ve purchased a wemo light switch the only complaint i have about the wemo is the android widget it s very convenient when it work it s actually awesome when it work however there are time when the button are non reactive you click them and nothing happens you actually have to open the app up and let everything refresh before thing work again overall i would buy more and probably more of the wemo family product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this smart plug is great i currently have it controlling my christmas tree i like that i can easily set a different schedule for weekday v weekend from the app on my phone it also work great with alexa my kid love to say alexa turn on christmas tree she immediately say okay and it turn on we didn t need to enable a skill with alexa i just said alexa discover smart device and she wa ready to go set up of the plug wa easy from my phone i just followed the on screen direction i wish i would have bought more for black friday pricing of 20 as much a i like it i don t have a pressing enough need to buy more for 40 when the price drop again i ll buy several more though
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i love these switch i used to use plug with remote control but it wa a pain to have several remote lying around and trying to figure out which one wa which right now i have my indoor christmas light plugged into these tree garland i have these set up with my echo dot and i created a group called christmas light now i just ask alexa to turn on the christmas light and they all come on at once the only reason for only 4 star is because the set up with the phone could be easier with my phone i have to go in and turn off some setting to get the plug info connected but once it is connected it work perfectly
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great product and work with amazon echo perfectly
Review: i currently own 4 of these switch bought on amazon i use them with regular floor lamp and control them via the app and amazon echo via voice these work wonderful 2 are setup in my entertainment area and i can turn my light on and off from the couch with just my voice the other 2 are setup in my bedroom and i can turn our nigh light on and off the same way the only problem i ve had is setting up the schedule for when i am away the app hang up and won t process the schedule besides that my wife and i love these especially when using the echo i highly recommend these switch only reason for the 4 5 star is for the app issue
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works occasionally at best will sometimes decide to flash blue and refuse
Review: works occasionally at best will sometimes decide to flash blue and refuse to turn on even when pressing the power button unplugging and plugging back in seems to work every so often to reset the device connecting to the network is decently easy that is when the mobile app doesn t out right crash the app is worse than the plug crashing every time i try to turn the device on or off at least is pair with the echo but even that ha a heck of a time trying to connect to this thing avoid and go with something better
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: very useful gadget how it work is simply through one of the following option option 1 through mobile app wemo to switch on off lighting or other device either on the wlan or remotely from outside option 2 set certain light at home to switch on off by sunset sunrise according to location set by you in my case for example manama city in kingdom of bahrain the sunrise sunset are automatically set via internet best part is in the morning when we wake up to work and you need that extra 5 minute to get ready to work instead of going around the house switching off the night lamp option 3 still not tested through amazon echo alexa vocal command to perform switch on switch off pros very convenient especially that my wife is pregnant and sometimes it is a hassle for her when i m not around to turn light on off around the house at night we sometimes have to wake up at night and go to daughter s room when she wake up this is a good feature to turn on daughter s room lighting before we reach to her just to comfort her when she wake up in the middle of the night another good option is to control house lighting while away from home cons some switch work on wlan and are not detected remotely while others are totally the opposite and they keep on refreshing and sometimes they appear and other time they are not detected therefore i have set some of them to automatic on off option one of the switch ha a small buzzing sound something like the old internet dial up sound but a little more discrete not sure whether it is faulty although it is functioning well overall the product is really nice and i would greatly appreciate if belkin can create a device that can control air conditioning working with ir remote control and also to have more option and size for light switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love this little wemo and i want more of them
Review: i really like the little wemo switch i have two now and want to add many more the biggest issue i ve had with these is that if they are blocked a bit by something they may lose wifi signal it s only happened a couple of time on one of mine and after i moved it a bit i think i ve solved the issue i love the easy integration with amazon echo alexa i love saying alexa turn the back yard light on and seeing all my edison light turn on in the back yard pretty cool wemo i can t wait to see what you do next
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i gave this item 5 star even though i had a small hiccup in the initial setup i want to emphasize small hiccup once connected to your wireless network these plug work extremely well i have one controlling my lamp on my nightstand and the other controlling the light on our christmas tree which will end up controlling our tv power after christmas is over if i can think of more place where i would use these plug i will buy more
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: need better instruction try these hope this help you
Review: had 1 switch already working bought 2 more app would not see them i wa able to get them to work all 3 but had to force android phone to connect to each a a wi fi network and do each individually reset all device switch android app uninstalled installed rebooted phone prior to doing this had to do a this page show on android wi fi setting advanced i turned off notify me and scanning always available this part from webpage should be explained some where that it work when doing this basically you must add 1 at a time connect to next one in wifi device android setting wi fi then close open wemo and add it each one change name and save with network info in wemo app after all 3 added they do work changes back the setting in android settings wi fi advanced on android wi fi setting advanced i turned back on notify me and scanning always available turned off phone wi fi to test the switch also work from 3g connection good luck tim
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i got the plug to help me turn on off a hard to reach lamp behind the couch i realized i had to turn off the cell service on my phone in order to keep belkin wifi connected during installation as soon a i figured that out the rest wa a breeze it work well and seamlessly with my echo the only thing i wish could improve is to get rid of the clicking sound every time turning on off the plug it s a little loud and bother my dog it probably reminds them the annoying clicker during dog training anyway it s a great product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great add on for the amazon echo
Review: excellent controller that work extremely well with the amazon echo device setup could not be easier i ve used many similar device in the past insteon x 10 etc but this one actually works every time if you have an echo you ll enjoy it that much more if you install a few of these gadget to control light a c and anything else you want to control with your voice also work flawlessly with my iphone app so that i can turn light on and off from anywhere i have internet great
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: never got it to work on both an iphone and android
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: turn out the lights the party s over
Review: use this product in conjunction with amazon echo no more hand clapping not that i ever did light on light off for me i have two of these and have set them on scheduled time i can use the app on my smart phone to turn them on and off from anywhere and a stated previously i also use these with amazon echo can be a little tricky setting up but if you follow the instruction on the app i e discover and set them up on the app first and then your wifi you should be just fine i highly recommend
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: unreliable what is automation if you have to physically be there to reset the device when it disconnect
Review: wow be prepared for the most unreliable product to ever hit the market my dell tablet is more reliable than this thing i give 2 star because when it work it just work well aside from the app being super slow to load and search for device albeit it still work but for random reason unexplained the outlet will become not connected to the network and the only way you can get it back on the network is to pull it out and plug it back in not even pressing the physical button on the outlet will reconnect it it seriously need a pull out and in maneuver so at a time you want to activate it and you are not near the outlet you are out of luck until you go back to the outlet and physically reset it this is horrendous for a product that sell itself for automation just hope that if you have something you absolutely need turned on remotely that it will be connected when you need to myself i use it a remote garage door opener to let guest in when i am not around the fact that i can t rely on this defeat the purpose of why i bought it but hell it work sometimes i just have to cross my finger and even when it work i would do a hard reset the morning of if i am sure i will need to activate it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: would be cool if it would work
Review: i am pretty tech savvy but cannot get this thing to work every now and then it will actually connect to my network but when i proceed to do the firmware update it loses connection and can never be found again this could be an awesome device if only it could work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: my espresso machine is preheated when i wake up bliss
Review: i need my coffee first thing i have this switch turn on my espresso machine before i wake up so that it is preheated and ready to go when i am this device wa easy to set up using my iphone i used the app to connect to the switch wirelessly and connected it to my 5th gen airport extreme router had to reset it after daylight saving time hit last fall recently had to reset the switch again when it started having trouble connecting to my router and then finally failed turned out to be the router going bad not the switch s fault at all i could accomplish most of this with a cheap light timer but if i wake up early or late i can hit the switch from upstairs using my ipad then by the time i make it to the kitchen the espresso machine is preheated the only thing that would be better is if my husband were to get up and make the latte for me and then deliver it to me in bed
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: work great with the amazon alexa gives me some peace of mind when my wife arrives home she can turn the light on in the house from the wemo app a well if you have the amazon alexa in your bedroom and you forgot to turn the light off in the living room no problem alexa will do it for you i have also ordered the amazon dot to keep in the living room
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it ha a cute surprised face but horrendously unreliable
Review: i bought this just like everyone else to pretend that we re at home while hundred of mile away on vacation we used with a light by the window and tried with the app on my iphone the set up wa very easy even for a technologically challenged gal like me we were so excited and well the timer worked half the time and sometimes the light turned on few minute later but most of the time it didn t turn on at all and turning on via app wa the same sometimes it turned on and other time it didn t we decided that it wa not reliable enough and ditched it a switch that worked via wi fi is such a nice concept and it s so miserably unreliable now it s sitting on my desk greeting me with the cute surprised look on the front
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i m frustrated with these plug they are hit or miss i ve connected them to alexa and they work consistently on a schedule but whenever i ask alexa to turn them off or on she usually reply that they re not responding and if i try to use the wemo app to turn them on or off it often indicates the plug is not detected so i have to get up and push the button on the plug to turn them on or off totally negating their purpose not to mention that they are so large there are not many other item with a plug small enough to make use of the other outlet also they seem to require an update every few month and every time the update lock up get stuck for over 24 hour and i ultimately have to manually reset them altogether and reconnect them to alexa i m over it i just purchased replacement from another major brand i already have 2 from that brand in another room and those work without fail i m giving two star because i knew about their likelihood of blocking the second outlet when i bought them and they do work properly when a schedule rule is programmed
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this is my second such switch and i m quite pleased with their performance and the phone app that control them both are used to control my through wall air conditioner it s so night to turn them on 30 minute before i head home so the house is already cooled down when i walk in the door if it s only mildly hot outside then i have the option of turning on just one the company is routienly updating the app always seeming to make improvement where they can i never had any problem with the app but they still seem to find way to make it better
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: ordered and wa not sure if wa a good idea a i have had no luck with belkin product in the past well i should have listened to my inner voice i got two of them it wa a constant battle to keep them connected and working alexa and echo are both great but never again for any belkin product both are defective and cannot seem to find and maintain a connection to by wifi network which is a linksys modem and wireless router with linksys extender all of which work great am going to toss the wemo device a my window to return ha run out do not i repeat do not waste money on this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: but once they were it worked like a dream
Review: it took me a while to get alexa and the plug on the same page but once they were it worked like a dream full disclosure i installed this in my grandparent living room so that they could get some lighting without having to navigate through darkness or fumble for a switch of course when i learned that with the wemo app i can turn the light on and off from anywhere thing got a bit out of hand thankfully the grandparent were entertained with the mysterious light that would go on and off during their evening newspaper reading and tennis watching so it all turned out okay and they are much more comfortable telling alexa what to do now
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have my security camera system plugged into this because sometimes a camera go offline and i need to power the system off and back on remotely i wa very happy with it until i had a power outage this week when the power came back on this thing stayed off instead of returning to the previous state i didn t realize until a day later that my camera were off this is unacceptable and i will be looking for a different brand if this one problem were fixed this would be a great product i did a search for this problem and found people complain about this 5 year ago so i don t have any hope that wemo will fix it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it really is simple to work
Review: ordered mine x 3 they arrived promptly in working order if you can read and follow sequential instruction these are simple and straight forward making set up a breeze and they worked the first time without a glitch this device work perfectly with the wemo app on my amazon fire phone kindle fire hdx echo and echo dot smart home in the alexa app i couldn t be happier with their simplicity and functionality
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: beware this is old dated product
Review: could not pas up the 20 00 price on amazon this weekend so i ordered 2 switch to go with the 6 i already had first off this is old inventory that is not comparable with apple home kit also the firmware wa old and will not update as a result i can no longer get to my rule because this product requires all switch on the network be running the same firmware the only thing that work is turning the switch on and off from the app no rule no iffft i sent an email to belkin support i m not holding my breath very disappointed that by simply adding these switch the one that have run great for year are now crippled
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i consider myself tech savvy and yet i have not been able to connect this device to my router it throw password error when the password is correct or it simply wont connect i ve been at it for two hour if you are the type who like to buy a new product and then immediately read through and try 15 or so troubleshooting step in your mobile device and router setting page then this is for you good luck god bless sending this back asap update belkin tech support said my switch wa defective i returned it and got a replacement which also would not connect to my wifi network i tried a galaxy note 4 and a galaxy note 3 don t get excited if you have an iphone in my hour of troubleshooting i came across many iphone user with the same problem stay away shame on you belkin
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: awesome for the novelty factor wouldn t trust it for vital activity
Review: full disclosure i m a tech nerd so i think anything smart and controllable with my phone is pretty awesome that being said i really like this wemo what i don t like is the android app that control it up until recently the app wa utterly unusable a in it simply did not work it would consistently crash and when it didn t function like rule just wouldn t work with the latest update however the app seems to be pretty stable and i ve been able to control my standing floor lamp well if you are like me and obsessed with controlling everyday item with your phone get it if you re looking to rely on this thing for vital function in your everyday life go the dumb route and use your hand
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: must have for the smart home
Review: i have been using a few of the wemo switch and they are great the biggest plus for me is that they word with a hidden wi fi network and connectivity is great i have four of these now and they make life quite a bit more efficient with being able to schedule on and off time when i am away from home well made durable quality product for your money belkin keep updating their software and in the year that i have had them they only have gotten better in term of software good bang for your buck
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great with my amazon echo
Review: i use this on my christmas tree right now and work like a charm definitely love using this device with amazon echo highly recommend it to anyone with echo or you can just use the app it ha if you don t have echo makes my tree a perfect night light when needing to get up in the middle of the night to grab a drink or use the bathroom and what not probably will buy one or two more once i figure out where and how i want to use them got some idea but not concrete yet definitely not disappointed
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i hesitated buying this i have cat and often have to tip toe through the bedroom at night i use this with a wall light and i love it you can name it what you want so much easier to get around in my room now and if i am out and will have my hand full when i return i simply call to my echo from the stair and the light is on when i enter i can even turn it on when i pull up to the house and do not have to enter a dark home easy to set up once you know what you are doing a great way to save electric i plan on having my hall light on one of these then when people leave it on i can turn it off myself

Header: loving my wemo smart plug more with alexa and ifttt
Review: i now have 4 of these device i love them and even more now that i have them configured via ifttt and alexa it make it easier asking alexa to trigger them on or off individually or all together via ifttt feel free to reply to this post if you need help advise on configuring your wemo plug with ifttt happy to help

Header: gather your patience these device are hit or miss
Review: i purchased a few of the plug switch to get my home up and running and it is nothing but a nightmare the first plug device installed within a reasonable amount of time but from there it wa all downhill i tried everything reinstalled the wemo app restarted my android phone etc and when searching for the other device the system could not find them after 1 45min it finally found 1 device but my amazon echo alexa could not find that second device that wa in my wifi list of device connected can someone please tell me what is going on well patient a i am i will make a couple more attempt and contact support for the 4th time this system is hit or miss i would not recommend this device not even to my enemy read the other review and see if others are experiencing the same issue
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works fine except for a problem with wifi password
Review: my wemo switch work fine now that it s set up but setting it up wa a frustrating experience because it can t deal with wifi password that contain space character i had to reconfigure my wifi network to use a different password and reprogram all my other device to use the new password the wemo people really should explain this limitation up front rather than requiring the user to figure it out by trial and error or even better they should change the firmware to remove the limitation
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i can not tell you how much i love these smart plug i have them paired with the amazon echo to control the light in my living room it is fun to tell alexa to turn the light off and on these work very well i have had them for quite a while and never had a problem i also like the fact that i can control the switch with my iphone app from anywhere handy when you forget to leave light on pretty funny to watch the look on my guest face when i voice command my light off and on i will be purchasing more of these for the rest of my house
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works in other part of the world with 220 240v line voltage without a transformer using only a plug adapter
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great idea really really bad execution
Review: when i first set it up it wa so easy and cute i ordered a second one i wa too hasty they both suffer from the same issue so i am assuming it is a design flaw and not a one off glitch at any undetermined time of their choosing the wemo s decide to stop receiving wifi signal thinking perhaps my wi fi signal wa too weak i placed them 10 foot from my router after 48 hour they were both unresponsive it wa a great idea and certainly not technically challenging but poorly executed my guess is that the wifi receiver in the wemo is just not sensitive enough i am going to try belkin customer support if that doesn t solve the problem amazon expect them both back
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it work but with so many problem
Review: pros 1 it work especially the switch on the app i don t see any lag about this it can be turned on off immediately when i touch the switch on the app 2 easy to setup just follow the guide it s not hard to set up it even though it s no so fast cons 1 the app on android suck it s the worst app i have used i can hardly input the device name and change the time because the weird app design it doesn t follow any android style design 2 still the app on android i cannot edit the rule after i set it up it keep showing looking for rule it s a serious bug therefore i have to use ifttt which is a good replacement of the timing rule but it need the internet working since the rule is in the cloud and compared with the local rule you have to accept 3 10 minute lag with ifttt 3 fortunately there s a third party app a a replacement of official app even though it get 4 5 star on the play market it doesn t mean that it way more better to use lag is still the main problem even with the direct switch update after one month i realise that it can be unstable since sometime on ifttt com it s showing wemo switch is offline so that it doesn t work through ifttt i have to reconnect the decive to my router
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have a bunch of these and they work great easy to set up and control with echo during the christmas season i hook them up to the window candle light also use to control living room and bed room lamp a well a one for my quartz heater i can turn it on and off from bed the remote for the heater is very limited a in you have to be with in a couple of foot for the oem remote to work i also have a wemo wall switch for the ceiling fan light what would be nice is if wemo would develop a pc app i can use on my laptop
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a staple for any home not just smart one
Review: i wa a fairly early adopter of all thing smart home even when i just had an apartment so with belkin being one of the pioneer in smart home integration it natural that i tried this out i ve used the d link smart plug a well but belkin is the best by far i now use about 4 of these and one smart switch on a daily basis the setup is simple the application allows for easy control of device whether you re home or not and even allows for custom schedule a great feature for when you re traveling and want to give off the appearance of being home i use mine mainly for light but there are so many useful feature and application for these plug light fan kid tv control wink highly recommend this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works well with smartthings but it must be registered to your network before it will work you first must get the wemo app and set up or register the plug after that smartthings will recognize the plug
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have purchased three of these now the oldest is only about a month old so i can not confirm the long term reliabaility but so far all work flawlessly installation using the app worked well easy to set up scheduling which worked well for aquarium light the set up to use with amazon echo dot wa very easy and seems to work without problem i also bought and own tp link and iris smart plug and the wemo is the one that work best for me and the only one of the three i would recommend
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i wa worried that this wouldn t work reliably as the night get cold i have to get the electric heater turned on out in the shop by 4 am some day in order to heat thing up by the time i get out there i used to have to get up crazy early to fiddle with a circuit breaker to make it happen now i just check the nightly temperature forecast pick a time and set my cell phone wemo app to turn on the heater through the wifi so far it ha worked every time and i don t have to get up early just to turn on the power and go back to bed since it ha never failed i give it five star i will say that i had to trim the casing of the other plug in the same outlet a bit so it would fit under this one but that wasn t really a big deal
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good device i wouldn t pay more than 35 for it
Review: these thing work the way they are supposed to set up is a little bit of a pain but shouldn t take more than 15 minute to complete it s a little large but nothing that would stand out horribly this can be moved a needed a well which is one of the nice thing about this device i am using mine with alexa and have only had issue a couple of time once in like maybe 20 us alexa may say ok but it not turn it on this could be an issue with alexa not with the wemo device

Review: i love the wemo product i use them for my outside light i had originally purchased these switch to act a a two way switch for thing connected to different outlet unfortunately that didn t work there s nothing in the core programming that doe this and the partnered programming app ifttt take around 5 minute to respond i wound up downgrading to simple wireless switch to complete my pseudo two way switch which worked wonderfully overall i ll still use these switch for other purpose but know they re not a robust a they portray themselves

Header: updated review it s working okay now
Review: update some update have this working well enough now so i bought two additional one hint i have better luck using the apple version of the app on my ipod than the android version on my phone original review worked well for about a week switch no longer broadcast wifi i m giving up after 6 hour trying all of the support instruction on their website which are minimal and poor troubleshooting my wifi network including setting it up from scratch trying to contact communicated with their support etc
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: this product is a piece of junk
Review: this product 1 is a good concept but that s all there is to it a good concept not a good product we really hoped for the best and thought wow what a great way to turn on and off our radio at home to scare away the racoon in our house or potential burglar right but no avail the product ha very poor reception in the house we have a drop cam in the same area and hand down the drop cam had better reception than this device all in all it never worked and we are happy to have returned it another irksome thing about it is that it take up the whole outlet both of them including the one on the bottom don t let the pic deceive you you will not be able to plug anything else on the outlet and the device only ha space for 1 device to be plugged in to it poor design b doe not work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: frustrating setup seems to be finally working but afraid to adjust anything further
Review: i am a pretty tech savy guy and have lot of misc internet connected gadget and this ha probably been the most frustrating one to set up and working consistently first of all while it did initially connect using them it seems this wemo is not fully compatible with wpa2 key with special character in them it seems to only like key with letter and number after my wemo lost connectivity and had to be factory reset about 10 time i finally gave up and created virtual wifi network just for the wemo with a much simpler wpa2 key using only letter and number the app seems pretty flaky a well i use android and the app doe not appear to follow any sort of modern android ui standard it seems like something that wa ported from maybe the ios version or slapped together quickly i wa prompted to install several firmware update through the app but i ended up locking the wemo up several time during this to where it needed to be factory reset again and had to start over the firmware update ha no status bar to know when it is done it just say it will take about 10 minute and make some dumb joke about how you can go play angry birds while you wait once i got it going i went into the rule section of the app just looking around and ended up crashing the wemo during the process or it wa a good coincidence anyways so now that i got it back working again i am basically afraid to touch anything else in fear of having to factory reset it and start over again i placed a call to tech support before i figured out the whole wpa2 special character issue which they took me through some very basic troubleshooting step and then decided to elevate me to level 2 support who i have been playing phone tag with for 3 day to wrap up my long winded story it work now i don t know how reliable it will be and the firmware and app seem beta quality at best i hope it stay working i only recommend this to people with simple network key and the will to mess around with it to get it working
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: not working properly can t get it to connect really annoying
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works well with my echo dot hardest part wa the wemo app setup app want to send you to a tutorial that is not totally clear and won t let you transfer to the setup step during the tutorial shifting from wemo app to phone setting to alexa app wa confusing didn t try it but i wonder if the wemo app would work on a kindle fire if not then you had better have a smartphone handy or you will not be able to do the setup but after all that the switch work very well with the dot
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good for unimportant stuff but ha a major flaw for anything where staying on while you re gone is important
Review: warning this device will keep whatever device is plugged into it off after any kind of power interruption it doe not remember whether it wa on or off when it lost power and maintain that state so instead it will default to off every time the power flicker if you just want to turn some random light appliance in your home on off and it wouldn t be an emergency if that thing stay off until you notice it this is probably a good product and priced appropriately this may or may not be an issue for you depending on your application but since i wa trying to run a water circulation pump with it to keep water line from freezing this simply wouldn t work for my application i ve gone with one of the samsung smart things hub and outlet even though they cost significantly more you get far more option to go with a correspondingly higher price tag giving it 3 star because it didn t work for me but i realize i have an unusual requirement it would be kind of annoying for most people and a nonissue for some but it really shouldn t be happening
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: doesn t accept modern wifi security alpha numeric doesn t suffice for wpa2 and that is all it tolerates for your wifi passwords it is a joke that they claim that this thing is compatable i don t wish to compromise my entire network for one poorly designed device even when i tried conforming and configuring my network to satisfy their poorly published need i found the device and their software to be unreliable at best edit below is a tip directly quoted from belkin support for clarification a to my issue with this product troubleshooting your wemo connection to the wi fi network tip 4 make sure your router s wireless network ssid is set to broadcast or not hidden otherwise your wemo device may have difficulty connecting and maintaining a connection to it wemo support wpa2 password of eight 8 to 63 character comprised of letter and number only wemo will fail to connect to your network if your wireless password contains any space or symbol in it if you want to change the wireless network password of your belkin router click here
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good product that doe what it say
Review: this item work a advertised installation very easy and straight forward plug unit in install app on smart phone create account connect smartphone to wemo via wifi follow instruction however the unit did not pick up my wifi although it picked up my neighbor i moved to closer location completed setup and moved back to desired location pros a easy remote control of light b able to schedule light for on off period c echo control via ifttt d installs in top wall outlet w o interfering with bottom outlet cons a pricy for functionality b noted problem in setup with easy work around
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: easy to set up very useful with alexa
Review: i love these switch they are extremely easy to set up you can get the wemo app and control the switch through the app a long a they are connected to wifi at all time extremely easy to connect with alexa a well if you have an amazon echo product always turning on off light with alexa i have 2 of these smart plug and planning on buying more one neat feature i use is that i create a group through the alexa app and i can tell alexa to turn off all of the light to make sure that the switch turn off very useful when leaving home in a hurry
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: very impressed with the reliability of this unit after trying the cheaper model
Review: we chose this device after trying a cheaper version that wa too unreliable we needed a remote control switch that we could rely on to reset an automation and security system while we are away from our vacation home we ve had this unit for a few month now and it ha been completely reliable when accessed and actuated remotely the price seemed too high at first but after trying the cheaper version we are happy to pay the difference to have a switch that we know will work when we need it it wa very easy to setup using ios an android we have not needed the scheduling capability but it seemed very easy and straightforward

Review: i purchased this for my amazon echo but didnt want to wait until i got the echo so i installed it right away took maybe 5 minute to set up and i wa able to turn my light on and off from my phone it is wonderful i used it afterwards for my christmas tree to keep from having to go behind the tree and step on the plug i got my echo for christmas and now i can turn it on and off with voice command a well i ahve since purchased three more these are a game changer

Header: hit or miss be ready to return the garbage one
Review: these thing are hit or miss and belkin know it sometimes they don t work at all and sometimes they work on the first try sometimes they work for awhile a couple of month and then they quit working i ve bought so many of these thing and had to return more than half of them be ready to test them and make sure they work and hope they work for more than a couple of month i think they ran into a bad chipmaker and didn t do qa on the production line just be ready to return them because most likely if they they don t work from the beginning they ll never work

Header: only buy if you have the time and patience to deal with this frustrating product
Review: i bought this for some patio lighting and at first it worked ok for about a month it took about 20 minute to set up with my iphone 6 and an old linksys router then after a month it just stopped working no wireless network change nothing new i spent hour trying to get it to work again without success then i bought a new linksys router in dec2015 i gave it another shot and it took about 2 hr of changing network setting reading online recommendation and resetting the switch until it finally worked i m not sure what actually did the trick there is no reason it should take this much time and frustration to get something like this to work i would not recommend any one buy this unless you have the time and patience for it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use this with for space heater holmes portable desktop heater with comfort control thermostat and cool touch housing hfh111t nu in the basement where room get cold i have an echo in that room i can quickly say alexa turn on my heater within nanosecond the heater start working the alexa command is faster than my philips hue pros set up wa breeze integrated really nicely with alexa does not block other outlet cons wish the plug wa bit smaller

Review: i bought these 5 wemo switch plug and have nothing but trouble with them from day one 4 will work for a week or so then one will go offline it will take me hour to get it to work again after hard reset and deleting the app and reinstalling it a per customer service and bloggs and it will work for a week then another one will go offline and i have to do it all again i am finally done with them and have switched to another system which ha been in place for 1 month now with no issue very disappointment
