Header: alexa turn on the christmas tree
Review: i got one of these wemo switch plug with an echo i got a second one and am currently using it for the christmas tree but plan to rename it and use it elsewhere in the house after the holiday i ve had no issue with the plug in the last 5 month since i got the first one the setup is easy and the timer is nice and simple plus you can turn your light on and off or set the timer from anywhere you have internet connection if you are looking at the light switch wall toggle replacement you have to have a third neutral wire for constant power i ordered one but had to ship it back because my old house doesn t have it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: have 3 of these and 2 wemo switch absolutely love how easy thing have been it wa a little confusing first setting up the turn on at sunset and off at sunrise setting but a quick youtube video helped now thing work perfectly one thing i learned wa you can add multiple rule to the device for a long time i had a monday to friday setting to have the light on in the evening when we got home until bedtime on the weekend i would have to do thing manually until i realized you could do multiple rule set now i have a bunch of rule that control morning evening and weekend life is good
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good but not the best out there
Review: these are in general pretty good but some time they do act up and disappear from your network at random the work directly with alexa once set up correctly to power on or off a plug in appliance or lamp or the like you can also set up schedule and manipulate these applainces so long a your network is up and you have internet where you are trying to operate the switch i use these for lamp that comprise my light path so alexa tell them to turn on so i can see where i m going again once they are on and stable they are pretty solid but i ve had much fewer issue with the zwave switch and outlet that are hard wired in term of convenience though these are plug and play and a great way to make sure that home automation is something that you can or can t live without test but don t judge the current smart home technology out there by this switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have 3 of these now and plan on getting more now that echo support wemo device i ve used them for over a year now and love having access to my light via an app and setting rule for when they come on and off and being able to turn them on off via the app it s just cheap perfect home automation my only complaint would be that they are so big they really need to work on getting them to be a smaller size otherwise they work great i use them on lamp but plan on also trying the light switch a well once you try this you ll never go back it also work on my android and ios device so even guest when they come and get on my wifi they can download the app and if they get up in the night or something they can switch on the light or talk to alexa amazon echo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i really like this wemo switch there were a few review that really made me skeptical especially when it came to how these work or lack there of with certain wireless condition i have a setup that people complained about so i figured i would have only mixed success with this switch turns out that when it came it work marvelously super easy to setup easy to schedule no more plucking tiny prong out of a manual timer or having to deal with lost power or timer that don t keep time right these problem are all solved with this device can t say enough great thing about it only thing i miss is the multi socket version of some timer i guess all i need to do is plug in a 3 way but it would be nice to have version of the switch that just ha extra socket another super handy feature is being able to turn anything on with a touch of a button whether it is in the app or on the device itself perfect and great thinking belkin can t wait for 3 way light switch module please hurry
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a great addition to our home security plan
Review: useful function plus impressive result i purchased this switch for it s functionality and it delivers but it also really impress my friend based on it performance if you travel frequently you ll probably find the wemo switch useful you can turn light on and off at unpredictable time and that make home security a bit more secure plus if we re away longer than expected we can switch on a light on the way home my wife love being able to come home to a lit kitchen living room this is a great addition to our home security plan
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it is really easy to impress people with this
Review: wow it is really easy to impress people with this my in law think i am living in the home of the fiture because i can ask alexa to turn the light on and by magic the light turn on very easy to set up work great with alexa and with the wemo app a well
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: goes off on it own once in a blue moon
Review: i got a couple of these to allow me to restart security camera remotely it doe great except for the morning when i wake up and the camera are off and i didn t turn them off the switch turn itself off once in a blue moon i have no schedule set up or anything it just go off until i open the app and turn it on again i have now disabled remote access which basically open it up to internet to see if that solves my issue so just be cautious on what you control if it is something essential that can never go off without your permission then don t hook it up to this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: easy set up and work great
Review: very easy to set up and work a advertised i bought one smart plug just to see how i liked them i only use it with the app and on one plug with a light in it but it work great especially for a disabled family member who ha difficulty turning the light on and off i will definitely be purchasing more item though especially after i get an echo i ve read some complaint about issue setting this up but i had none and it took about 2 minute following the app s direction
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: does not work a advertised purchased for our cabin and tried it out at home first was very difficult to sync with our wireless but when it finally did it would work for awhile and then loose the connection 2 month later i took it to the cabin and i never could get it to work with the wireless even though it wa the same dsl provider and wireless modem a our primary residence unfortunately by then we were past the 30 day return period so now i guess all it s good for is a paper weight and probably not too good for that either
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: working great in my home theater
Review: got this together with the wemo maker to automate my home theater i put the projector on this switch wemo bulb in my lamp and the wemo maker on my electric screen s 12v trigger port my projector doesn t have a 12v trigger for a screen so used to have to use another remote just for the screen by using recipe on ifttt com i can use my iphone to turn on the projector which also trigger the screen to come down and the light to gradually go off i set them to fade over a minute but i could do them suddenly or even slower than a minute i also have recipe to reverse everything when i turn the projector off it s fun
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: first of all i think all the smart outlet are way overpriced so this one is no exception in that aspect hopefully price will come down soon in order to set it up you have to install the wemo app the app is terrible and need way too many permission in the setup you have to connect to the your wifi then the outlet and then back to your wifi it connected to my smartthings hub but it is not support by belkin or samsung so if you have problem you are on your own it is working with my smartthings automation when i run discovery on my amazon echo it find it twice once in the smartthings hub and once a a stand alone device when it it function it ha few millisecond delay compared my ge z wave outlet i am planning on using all zwave but wanted to try a wifi device overall this is okay the wemo app is terrible and a security concern once i setup the device i removed the app
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve had the switch installed 6 week and i have 7 disconnect from echo amazon rep is trying to blame belkin even though alexa claim it can t find the device it is still showing connected on my router and can be controlled from the wemo app on my cell phone i ve already spent 4 time the cost of the unit taking note talking on the phone to amazon and trying to re connect the device 4 time the re connect wa easy 2 time very difficult and this last time impossible even though i am past the 30 day window for return i will return it and if they give me a hard time i ll return the 2nd echo i purchased just to be able to activate one stupid switch i have three other brand smart plug in my shopping cart depending on amazon s response
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: we have a home business with personal fitness training from our gym wanted to add awesome lighting but didn t want to run more wire so we added the switch to the garage door opener outlet to control the led spot light and hue lightstrips connected it to our existing wemo account added it to amazon alexa and voila lights work great and customer enjoy the new set up and all i have to do is say alexa turn on the garage light thanks wemo an easy solution for a startup business mean a lot to u
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this switch work with alexa and ifft and work with apps on android and ios personally i think the future of switch like this is that they work with hub that control all smart device in one place so either alexa google home siri and ifttt so far this work with 2 of these i would like to see them working with homekit though since i have a sense that one day we will find these insecure and homekit is the only framework to really take security seriously
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: reliable once you get it setup
Review: we have 3 of these switch and each of them wa different to set up the first one wa a breeze and took about 3 5 minute the second one wa a real pain it is supposed to create it own wifi network but it wouldn t pop up on any of my device after literally day of sporadically turning thing off and on again i finally got it to work the third one miracoulously worked automatically with no issue maybe we just got a single bad one once set up they work effortlessly with the echo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: wait until they work out the bug probably after 2020 sometime
Review: i have had my belkin not wemo brand plug now for over 6 month and have loved them until i just changed router no one is not connecting and the amber light is constantly on and the timer is not working i did a factory reset and it took almost 5 attempt to set it up i installed the lastest firmware update restarted my android phone and still having issue looked for support and troubleshooting and it all read totally foreign to me
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: latest firmware update ha bricked all three of our wemo switch
Review: we purchased three wemo switch and after the latest firmware update they won t even turn on please note this doesn t mean they can t be turned on by the app this mean they cannot even be physically switched on in short the firmware update bricked all three device simultaneously and there is no way to fix them a quick perusal of the belkin wemo tech support site will demonstrate just how not forthcoming any help is from belkin and since we are just outside of the return window amazon ha not been helpful a well
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i own an amazon echo and wa looking for outlet that would connect with the device i followed the direction to connect the switch to the internet through the app the connection dropped i reset everything multiple time once i got the light that wa plugged into the device to turn on and then immediately lost the internet connection i worked on it for a couple of hour but never got to the point where i could connect it to my echo i returned the device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: set up wa very easy just follow the step in the 1 page instruction sheet setting up the rule wa a bit confusing because all of my wemo device were showing up at the same time i wanted to set up one device at a time and the symbol for more rule wa not apparent so took a while to figure out how to create multiple rule my two switch work a expected now they are now programmed to operate to mimic our normal usage while we are away from home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: it is a lot harder to setup than it need to be i have 3 of them and it took me about an hour to get them all connected to the wifi another issue with them is that every time the power flicker you lose connection and have to reconnect them every time the cable go out and you lose your internet connection you will have to reconnect them i have 1 out of the 3 that will automatically reconnect but the other two i have to go through the whole setup process my cellphone and other device automatically reconnect there is no reason these thing shouldn t other than that they work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it generally worked out of box wa best later firmware caused more problem than they fixed
Review: update upped to 4 star firmware app issue were mostly corrected i also noticed the vacation timer mode never really worked right for me using different specific on and off time schedule worked better problems bug with device software and app will edit review if they are fixed i assume they eventually will be won t work on some of my android device and some will only work in the house wifi network and not remotely it generally worked out of box wa best later firmware caused more problem than they fixed but never really seemed to operate completely right for example i set up a timer to turn on a light for a few hour each night for some reason the light would turn itself off and on multiple time within that period and there didn t seem to be anything i could do about it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: look the product and idea itself is great but the software is completely effed up iphone or android it doesn t matter the sunset thing doesn t work the plain time on work sort of if turning on within 30 minute before or after count a working i wa very disappointed with that i am deaf and wa going to use it a an alarm clock the turn on until time simply doesn t work i set it to turn on at 8 30 and turn off at 11pm it come on roughly 8 30ish kind of and then start turning itself off every 15 minute after that so then you re stuck with a light that you have to sign into your phone to turn on or off argh or you punch the button on the socket which is behind the bed or whatever they don t even sell plain remote with this the switch is an actual wall mounted plate switch you have to install waste of time money i don t understand this belkin is usually a much better product than this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this is our second wemo we first used it to control our christmas tree now we control our dining room and bedroom light with them our apartment ha no overhead lighting and we have to use lamp all over installing and syncing them is really easy i think it took like 3 minute each time bonus tip we have an amazon echo which can find and control the wemo device we can just tell alexa to turn the light on and off
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great with alexa and with mobile app
Review: really great product works very well with my echo and a simple iftt command i also like being able to use the web app to easily set a timer when i m on the road and have forgotten to do so before leaving much easier than the olden day and those dial timer that were impossible to figure out
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: home automation is far behind where it should be not that i needed this but when trying to put twin to sleep it is nice not to have to move them to get the light easy to link easy to follow the app but the app wa a little hard to find at the apple app store works with echo a long a you name your light properly had trouble when i called it my light but that changed when i renamed it mike s light the only thing i don t like is that it cover both outlet otherwise great product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: so good we keep adding more
Review: i dipped my toe in the water and purchased one light switch i loved it and now i m up to 10 switch in my home i still plan to add more installation and setup is pleasantly simple i had never installed anything like this before but it wa easy enough to figure out lately i have been converting whole bank of switch over to wemo sometimes mixing and matching with paddle switch when necessary
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: these are great we have 3 of them
Review: these are great we have 3 of them they all work with the amazon echo and it is super convenient they also work from a phone app so if you aren t home and want to turn on a light or if you are on vacation and don t want the house to be dark all the time you can work the outlet from the app or even set a timer they are great little device and super easy to set up
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: love my wemo switch i use it every time we go out on vacation i love the ability to make my light come in when the sun go down and then off when the sun rise great product worth every penny i realize how important a good review is to a buyer i give honest and heart felt review on product that a purchase and receive i base most of my purchase on review so i understand that it is fair to be completely honest on review that being said i hope this review will help a buyer with his or her decision to buy or not buy this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: once you get it setup it doe work well i used it at christmas for the christmas light which wa nice to put on an automatic schedule on off and it wa fun to turn them on off via my smartphone but the setup process wa anything but smooth the unit act like a wifi hotspot for the initial setup which mean you tell your smartphone to connect via wireless to the wemo s wireless signal then you configure it to connect to your wireless router which mean supplying your wireless password so the wemo can connect to your network that part worked okay from there it went downhill you have to know to switch your smartphone back to your wireless network and re launch the wemo app on your phone but in my case i had to kill end task the wemo app at least once throughout the ordeal before it would connect with the wemo i think i had to also reboot turn the wemo off on too before it all worked so definitely this wa a rough setup process but the wemo worked fine afterwards
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: pain to setup but great after that
Review: works a it should after you rack your brain trying to get it set up what should have been easy took me 30 minute the tp link smart plug i also purchased took me all of 3 minute to get running after getting this running it work a you d expect though so still 5 star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great easy setup but large size take up space
Review: while i can t complain about how the plug work or setting it up i can really only complain about the actual size of the plug it s quite big for just one plug i bought two one for each of my kid room so they can control their light in their room with their alexa dot when you plug it into an outlet don t expect anything else to get plugged in there so then i bought 2 belkin usb plug that have 6 outlet even with that because of the design and position of the outlet i couldn t plug in a clock or anything else so keep that in mind when purchasing it if that is the only thing you have to plug in your golden other than that no complaint maybe future technology will make plug smaller i bought these because of the good price alexa had it for
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this is really a cool product i got it up and running in le than 5 minute i love being able to turn my lamp from anywhere whenever i want the app wa super easy to navigate the only reason i am not completely satisfied is because i purchased this to link up with my ring pro doorbell which i also love i wish there wa a setting in the ring app to turn on the light from their app the current setting just open up the wemo app this isn t necessarily wemo s fault which is why i didn t take any star off i will likely buy more wemo product in the future
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use this thing to turn on off an electric fireplace insert using my ipad there were some negative review so i wasn t sure if it wa going to be a reliable appliance or not a to get access to it i d have to dissemble the front of the fireplace i have it located inside a metal fireplace insert on a outlet i installed to power the fireplace so i wasn t sure how well it would work in that metal box the darned thing work pretty well sometimes when you start the app it spends a few second looking for the thing but it always seems to quickly find it and always turn the electric fireplace insert on off one time the app lost all contact with the thing but poking the reset restart button with a long matchstick through the front grill of the fireplace restarted it and it s worked fine since notified me there wa a firmware update but it seemed never to complete the update process but the old firmware worked just fine finally updated itself used it a couple of month now and it work pretty well if i had a use for another one i d probably buy it again a i ve had pretty good luck with this one also i m using a older linksys router and apple device to control this switch judging by some of the review it might work better with some wireless router than others
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: honestly it s probably a little pricey for what it doe but i love gadget i also only use it in the
Review: i used this with my amazon echo and with the wemo app it doe exactly what you d expect on and off honestly it s probably a little pricey for what it doe but i love gadget i also only use it in the bedroom but it s nice to not have to get up and turn off a light if i m starting to doze also if you put this in your living room and set it up so when you arrived home it automatically turn on using ittt or some other neat app it could be really nice to not walk into a dark home i m just using it for basic on and off but it work flawlessly and ha never one time dropped a connection from wifi
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: handy but so bulky and must use extension to pair item
Review: i use this and the mini with alexa they work a intended but both are bulky because the plug can only go in front v side so behind a furniture or in floor outlet you have the added depth of the plug you are inserting into the wemo also they should make it so you can put a pair of matching lamp into a single control instead i have to put an extension with multi outlet into the wemo just to control two lamp on same schedule
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buggy installation process not worth the trouble
Review: i have tried twice unsuccessfully to install this wemo switch to replace an older one that worked fine for year and then didn t i consider myself to be pretty capable in term of tech and gadget but this device failed over and over again to connect to my wireless network among other problem i read a lot of other amazon review and the support forum at wemo and it seems that i m not the only one who ran into bug throughout the installation process i don t get it connecting to a wireless network should be easy it s definitely not with this product disappointing and a waste of time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: fun time with wifi and home automation
Review: i travel extensively for work i m an electrician and i m always seeking way to save on the utility bill when i m not home i ve installed a nest thermostat and have seen some saving from it s auto away feature however my electric water heater doesn t have the same feature until now fully 50 of my home electricity usage is in heating water so why not shut if off when i m not home i use this switch to control a 120v coil 2 pole relay http www amazon com gp product b004z0rll2 ref oh_aui_detailpage_o09_s00 ie utf8 psc 1 and have it tied to my nest thermostat s status via ifttt com whenever my thermostat go to away my water heater will be shut off a well handy
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: hardware is ok and software is hit or miss
Review: i ended up keeping this since it still work and is controllable with software and alexa but software could use some work i got email from support about this but nothing wa really resolved
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: better than decent not quite perfected
Review: i purchased this to use a lamp that plug in behind the couch and isn t easy to get to while it take a few second longer to open our phone open the app and hit the power button i don t mind because we control it from outside the house a well when we re about to come inside so it s a small price to pay for walking into a lit house without the waste of electricity on all day my deduction of one star come from the app sometimes it take thirty second to connect to the lamp and take another ten for the power button to turn it on this happens 10 of the time and is not something that ha caused any regret in purchasing i m still happy with it i have all apple computer and a time capsule airport extreme and this work wonderfully with it so if you are a mac person have no concern i do not use the rule but love that they re there you can program the light to automatically come on and off a you set them and i think that s great such a good idea hope this help
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it work great once it s online and active
Review: it work great once it s online and active we use it with ifttt and control the light with google home i switched the wifi account this connected to and had to do a manual reset holding down random button for random amount of time before it would engage again moved it back to the other room and had to do it again took forever to figure out how to get the reset to happen and it to start broadcasting again that wa really annoying so i m dropping a star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i hate led bulb so this is a great alternative
Review: we use these with our alexa although you can use them with the app no clue what we did before these i hate led bulb so this is a great alternative i plug my regular bulb lamp into them i can turn the light on and off with my voice great since i have a 3 story house and child who are constantly leaving light on all over the place
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i can t speak of the durability of the switch yet a it ha only been installed a few week but i can say it is working great an
Review: i have the wemo switch connected to my mother s lamp post i also gave her an amazon echo to use with it when she forgets to turn the lamp post on while she is out she asks me to turn them on for her i live 2 hour away in another state but all i have to do is say to my echo alexa turn on lamp posts and bam her light are on sure she could use the wemo app to turn them on herself but she is not that technically savvy yet i can t speak of the durability of the switch yet a it ha only been installed a few week but i can say it is working great and ha gone beyond my expectation i have not had the connectivity issue like some other user my switch ha stayed connected and ha reliably stayed connected and controlled by alexa at both my mom s house where it is installed and 120 mile away at my house via my echo note we both use and share the same amazon account allowing multiple alexa echos on the same account
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the wemo switch smart plug wa very easy to set up i have to admit once you start controlling one device in your home you want to control more and more you will automatically start looking for way to incorporate more switch throughout the house i love it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: these do everything they say they will i can control my light using my phone or my voice with my amazon echo amazon echo they have a power switch on them too the set up wa fairly straightforward and very quick using the app on my smartphone the power switch is a negative for me right now because i have very small child who push the light the switch is a light other than that i don t have any complaint i ve never tried any other wi fi enabled switch so i have nothing to compare nevertheless i doubt i will feel the need to try anything else a these are what i needed
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: grayed out not detected until you disable remote access
Review: took well over an hour to get this thing to work i added reset added again and each time the device would initially show up but when you click the power button it would immediately gray out and say not detected once in about 20 try it would click the switch once and then gray out after a lot of searching the web i finally discovered the trick you have to disable remote access as soon a i disabled remote access it started working fine and wa finally able to download the updated firmware and use the device and connect it to my amazon echo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well and best of all it work with echo
Review: first there are other cheaper alternative to wifi switch plug on the market they all pretty much do and function the same which is a good thing the cost difference isn t really an issue because of this but if you want a seamless pairing with amazon echo then wemo is the way to go i ve received other brand a gift don t get me wrong i m actually using wemo and 2 other brand in my house fortunately enough i have 3 wemo device hooked up to the one i use the most
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: quit working after 5 month no support
Review: fairly easy to install and connect to echo it worked for about 5 month and then echo said the device wa not responding i tried to set up the connection again using the wemo app but the device never transmitted the wifi signal to connect the closest thing to customer support that i could find wa a user community i never got a response to my question on how to get it working
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well but difficult set up
Review: bought this to go along with my echo dot plugged up a lamp in the plug works really well now the most difficult part wa the initial set up of the plug it ha it s own wemo app that you download so you have to separately tell alexa to find device while you re setting up the plug with your app some other brand you can integrate the app with alexa so it can automatically link up probably wouldn t buy this one again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: solid and useful product if you can deal with the clunky sw
Review: i now have about a dozen wemo controlled outlet and light in my house at this point other than the expense i really like these device yes the android client is pretty clunky and slow my reason for 4 start and not 5 but being able to set up one touch rule for when going on vacation and eliminating the timer on my backyard porch light and giving me one centralized spot for all my controlled light is very convenient especially when you are heading to the airport and realized you forgot to set the light to vacation mode and since they are on wifi their range is far superior to other wireless option i ve been using now for about 6 month and have not see a crash reboot yet
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well work with alexa and can tell when the sunset automatically
Review: i ve used this for about a month with my echo unit it wa easy to set up and get them talking to each other i set the wemo app to turn on an led sconce for a dark hallway at night automatically 30 minute before sunset turn off 30 minute after sunset but if i want alexa can control it when i want i ve had two power outage which is common where i live but the wemo ha remembered it s setting after the power return critical a little expensive but i m happy overall
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: cool concept decent product poor execution and terrible app
Review: it work but barely it will not connect to my wifi when plugged into a power strip i had to plug it into the wall outlet by itself and then it connected fine the app is rather slow and very poor ux clicking button don t give any feed back on which you click no feed back which wifi you re trying to connect to did you fat finger the wrong one who know the price is the only thing going for it the size is huge and won t fit in many outlet but when it work it s handy
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it doe what it say it doe set up
Review: it doe what it say it doe set up is a little different with nexus 5x or 6p device need to set it to airplane mode to get it working this is not in their setup documentation the real issue i have with this device ha nothing to do with the device itself i wanted to be able to turn on my tv using this switch unfortunately the tv doesn t power on when power is present and there is no option on my tv to do so not the fault of belkin but something to consider none the le
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great idea that just isn t reliable for what is intended
Review: this is a great concept where belkin hasn t shown the product to be ready for prime time setup is easy enough biggest problem i have are 1 after power or wifi go down the device don t reconnect reliably a manual reset of the switch is frequently necessary 2 the app is quirky often unable to show rule that were set up when running it remotely again being on the local network where the switch are is required defies the idea of reliable remote management of my device i am using these switch to manage device at our cottage so i don t have to drive 4 hour to flip a switch on any given day i can be certain that i will be able to connect remotely and be able to monitor or manage these switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i have wasted so much time attempting to get the wemo switch
Review: i give up i have wasted so much time attempting to get the wemo switch to function properly once i think i ve got them working a they should whoop they do another firmware update and then one problem may be resolved but two new one are created by belkin these product should never have been released for sale the customer support is useless at this point the light switch all have a mind of their own and have no sense a to what time of day it is now they all come one at midnight every night
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought this for my neurotic girlfriend that would always worry sometimes for good reason whether or not her straightener curling iron or one of her other hair torture device wa still on now she plug in to this and when we leave the house and she start worrying that she left her curling iron on she can pull up the wemo app on her phone and turn off that socket so even if she forgot to unplug or turn off something it wont burn down her house then she can relax and have a good time with me which is nice because i m pretty awesome she s never had a problem with it and even us it to freak out her roommate occasionally by plugging a lamp into it and turning it off on when she s not home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good plug when they re working
Review: picked this up due to the price break good plug when they re working or showing in the app at least lots of time the plug is working through ifttt alexa or other third party controller but sometimes the device show a not detected in the wemo app usually in time they will mysteriously show back up but by that time i have completed the task using a different method also why no dedicated ipad version just wondering
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it work but doesn t work so well on mm
Review: it doe work but nowhere doe it say it doesn t work with android marshmallow after trying for an hour i finally tried on an older phone and it worked right away then i can add it to the phone with marshmallow
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i also like that i can turn them on or off while
Review: works perfectly for what i need installed in about 2 minute after downloading the app i can control my outside light or my kitchen light from my phone timed or dusk to dawn of i can voice control with alexa i just asked alexa to find new device she found them and they instantly connected i also like that i can turn them on or off while on a cellular connection in case i m running late but want a light on when i get home i will be purchasing more of these and a few light switch great product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: it wa easy to set up and it worked perfectly from the start i have three of them so far the third is a newer model and all are great i have tried using them on a daily timer specific hour using the sunset sunrise timer and using ifttt integration all three work great the only issue i ve had at all is with the app for android but it wa a minor issue and now is working fine great product highly recommend
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: connected to app and network and work just fine there is not discover able by alexa not wasting any more time sending them back not spending hour on something that say it can do something only to find out that it really can t shameful to sell this a compatible with your system amazon
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: when it work it s great cannot seem to keep it connected for 1 2 day at a stretch before i have to reset it and re add it then repeat a day or 2 later
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have three switch and one light switch and they are all so easy to use and set up if the power go out they all reconnect with no problem if you are using an iphone to control it there are apps you can get to use them directly from the lock screen very convenient
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i connected my wemo to echo and an echo dot for a bedside light the process wasn t quite a straight forward a i expected but it s done and it works even my husband who would prefer telephone with dial face like being able to turn the light on without crossing the room going forward i will likely purchase additional wemo product to further automate the house
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: so much better than earlier iteration
Review: i have had four wemo switch controlling light in our house for several year until about a year ago i dreaded installing them a their attempt to make the various wireless connection wa hit or miss something positive must have happened in the firmware or software since then because the newer one connect without frustration and don t randomly disappear from the device list like they used to they also seem to observe variable time schedule more accurately i e one hour before sunset
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: connection issue even in a small apartment
Review: the wemo remote seemed like a great idea for fan around the apartment i bought two one for each fan they worked well for the first week after the first week they started having connection issue about 86 of the time i ask my echo to turn them on i am notified they can not be detected at first i thought it wa an issue with the echo but then i would open my wemo app and it would say they are not detected i have the firmware up to date and they should not have connection issue since i live in a small apartment with one bedroom they sit within 10 foot of the router i can only get them to work twice a day and it s never when i need them to work i would say find a different brand if you want them to be reliable and used every day
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: they always worked great with the amazon echo but would not connect right
Review: we have multiple 3 wemo switch it took u week of lengthy call to customer service and returning a unit and more customer service call then returning another unit and finally just messing with them to get them working on our phone and ipad they always worked great with the amazon echo but would not connect right or stay connected consistently using other device they are all working perfectly now probably because we are stubborn and have the time but i can not imagine that the average person would put up with the stress and frustration of doing the same
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: update recently made some change to the home wifi setup and wanted to add that reconfiguring the wemo switch wa aggravating the wemo app or hardware doe not play well after making network change therefore i changed my rating to 3 star if you re not likely to make network change then wemo switch get 4 star i chose these since they natively paired with the alexa echo and the nest thermostat the switch don t work with the auto sensing nest away mode a well a i would like but they do the job when switched away manually had to experiment with the wemo rule to get the switch to work like i wanted but that s to be expected i would like them to be a bit smaller but that s not a deal breaker by any mean
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this system is brilliant i had mine up and working in just minute and it work perfectly i can imagine if your wifi signal in the house is not constant and reliable this system won t be either one other item of note if the plug are too far from the router ex router on opposite side of the house on second floor plug on the lower wall of basement it may not work reliably or connect at all i did have to put a manual timer down there a opposed to this wemo plug no harm no foul though no one go down there with any frequency and controlling upstairs to me is more important people are totally impressed with this system and it relative cost effectiveness to other system while i haven t set up the if then event i would in a proper situation i can t wait to get more component for this system and have my house fully automated
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not all it s cracked up to me and not great customer service
Review: bought this and the orvibo brand switch together to try them out and see which if any actually worked happy to say that this plugged right in connected to my wi fi no problem and doe what it say it will do if i had ton more money i d buy them for every outlet in the house they look so sleek and smart and i love being able to set a timer so that certain appliance turn on at certain time and off at others orvibo not so much definitely returned it and am sold on the wemo revised 11 3 17 i had this product for a few month and then suddenly it stopped working no apparent reason i ve tried getting in the belkin website to try and return it or file a claim or something but no such luck will not be buying belkin again and wouldn t suggest this product to anyone so disappointing
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works with the echo but also the wemo app
Review: does what it say on the box this plug will let you turn on or off any outlet either through voice command through the echo or the wemo app on it own an added bonus i didn t realize when initially purchasing wa that i could actually utilize the wemo app from anywhere shouting at the wall to turn off the light is one thing but turning on the ac window unit so your house is the right temp right when you get home that s easily worth the sticker price
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i love using the wemo i give it a 4 5 star because the setup can be a bit tricky and painstakingly long i m not quite sure why it s not a smooth process for all wifi network but this is the second one i have purchased that ha taken multiple attempt to setup i use my wemos to schedule the lighting i use for my fish tank this is really important for planted tank to provide consistent lighting duration with this product i am able to remotely check if my light are on or off remotely turn my light on or off and set up a rule that if i turn my light on outside of the scheduled time i can have them automatically turn off after x amount of time this ensures i don t accidentally leave the light on overnight all in all this is a great product that ha a few little flaw but hopefully will be updated and fixed in further firmware update
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love the idea of being able to set on off time
Review: love the idea of being able to set on off time control remotely etc however i have never been able to get this set up properly i ve followed every trouble shooting advice changed my wifi password because it had a special character reset the device to factory setting multiple time etc nothing ha worked very frustrated
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use this with alexa for a light to turn off and on does make my life easier not sure if ill get lazy with all these sweet gadget it is nice to say alexa turn on light and it doe if i don t want to yell at night to alexa to turn off light a others are sleeping i just use app on phone to turn off light its alot easier then trying to reach up to lamp to turn off a i have bad shoulder
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: save you money find a different option
Review: it always say not detected sent feedback back to wemo belkin this is pointless if it only work 10 of the time and everything else on the internet doe work except this save your money this is so frustrating
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought a few of these device a few of the insight switch and 2 wemo light switch the light switch worked without too much of any glitch i got one insight switch to work just perfectly but now i have 5 switch and insight switch which won t work i have spent month online reading up tip guide hint and help faqs nothing seems to work i m even more frustrated now it seems i ve missed my return deadline by a month i d still like to have what these device promised but i feel like i got robbed
