Header: received open box item it didn t work
Review: i can t say whether this switch will do it job or not the item i received wa in an open box and it didn t work the led would light but it would not sync with any of four different wifi device correction my original comment said bluetooth with the wemo app i spent at least several hour on the belkin wemo troubleshooting page and with technical support i reset the device etc etc i sent the item back to amazon and they refunded my money immediately i am guessing that someone had already returned this specific example but based on the feedback on the belkin site it appears that these device may have a problematic design or firmware i e sometimes they work sometimes they don t and sometimes they quit it is a great concept but i ll wait for the next generation device before i try this again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: nice switch when it works which is only about 50 of the time i bought 2 of these over the last couple of year before there were other product on the market they are terrible only connect to the internet about 50 of the time half of the time when i try and turn the switch on or off with the app the switch is not connected to the internet terrible instruction documentation i will never by another wemo product there are now many other cheaper alternative on the market
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: if you re buying this to link with the amazon echo dont does not work with the amazon echo it keep disconnecting to the amazon echo and to the wifi link an expensive waste of time and money
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not ready a a common household item
Review: frustrating with constant trouble shooting firmware seems to require complete reconfigure after resetting to factory default i have owned these for 4 month and had to do this 3 time being a geek with it skill i find this product annoying i can get them back up and running but usually take about 15 to 20 minute per switch waste of time when you consider the goal of what it is replacing
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i purchased two of these a couple week ago and the set up wa flawless and they work perfectly however these two additional unit cannot connect to the wemo server and thus cannot be activated i don t know why this is an issue and have yet to hear from the belkin people on what the issue is and how to address it for correct installation and use with amazon echo addendum i sent them back and received replacement same issue using the wemo app with my ipad io 9 1 kathrena from belkin who ha been working with me on this suggested that i might use another device to see if we could isolate the problem area i used my kindle fire and lo and behold the device fired right up the wemo app worked just fine and the issue is resolved don t know what the problem wa with the ipad but the app just did not work perhaps the belkin folk might just want to update their app a bit anyhow with all issue resolved i am most happy with the wemos doing what they are supposed do they work fine and i endorse the product without reservation at all thanks for all the help from the belkin people and especially kathrena who baby walked me through all of this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great now using it for washing machine notification important washing machine tip
Review: i use a wemo in wall switch a couple of their plug in switch a wemo maker on my garage door now an insight switch to notify me my wife when the washing machine is finished important washing machine tip below the setup is still a little flakey otherwise it would be 5 star but other than that i am very pleased tip for wash notification the insight switch will send you a message when power stops being used when the washer or whatever is finished initially it wa sending notification 4 time during the wash cycle a the washer changed cycle in the app under setup for the insight switch there is a setting for the on standby threshold changing this from 8 watt default to 2 watt resolved the issue and now it only sends the notification when the load is completely finished it took me a while to resolve that but hopefully this will solve the issue for others
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works a described but you cannot control two different house using the ios app
Review: works a described i ended up purchasing this to turn on my foscam camera when i leave a geo fence via ifttt and turn off my foscam security camera when i approach home the only thing i dislike about this is that from the mobile app you cannot control device that sit in two home i d love to check the status of my device in my sf home a well a in my la home unfortunately this isn t possible and the set up requires you to be on your local network for set up
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the thing work fine for 1 4 week at a time
Review: this one wa a replacement for one that already stopped working after just a couple week the thing work fine for 1 4 week at a time then it simply stop functioning sometimes you can get it to work again by resetting everything but other time you have to just use it a a manual switch i will never buy another wemo device again this item deserves negative star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: belkin s customer support is good
Review: we initially had some problem connecting this to our network ended up being that my phone wa connecting to a different frequency from what the wemo switch needed once i temporarily shut off 5ghz frequency and forced my phone to connect to the 2 4 ghz the switch connected like a dream now we use our echo to turn the light off and it s quite a fun party trick and even though i searched high and low on the internet for the above answer i couldn t find it belkin s customer support team wa great and got the solution right on the first try so don t waste to much of your time troubleshooting this if it doesn t work for you right away just email them
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i got this to work with alexa
Review: it take a bit to set up sometimes but when set up it work very very well the set up app is a phone app but that can be used on an android device like a kindle also accepts ifttt for option i have mine behind some metal shelving which sometimes will interfere with the item being turned on or off but usually voice command only take asking twice and it work 90 of the time without problem
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: device is great app is not so much
Review: a bit difficult to set up even with the included hint and trick with the instruction my recommendation is to shut off mobile data a well a the other suggestion in the instruction to ensure proper and prompt configuration i have not had any issue with the device disconnecting and i am able to control the light over any wifi or cell network my only wish wa that the app wa better the rule and away mode setup is cumbersome to say the least it also lack the ability to set a on off time that is automatically variable for the appearance of random on off time something that many non connected timer do and is very useful for those who travel
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the idea here is great but i find that i often have to
Review: the idea here is great but i find that i often have to manually power it back on completely defeating the purpose they do have active support and i ve had several update and beta opportunity so i feel like they are trying to make thing right otherwise i would have rated it much lower
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: did not work with my amazon echo device
Review: bought this since it wa suggested a a product to go with my new amazon echo and nowhere could i get the echo to find the device and no where on any website could i get the support i needed to make it work paid money to buy an app that wa supposed to make it work and it still would not work returned it quickly and thankfully amazon make return easy going to try the tcp link smart plug since at least on that website there is support available to help you get the plug to work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the product work well the app need an updtate
Review: i wa nervous when i first set this up it wa unresponsive had difficultiy connecting to my network however i tried setting it up with a different device same os and it led me to update the wemo s internal firmware after this the device ha worked perfectly i wish the app wa a little better put together and that it wa clearer what the wemo wa doing perhaps sending a connecting or updating message to the app the device take up a lot of space and could be nicer to look at but it work programming the timer function wa simple enough and being able to warm up my espresso machine before i leave for home is wonderful
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: sounds super cool but doesnt work consistently
Review: this switch is a joke it work half the time literally the app constantly ha upgrade that won t allow you to run whatever you want to turn on until it s finished downloading i really thought this would be cool to have but i think i will go back to my 2 timer that work every time this hook to wi fi a pretty easy but after a month or so you have to reset it so if it in the attic or something hard to get to it s going to be a pain to reset it it literally stop working randomly day today sorry for the bad review but the truth hurt sometimes
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i recently got an amazon echo and i decided to try to use smart switch to jazz up the control of the electronics that i use i got the switch for my light the setup for of the wemo switch wa very easy for me i wa able to get it to connect to my wifi network with no issue i also got alexa to notice the smart home device and to add it also using the voice command wa no issue the reason for the one star rating from me is two fold first the switch only stay connected to wi fi about two day at a time after that when you try to use alexa to turn on the switch it will tell you that the device is not responding so you need to disconnect it and re connect it to the outlet it is on and again this will work for about 2 day before you need to do it again it doe not matter if you reset it to factory default it will do the same thing again i contacted belkin support about this and i told the representative there that i reset to factory default about 10 time and the issue kept happening i wa told to try the same thing again and also to try to do it with cellular data disabled on my cell phone that would have no effect because you have to use wifi to set it up i had both my cell phone and the switch on the same wifi network and it would still inexplicably lose connection i got the tp link smart switch instead and i have had absolutely no disconnect from the wifi network ever and also no issue with alexa this switch doe not work and then belkin support is atrocious a far a honoring the warranty they are supposed to have on these device i am not sure what is happening to belkin but their product and quality is slipping i would not buy any of these switch again nor would i recommend it to anyone
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: piece of cake cool cool cool
Review: i bought 2 of these and both worked flawlessly i don t know how it could be any easier plugged the switch in connected my iphone to the wemo wifi 15 second later i had control of the switch maybe these are newer dec 16 compared to the folk who had problem but don t hesitate these switch do what they say they will do programming rule is pretty straightforward pretty cool i can do it on my phone and not have to fiddle with a mechanical switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: piece of junk stopped working 3 minute after plugged in wifi wa detected at first but then went in and out and after about 10 minute wasn t visible at all
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this work perfect i really don t see what everyone is complaining about had it for a while using just the app a little slow to respond but it worked then i connected this switch to ifttt and alexa that opened up the possibility but slowed down the reaction time to about a 3 to 5 second delay still worked great i currently have this switch connected to my living room a c unit with samsung smartthings hub and alexa works flawless no delay no setup issue
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: ordered 2 to accompany my recently purchased amazon dot the first took about 20 attempt to connect with the smartphone app then came the hassle of activating the switch via alexa a day later i attempted to connect the second switch it literally took about 80 attempt to make the connection to the app another 20 try to activate the connection via alexa i couldn t tell whether the issue wa with my internet service my smartphone the dot or the switch itself i can t even tell you how i accomplished the task what is now clear however is that once connected you still have to create a device account with alexa since their successful activation both have worked flawlessly and yes i plan to buy more
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: if you own a drop cam you will appreciate this review i originally purchased this device because i wanted to be able to control drop cam connected to them which sometimes go off line and need to be re booted herein lie the problem if you are not on the original network which the wemo wa set up on you cannot create a remote access to those device totally unlike the software in the drop cam that you create an account and then anyone regardless of the network they are on can access those camera with a password this is not good belkin this should have been better thought out if you intend on using this device between two phone say a couple for example and you live in different part a we do this will not work unless both phone were on the network same network in order to configure the device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great product but even better customer service
Review: great product but even better customer service i bought this a my 11th wemo device so i am pretty familiar with the product line up although i did all the previous app installs this one gave me a little trouble at first so i used the in app help and had someone email the same night with exactly what i needed the product is solid but the feedback function of the app will keep me coming back
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: had a little bit of trouble connecting the device to wifi even though on the wemo app it said the connection failed it actually didn t because when i closed the app and opened it again it said connected for echo user it s important to note your echo will not detect the device until you set them up on your wemo app first even if you don t plan on using the wemo app you still have to download it and set it up also on their customer support page there is a link that say premium support that indicates for a fee you can talk to a person on the phone what isn t apparent unless you read the fine print is that the first 90 day is free so if you need help setting up the device just give them a call 800 223 5546 i would have gave this product five star if the device came with a power regulator that would allow for you to control the brightness of the lamp that s being plugged into the device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i must have got a bad switch it is a piece of garbage
Review: i must have got a bad switch it power on once i close the app it stop working i followed the guide on the box app and youtube i have tried to set it up 8 time it allows me to go through the setup and connect and then it drop device not detected i reset it multiple time i reconfigured it multiple time i rebooted my phone multiple time i deleted and reinstalled the wemo app multiple time alexa cannot find the device it is a piece of garbage i am so frustrated with it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the switch seemed great for the one day it worked it wa hard to connect to wifi a it continually could not connect despite finding the network and having the password now it loses the connection and you have to manually reset it to have it find the network again even when using the power button on the plug to use it just a a switch the light will turn off after a period of time this is a useless piece of plastic and i ll be looking for a different smart plug in the hope of actually getting a smart one
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: work perfectly i have this controlling a fan in
Review: work perfectly i have this controlling a fan in my bedroom and connected to amazon dot so i say alexandra fan on and the fan go off the neat thing i wa able to program it to auto shutoff after 30 minute when turned off after midnight but it run till turned off again during the day very slick and the only solution i could find to do this works flawlessly
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: they ve definitely grown on me
Review: update after 9 month use i m adding two star for two reason first firmware update release note tell me that belkin is addressing concern from amazon review especially in improving router ssid and password compatibility second echo and our wemo switch work together perfectly such that we only bother with the app to set timer these are pretty nice and certainly better than the two star that i d originally rated them original review now that we ve got them set up they re alright when we have 15 to 30 free second to launch an app and wait for it to connect to a couple of outlet five foot from the phone getting to this point required much patience and googling defaulting my router s ssid and password and upgrading wemo firmware a few time so that i d be able to restore the router setting hoping that belkin is now shipping with firmware already updated because that wa seriously a pain in the neck
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: worth the buy but beware the troubleshooting
Review: first off i would like to say that the product presentation is nice the cardboard really hold the switch in there the original switch is a bit clunky but they have since improved that with the mini resetting this is also a bit awkward the instruction really should be in the app or printed on the back so keep your manual handy or be prepared for a bit of internet troubleshooting setup for this thing is a bit of a pain but once you get the hang of it it not that hard functionality is good and the switch syncs up well with amazon alexa which is also a fairly time consuming process i ve docked a star for setup and troubleshooting issue giving the app it own help tab could probably fix this but i would still consider this a good product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: kitchen light went out and i am unable to get on the ladder to take the top off to get to the light bulb so i can buy a new one so i hooked up a desk lamp i use my amazon echo alexa kitchen on and voila better than a light switch i love it my daughter us it to turn the light on when she work late so the dog is not in the dark lol yes this is a keeper
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i thought this would be a great product to combine with my new amazon echo boy wa i wrong on this the echo work fine but this switch is impossible to set up i went to their website to find out how to set it up totally worthless i downloaded the app and again that wa also worthless i searched the question area on amazon and again no help so i guess this will have to go back and i will put my money on one of their competitor next time belkin get it together before you put out a product as i write this 28 percent of respondent gave your product one stat in my mind that is significant
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: they work beautifully with the app and with echo i had trouble reconnecting after having a new router installed so i used belkin s troubleshooting chat option the tech spent a long time with me until all my switches were working again both with the app and echo he could not have been more helpful or patient love being able to turn the light on if we re getting home later than planned and to be able to turn them on using echo in the middle of the night
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i would not recommend any wemo product unless you are very computer savvy
Review: switches work well if you can get them hooked into your wifi network there are some obtuse written faq on the subject but they are difficult to understand telephone support is in india and the accent are so thick i could only understand every third or fourth word i wa able to get them working finally thanks to some you tube video there are some paid telephone support option which i would have paid for but they are also based in india don t buy unless you are willing to support yourself i would not recommend any wemo product unless you are very computer savvy
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: worked after a maddening set up then stopped working i reset it and it worked then just stopped light wouldn t even come on when i plugged it in tried all the you tube fix nothing worked got instruction from belkin no help shut down modem monitor all thing computer bluetooth everything tried again no success luckily amazon ha an easy return policy so it s back with them the end
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: excellent product i have 2 of these wemo smart
Review: excellent product i have 2 of these wemo smart plug and have installed the app to my iphone set up and install wa easy and the app give periodic update to the app and the device a well there is also a timer feature in the app which can turn the switch on and off at specified time i have one timer set to turn on a radio during the day and the other timer set to turn on a light during the evening helps give the appearance to would be robber that someone is home have recommended to friend a well
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well also support scheduled event but poorly documented scheduled event won t work if internet connection is lost
Review: works well i installed and accepted the option to upgrade to the latest firmware version on 11 7 2015 and have been running it for almost 2 week now you can access the device from anywhere using your iphone a long a you can connect to internet via either wifi or your cellular data plan the device s connection to your home wifi is pretty stable and it auto reconnects well in case it loses the connection i had tried a similar device that became unusable a soon a it lost the wifi connection one time so this is important because connection sometimes lapse for a few second and you normally don t notice you can set up rule to power on and off on a schedule the schedule can be very specific you can set each rule to run at a specific time and day or day of the week you can edit and enable disable the rule remotely there is apparently no limit to the number of rule you can set up i set up 5 with no limit in sight unfortunately the rule will not run if the device loses it connection to the internet the documentation is poor in this regard a it contradicts itself but i speak from experience
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: pros it is very easy to set up if you follow the instruction
Review: i now have 5 of these and i use them with alexa pros it is very easy to set up if you follow the instruction commands through alexa echo are very intuitive unlike the philips hue which you have to train yourself to use mobile software is good and easy to use you can position it where it only take one socket space cons none so far
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: so simple to setup and use did i remember to turn a light on for the dog with remote access enabled you can control your wemo device from anywhere your ios or android device ha an internet connection this includes other wi fi network or your 3g 4g mobile connection when the wemo app is launched outside your home the app contact the belkin cloud where it redirects the phone s request to the appropriate wemo unit and then you can see and control all of your wemo device nice integrates perfectly with amazon echo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: never go home to a dark house
Review: great little plug we love that we can control our light from our phone at first i thought this wa a lazy option but i never have to walk into a dark house we very often are out longer than planned and don t remember to turn on light before we go now i open the app and i can turn on the light the only downside wa poor installation instruction but google helped with that
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: can t install at the new location can t return try another system for home automation
Review: bought it and it worked great moved and trying to set it up again and it doesn t transmit it s own wifi signal which it need to connect to the new wifi it s passed the return date or i d return it so now i have to buy another wireless controller for my fan loved it till i needed it now not so much in preparing my new home for home automation i ll avoid the wemo line
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: to try my luck at starting a hand free smart home set up
Review: i bought a couple of these just to try my luck at starting a hand free smart home set up initial set up of each one varied but took a little le than a minute before it became recognized by my network for first time use i would recommend setting it up closer to your router to program a it seemed to struggle a bit being a couple floor up in my townhouse but once set up i ve had no problem in switching it to any outlet or floor in the house and it working fine the only criticism i had wa the size which made it a little tricky to get into an outlet behind some furniture and is fairly noticeable to anyone in an open room no complaint otherwise for those looking for a sleeker le noticeable version i highly recommend the new wemo mini or insight plug
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: love these unit so much so that i purchased two more lol use my smartphone to turn on and off light in house when i am their oh bet thing i am able to turn on light over 1000 mile away very easy to set up and use
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: constantly lose connection painful to reset just not worth the hassle
Review: i have had this product and switch for a year now they constantly lose connection and it take anywhere from 5 min to an hour to get them reset i replaced one switch already with hue light two month and no issue with them i wish wemo worked better but the constant loss of connection make them unreliable and unusable i ll replace all in the future
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i purchased three of these for a work project unfortunately 2 out of the 3 didn t properly work one of them would not allow me to upgrade the firmware even after reaching out to the vendor for help with known security issue in older firmware this made this unit unusable the second unit never created a connection with my or any coworkers phone the light never blinked the proper color and it wa never usable the third unit connected right away and had no problem i gave this 2 star for what this product can do when it work it s very cool the ifttt recipe are a nice way to expand functionality and i wa able to control the switch using both email and text a well a from the app directly everyone at work thought the functioning unit wa great and we had a lot of fun with it the problem with reliability is killing the product i can t trust it to function and with only 1 out of 3 unit working i can t recommend it too bad
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: interesting product works once you get it all setup with the app on the iphone and the echo dot a little bulky and cover the whole outlet slot which prevents the outlet above from being used on a vertical 2 x power socket plate very disappointed that it doe not work on 5ghz frequency and not on 40mhz band had to change my router setting for the test but once it work it work well however i won t be using it due to the config change needed on my router overall a good product i may have received an older version or the product firmware need to be updated to work with 5ghz frequency and 40mhz band
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have one of those marquee with the flashing arrow at the entry of my little vacation cabin i rent i am on the highway so it could be a little challenging to find me in the dark i had one of those little timer with the dial so i would have to go down to the sign and over ride the timer if someone wa going to be arriving after midnight i actually seldom did that but now i have timer assigned to that switch to turn the sign on at sunset and shut off at 10pm sun thur then at midnight fri sat i can manually turn the sign back on at 10pm and it will automatically turn off at 1am thanks to a timer the option are pretty much endless and i can turn it off and on from my bed too or anywhere that my phone ha an internet connection i am ordering a switch for to covered deck in the park the price is worth the convenience
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: don t ever buy this product i purchased 4 of them during amazon prime day and i m assuming i just received one that did not work and were previously returned by other customer regardless all 4 of these do not work i ve tried changing the setting on the wifi hard reset uninstalling and re installing the app and still nothing work seriously save yourself the aggravation and go to another brand i m sure that some of these product have worked for some people but it truly seems to be a lottery of whether or not you get a working one shame on me for not doing more research prior to purchase but either way these switch are terrible

Header: good stuff that work every time

Header: easy to install and set up with the wemo software
Review: easy to install and set up with the wemo software on my iphone i tried a competitor s product from d link it wa amazingly difficult to setup and we never succeeded so we returned it to amazon the wemo by comparison wa simple and setup worked the first time switch is in a garage location separated by very thick garage firewall but work fine on the wifi of a router 30 foot away and one floor above the garage we have had other wifi device not work in the garage they reported a weak wifi signal the wimo switch work great and i love the wemo phone app so easy to use
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this product is a good idea but is very poorly supported by belkin app and firmware update consistently break function which might be fixed in the next app or firmware update at the expense of something else breaking when they are working they won t function with mac filtering enabled on your wifi network yes even with the mac address entered into the wireless router a exception they have to be reset semi weekly a their internal clock fall out of sync they are only accessible through android or ios apps no access from pc s belkin s support is quick to reply but doesn t actually do anything to fix problem they just keep recommending uninstalling reinstalling the app or completely resetting the wemo switch which doesn t actually do anything other than consume hour of time resetting everything only to have the exact same problem my day job is a an it administrator and this poorly supported designed technology frustrates me i can only imagine how much more frustrating wemo must be for someone who doesn t live and breath troubleshooting network hardware i m beginning to wish i hadn t wasted the money on this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: don t hesitate everyone can benefit by using these

Header: does not work reliably at least with amazon echo
Review: if you re just looking for a switch to operate with an app on your smartphone this product fill the bill nicely however if you re looking for a switch to interface with your amazon echo alexa and operate with voice command this product doe not fill the bill very well i set everything up a instructed and the switch worked flawlessly from the wemo smartphone app but when i gave alexa command to operate the device 93 of the time i either got a message that the device could not be found or a message that the device wasn t responding 7 of the time the command resulted in operation of the switch i moved the switch to various location throughout my home with the exact same result if you want your connected home device to work correctly and reliable there is seemingly no replacement for a hub to interface with amazon echo and operate those device
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: worst thing i have ever gotten i will never buy another belkin product a long a i live there customer service is not american based and it just make thing very difficult they are not able to understand the real problem and how to fix it besides what their computer tell them you are better off just searching google the wemo switch lasted 2 month and then it finally stopped connecting to my wifi network i bought 3 of them in december 2014 and all of them are already broken the iphone app is unbelievably buggy just look at the app store rating please do yourself a favor and do not buy this product i just bought 3 ankuoo neo plug and they are wonderful it took le than 2 minute to setup all 3 of them up they are cheaper and smaller than the wemo switch a well

Review: i ve had the wemo system for sometime now and feel it s overall a good product once it s setup it doe what i want it to do i recently changed out my wi fi router and changed my ssid boy o boy did that take some time there is really no easy way to just update your wi fi network setting with wemo i ended up having to reset all of my device what a pain in the neck then to top it all off my light switch needed a firmware update after in which they needed to be reset once again bottom line i use wemo mostly for my exterior lighting solution and it work well once you set it and forget it not sure about doing all of my interior lighting with this solution because it just seems like trouble at this point for me especially after going through the fiasco of my wi fi changeover and all of my light switch having to be reset after the firmware update

Review: will not connect to airport extreme or att u verse router i ve read a few other review and my experience duplicate theirs correct password used on multiple device but the wemo refuse to connect i chatted with belkin support and they were slow to respond we walked through the instruction and change to the airport extreme but no luck it seemed obvious the rep wa running through a script in the end i am disappointed and will return the order
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: funny phrase written by a software developer trying to create
Review: this device now work well with echo it drove me bonkers trying to setup remote access in the wemo app so that it could then be detectable by echo and amazon had no clue why i would get this error sorry we were unable to setup your remote access just now to try later go to more remote access funny phrase written by a software developer trying to create an error message that ha multiple us while trying to sound eloquent lol it should say something like your version of ios is incompatible with remote access setup since simply trying again by itself won t resolve the issue oh and wemo belkin wa closed when i wa doing this stuff anyway i finally figured it out as you can probably guess from my suggested error message change my version of ios is incompatible i am using a new beta version of the iphone ios which doesn t allow the setup process to work properly with the wemo app you must have remote access enabled in order to make it discoverable by echo i ultimately used my ipad to set it up and it worked perfectly in fact i thought i would have to enable remote access a a manual step but once i wa using a compatible version of ios it did that on it own a part of the automatic setup process i then went back to echo alexa and asked her to detect device to setup and she found them finally so if you re on any sort of beta ios for the iphone either use a different device or go back to the regular current ios version i think people might have the same problem using an old ios version the setup from the wemo app wa easy after that and don t forget that wemo switch only work on the 2 4 ghz frequency i didn t know that upon purchase but got lucky and my netgear modem router combo wa 2 4 compatible you must also have upnp enabled enabled by default but could be disabled by an installer or even you for security concern i guess if anybody wants the wemo echo setup to work guaranteed with no hassle just buy a new 2 4 ghz modem with it which will have upnp turned on by default and use the correct ios version as long a you don t have any issue with signal being blocked at home i d imagine it would be pretty much plug and play
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the switch are great it s the app that need work
Review: i have three switch that i use in a three story house in order to have wifi on all three level of the house we have a wireless router and two waps that extend the original signal from the router it take forever for the app to come up and allow me to access the switch when i say forever it would on many occasion be quicker for me to walk down two flight of stair and turn the switch off manually and then get on with my day being able to check whether or not switch are on or off on the different level of the house is really helpful at the end of the day it would do me good to just walk down two flight of stair and turn the switch off however i paid 50 for the switch to do that so my expectation are a little frustrated by the really slow wemo app
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: too pricy for what you get
Review: while a fun gimmick they were a pain to connect the software at install constantly crash and the remote feature only work on 2 of the 4 switch i got a it say when i leave the house that the two are off line they immediately work when i get back home on wifi the reason i got them wa to turn light on and off while i am away remotely if i leave and the remote shuts itself down what s the point however i did use these to set up timer around the house so when i wake up the light and appliance are waiting for me fun to play with at home wifi useless and unreliable if you try the remote feature i emailed support and got a form letter clearly written by a computer that didn t even address my concern would not buy again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: just got my belkin switch downloaded the app from apple app store and proceeded to set it up had to do a firmware update which take about 10 minute a stated in the app got it working on the wifi and discovered you have to also set it up for use on any internet connection all in all thing went smoothly and it work great don t know what the fuss wa with some reviewer the instruction were somewhat rudimentary and were included in the app a little pricey initially a with any new technology hopefully the price will drop in time i would recommend this product and plan to buy more wemo product for my home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: nice after you get it working but setting it up wa a lot harder than it should have been several time i wa getting a message that the device wa not detected almost sent it back but decided to try again finally got it working by doing the same thing i did before over and over no rhyme or reason a to why set up took so long

Review: we order 1 and love it just ordered 2 more works great with our echo and we now control our light via voice through our echo works outstanding with our phone a well wife can turn on the light via her phone when she pull the car into the garage and make sure there is light on when she enters the home during those dark winter month

Header: kept going offline requiring a manual switch push to get it back
Review: meh not a great a i hoped based on review i m an it guy so i have a certain expectation based on using a variety of tech based thing over the year app is a bit misleading and it took me a while to get thing set up based on that things didn t work a seamlessly for me a they did for others eventually i wa able to get thing online and functioning and a firmware update came up and i installed it when trying to set up a basic on off event it wasn t a intuitive a it should be once i had a couple basic on off event set up i used this for a week but i had to turn the unit back on manually with the power button and this wa the deal breaker doesn t do much good to schedule thing to run automatically when the unit go offline by itself and can t be accessed remotely with the phone app

Header: i would like to have more for a few other thing in
Review: haven t had it for long but it work perfectly a advertised not too hard to program i have it to come on at sunset and shut off at 10 00pm for patio light the only con is the price i would like to have more for a few other thing in my house but it just wayyyy to expensive for me although with christmas coming i might break down and buy the insight switch

Header: good but issue after a power outage
Review: so far i like all the feature of the switch but it ha 1 flaw which is talked about by others if there is a power outage the switch come back in an off state regardless of what state it wa on when the power went off this is very annoying and they should instead provide a user selectable setting a to whether you want it to default to on off or whatever state it wa in when the outage occurs until then the workaround that i use it to create a lot of rule at 5 minute increment that turn it on that way i will only be out 4 minute at the longest until it come back on i use it a a timer for an appliance and this work for me but might not work for everyone if your switch is on for a very long period of time i hope they fix this flaw in the design of the product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: seems to have been improved since release
Review: a few thing to keep in mind for my review 1 i am primarily using these with amazon echo which is a different experience than the app 2 these seem to have been improved since release when i wa setting both of mine up they both needed a firmware update which took a couple of minute it look like belkin ha improved the software powering these since they were released over 2 year ago some of the review here are a couple of year old so keep that in mind 3 i am using these with a higher end router and i ve taken step to optimize my wifi signal throughout my home i would imagine you might have more issue if you re using these with a cheap or older router many lower end router just aren t designed to maintain constant connection to numerous device i think this is why many smart home manufacturer use an additional hub it eliminates putting so much on your router now to the product itself setup wa a breeze took just a couple of minute per outlet including a firmware update plugged in my lamp connected to my amazon echo and everything wa good to go been using them for about 3 week and they work on the first try every time so far like i said i m using these with echo the app work ok a a remote and is sometimes more convenient than the echo but i don t know if it would be worth it without the echo or other third party voice control hardware i do wish the bottom had a smaller footprint a some plug will not fit under the wemo switch i ll update this review if i encounter any problem
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: takes some patience but it will work after a few problem

Header: a great remote timer best purchase i made in 2014
Review: absolutely love this device i use it for my cat feeder so i can trigger it remotely on a schedule using ifttt or manually via the wemo app on my phone i found it initially tricky to update the firmware a it seemed to hang but second time round it worked others have reported similar issue i have used this now for 8 week and not lost network connectivity at all which is paramount i will get more in the future for thing like light much better than a regular plug in timer because i can both set it up in advance and make change on the fly one of the best purchase i made in 2014

Review: i saw in the review that setting the switch up with your wifi connection could be tricky but i figured that i could probably figure it out i bought it to use with 2 lamp while i wa going to be away they were problematic from the moment i plugged them in i could easily identify the switch on the belkin network but when it tried to connect to my own wifi it wa only intermittently successful i tried for 3 day the first night i spent 2 hour i tried belkin s faq and customer support and wa still unsuccessful the second day after a good night s sleep i thought i would try it again this time for no discernable reason it wa successful it seemed to be operating correctly but stated i needed a firmware update i downloaded the firmware update and then it could no longer find my wifi and i wa back to step 1 i tried the rest of the day and again the next day but could never get it to find my wifi again no matter what i did i ended up returning them to amazon
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: love these thing keep buying more and more syncs up great with alexa so i ve got a nice home automation system setup now it even let you set schedule i e at 11 50pm the light automatically turn off at 10 00am they automatically turn on also love how i can use voice to command them since i have an amazon dot great product

Header: perfect that s all i wanted in the first place
Review: i bought the wemo switch and installed it to switch my tv soundbar on and off a a way to mute the tv with a voice command on my amazon echo when i first set it up it took two try just to get it on the network correctly i use an apple router for my wifi once set up it worked equally the same from either 1 iphone6 2 ipad mini or 3 amazon echo by equal i mean that once you got the wemo s attention it reliably turned the switch on and off from any device i ran it that way for a few hour if you didn t send a command to the wemo for 20 minute or so the wemo seemed to go into a sleep mode and it took several try to wake it up before it would finally accept a command again not ok i did the firmware update that it notified me wa available and now it doesn t go into sleep mode anymore whenever i command it turn tv on turn tv off it responds the first time from the echo perfect that s all i wanted in the first place on the downside now the iphone can t talk to it at all but the ipad can and it responds the first time every time on the ipad also i give it four star because it accomplished my mission to mute the tv from the echo buggy you bet either amazon or apple need to make something like this themselves
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this addition to my home is awesome i just walk into one of the room and are able to turn the light off or on with a simple voice command i am very surprised on how simple it wa to set up to connect to my home wifi if i am out of town or away from home i can turn my light on or off with my phone or i can set the timer with my phone a well the wemo timer is a lot simpler to configure than the traditional timer
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: wemo switch with amazon echo not for the switch alone
Review: as the title indicates this review and rating apply only to the combination of an echo and a wemo switch personally i would not recommend the wemo switch by itself i got my first switch a a gift and i frankly thought it wa a poor product concept after all what kind of poor schmuck is too lazy to turn off a light switch um er i guess that would be me it s worth noting that roughly 6 year ago i had zero interest in ever buying a kindle a i didn t think it could ever stack up against the experience of reading a well made hard cover after trying the kindle once i now rarely buy physical book except professional text first let me explain my set up i have an echo resting on my admittedly 1970 s style bookcase headboard in my bedroom and a lamp on top of a bureau across the room i usually end my day listening to music on the echo while reading a book on my kindle or watching a television episode on my ipad using the echo a a substitute speaker for the lousy built in having received what i thought wa a silly gift i would never use i left it in the box for a couple of week before getting off my butt and hooking it up to the lamp after setting up the switch and connecting it to the echo more on setup issue below i simply said alexa please turn off the lamp and the lamp turned off let me preface this with the statement that i used to think i wa a fairly bright person however the next 5 minute after completing the setup convinced me that my inner child is a total idiot finding yourself repeatedly saying alexa please turn off the lamp alexa please turn on the lamp while giggling is not a strong vote for one possessing a mature mind i have found one use for this silly thing that i truly enjoy as i get drowsy reading a book rather than get out a warm comfy bed to turn thing off i simply whisper alexa please turn off the lamp instant darkness and silence without having to wake yourself back up by trudging across the room for the second one in the living room man cave i can turn activate it using a normal conversational voice volume from 25 or circa 7 5m away the major downside is that the setup via the ios app is buggy the direction grossly insufficient and the user interface provides false negative throughout the set up process by false negative i mean that the app indicates that your set up is failing when in fact it ha succeeded the trick is simple switch back and forth between the wemo app and the ios setting app and it suddenly show up a being fully connected to sync to the echo you must first press the tiny button on top of the unit and then say alexa detect my wemo switch and you are done i would give the app by itself 1 star on the safety side of thing even though it s rated for 1800w i would question the wisdom of ever going over 500 watt a single light or two is fine but space heater or high end entertainment system not for this product i think wemo wa kindly stated aggressive in their specing this at 1800w this opinion is based on simple prejudice regarding lightweight electronics and is not the result of any benchmarking or other testing i reserve the right to be completely wrong the only other downside is that your friend will react by saying thing like don t you have anything better to do with your money the more straight forward you are an idiot and the occasional i m not sure if that is awesome or just plain creepy my recommended response is to grin and send them one a a gift but only if they already own an echo i hope you find this review to be helpful i ll update this post if the unit fail
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use the wemo to have light in my apartment go on a few minute before my alarm go off in the morning and shut off after i leave making one le thing to think about in the morning which is priceless with some creative rulemaking you can really put your home lighting scheme on autopilot i use only led light so electricity waste and heat generated are minimal super easy set up i found there are occasional headache with it losing the internet connection requiring a re pairing with the router or a restart of the iphone app i chalk this up to weakness of my home internet and not the wemo switch great first gen product i look forward to seeing other home automation product from belkin
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

me what they are going to do and that they have actually done nothing i also tell her that doing a factory reset is akin to blowing up your car because it ha a dirty window i then get put on hold for 5 more minute for her to talk to a technician she come back and tell me we need to do a 3 way call with amazon but they can t find the so could i provide it at which point i tell her i am done i quit i surrender since this is programmed to my phone and i spent all the time setting up the on and off feature i am keeping it until after christmas at which time it will be thrown in the trash i will never buy belkin again and strongly suggest you heed this warning defective product combined with horrible offshore customer service in a week they have done absolutely nothing but agitate me and waste time i will never get back in my life original review review based on the absolute and complete lack of response by their customer service i bought this because it wa sold a a product that Header: high tech solution to an old problem
Review: in my case i needed a simple solution to turn light on and off in my home while travelling the item is nicely packaged and the instruction are clear and concise there are only a few step to proper setup 1 plug in the switch 2 download and install the app google s android or apple s ios 3 in the setting of your phone link to the new wemo network created 4 launch the app and connect the switch to your home network i then plugged a lamp into the switch and i wa able to turn the lamp on and off from the app in my phone when you are traveling this give you complete control over the light in your home and you can also setup an on off schedule or set it up to activate by motion in the room all in all a great product so far we will do further testing away from the house to simulate how it will respond when we are travelling

Review: works great with amazon echo step 1 download the wemo app for initial setup only step 2 connect your phone to the wemo wifi network signal that is automatically broadcast from the wemo device when it s plugged into an outlet step 3 name the device within the app for example my cool thing step 4 say out loud alexa discover device step 5 log into your alexa account online and you ll see my cool thing in the list of smart home device now create a new device group and add my cool thing to that new group give the group a name for example awesome stuff step 6 say out loud alexa turn on awesome stuff or say alexa turn off awesome stuff it s that easy

Header: if it doe not connect try this
Review: hey everyone i wa going to return this product but then found out the solution i would consider myself a very tech savvy person and can figure nearly any problem that ha to do with computer router server and the like but i nearly gave up on this one the answer is really simple and quite annoying that it is not posted anywhere the wireless internet that you are going to connect must have a security of wpa wpa2 personal i believe that only wpa will also work please feel to leave me comment or feedback if this doesn t work for you but i had success with 3 different router at 3 different location when i changed the security setting to wpa wpa2 personal best of luck to you

Review: i always wanted to buy one of these switch which is finally happend i bought this switch for my wall air conditioning system so i could turn it on before i get home i know ac system ha their own timer feature but sometimes you set them up for example to come on at 6 pm but your plan get change and you ll end up going home late night so that ac will work hour for no reason and wasting energy money but now with my wemo i turn on my ac anytime from anywhere i want i have to say this switch is an awesome device but nothing is perfect and always there is some issue the issue that i experienced with this device is that in case internet go out for any reason like power outage or internet provider outage the switch get stock and it doesn t connect back to the wifi router i have to mention that if you want to buy this switch for your wall ac system first you need to test your wall ac system to make sure it s will turn back on if you disconnect power from it unless this switch would be usless for that matter

Header: so far so good wemo smart plug wall outlet switch
Review: this review is for the wemo switch smart plug not for any of the other wemo product also lumped together in review here based on the blanket of poor rating i avoided this unit at first in my search for a smart plug and instead went with the xenon brand and while i loved that one and it worked great it stopped working after a few day see my review if curious about what happened the seller did promise to replace it but while waiting i did a bit more looking around and discovered that this wemo is actually a belkin product though sold under their wemo branding and because i ve never had anything but pretty good experience with belkin and it wa on sale here i though i d give it a try despite the sad rating my need for a smart plug is to control space heater remotely now that it is winter my apartment a well a my office get mighty cold my option to date ha either been to arrive at home or work in a freezing environment or waste money leaving heater on when i m not around which get very expensive when i m gone at work for 12 or 14 hour and i am heating an empty apartment ideally what i need to do is be able to just turn the heat on a few hour before i get to work or a few hour before i get home and it seemed this smart plug invention wa the way to solve it since my office heat up faster than my apartment and i hate coming home to an igloo much more than arriving at a cold office i figured i d try this one at home first to replace the xenon unit that had failed after a few day of use set up wa incredibly easy connected right up to my wifi and instruction were simple to decipher i tested it a few time throughout the first day and no issue with connectivity and no issue controlling my heater at home did some remote testing a well and every time it wa perfect when the app say it wa on it wa on when it said it wa off it wa off i wa able to trigger it both on any wifi network a well a on my 4g lte service at this point then i have had the best experience no problem whatsoever i ll update if anything go wrong or stop working after all the xenon unit also earned 5 star at first until it quit on me if this wemo keep up the great performance i may not bother trying out the replacement xenon if or when i actually receive it and will very likely just buy a second one of these for my office heater although i m not sure how it work to have two smart plug on two different network controlled by the same app not sure if that s something i can even do but hopefully if not i have a second wifi device my cell phone from last year that i can use to control the work one if it come to that i ll update a i said if anything go awry but for me this one is easily five star and i m not sure what is going on with all of the awful review for this and wow there are a lot of bad experience reported here but maybe like the xenon there are quality control issue happening and i just got lucky and received a good one i don t know i think part of the issue maybe is that all of the wemo product here are lumped together in the review which is unfortunate because the 8 product listed should really each have their own review section so someone can see feedback for a specific wemo product not just all feedback put together for all 8 of the wemo item listed in any case i hope this is helpful for those looking at the smart plug wall switch it s working great for me and i easily recommend it based on my experience so far thanks for reading
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: if you look at my profile i ve written numerous positive review and rarely if ever write negative one not because i don t encounter sub standard product but i like to focus on the good this product is one exception i m am pretty tech savvy and have a diy connected home so i ve installed every smarthome product you can imagine many of them multiple time a i try and find the best thermostat light security system video camera irrigation system etc etc etc in the connected home technology landscape this is a very simple device that in the spectrum when compared to it connected device brother is not that sophisticated which mean it should just work right out of the box 99 99 of the time well let me assure you that simply is not the case with these device i actually attempted to install this older model wemo switch returned it to amazon and attempted install the newer wemo insight switch i can tell you they must be drowning trying to get this basic device to work for folk i spent 30 minute on the phone with belkin technical support woman wa amazingly polite and professional but concluded the call by telling me that either my new iphone6 wa the problem or the wemo switch which would not even take a simple firmware upgrade please don t waste your time unless belkin blow up the current hardware design firmware and app and start from scratch this is not a device you want to depend on in your connected home it will frustrate you

Header: do not purchase if you like having long secure passphrases for your wifi
Review: i bought this to hook up with our echo and i m glad that wa all it wa for took a few to get connected to it but that part wasn t too bad however a soon a i tried to connect it to our home wifi i found that it doe not support space or special character in wpa2 password seriously this is 2015 people not 2005 no networking product should not support space and or special character in password a they help make sure it s secure since it wa only going to be used with the echo and not serious home automation i figured i would hook it into a guest network on our wifi instead i created a long password with nothing but number and letter again all it will support tried to connect it it doesn t support 5 ghz wifi either or if it doe it suck so badly at picking up the network that it couldn t find it there are half a dozen wifi network close to u and every other networking device i ve ever used see them all from smartphones to tablet and everything in between except this it saw our regular home wifi network and the next door neighbor nothing else this is simply an embarrassing network home automation product and belkin should be ashamed of themselves for putting it out with such serious defect needless to say it s going back and no wifi product of theirs is ever coming into our house again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: why would i think that because they branded these device wemo that belkin could produce a product that work any better than their old router printer server and all the other kludgy stuff they have produced over the year joke is on me i am an early adopter i have nest use ifttt have my 4th iphone my 2nd ipad a mac a pc a killer asus router i m no network administrator but i know my way around home electronics my wemo device are pathetic it s the technology it must be my nest work like a charm and if the router reboots or the power go off it s right back online so doe my iphone ipad on and on and on i rebooted my router and both of my wemo device went silent i spent 2 hour following the instruction and another hour on the phone with tech support and they still wont connect back they get close but they dont connect the person on the phone said i needed to be closer to the router the person via email said i needed to add the mac addresses to my dhcp list on my router i would happily do that but since they told me to delete the app and reinstall it the app wont show the mac address until i connect this item is marketed well it ha great partnership with nest ifttt and others but bottom line it s a kludgy belkin product as wa in 2002 a is now their technology just isn t reliable i had them working for a while i had them turn on window unit when my nest got to a certain temp that s a great story but my story ha a bad ending the trash can total junk

Header: it should not take this long to connect a device like this to your wifi
Review: i ve spent half a day attempting to setup this switch after about 8 hour i successfully connected it to my wifi network i then ran the firmware update which state to take about 10 minute the device wa updating for over 2 hour i then disconnected the device reset it and attempted to connect the device to my wifi once again without any success it should not take this long to connect a device like this to your wifi the app wa able to recognize the device again and i returned to step 1 trying to connect it to my wifi i am now on the 3rd hour of this second attempt don t buy this product unless you are extremely patient and have the money to throw away or the patience to return it the chromecast ha a similar way of connecting and it doe so without any issue i don t understand why it is such a sporadically working setup process the description need to change from easy setup to frustrating and might not work setup experience it is suggested to take a day off work and grab a couple of beer also be prepared to fail in setting up this device up do not be afraid of failure failure is part of success and success doe not come easy it is better to have tried to setup a wemo switch than to never have tried to setup a wemo switch at all good luck possible buyer update i wa able to finally get it to update the firmware wa left updating overnight i seem to have replicated this about three time now disconnect the outlet for about 10 minute use the reset button a stated in the wemo reset process hold while plugging back in and until amber light blink close the wemo app connect to wemo wifi ssid relaunch wemo app and finally attempt to connect again it s finally working i will raise it from 1 start to 2 for this another update the wemo switch disconnected from my wifi and i can no longer access it from the wemo app i m am returning this item i am not sure if the newer insight switch is any better than this one but i might give it a shot however i will be researching other smarthome product a well don t buy this mode it definitely ha issue back to one star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the us are innumerable plan with one spot that seems to work for you and then branch out from there you will be amazed at how easy it is to let your various appliance adapt to your way of life
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: let me save you a lot of trouble
Review: what a total waste of time and money do not purchase wemo product if you have an apple router after my experience i d be hesitant to purchase them at all no matter what kind of router i had we have an apple wireless router and apple device if you look on troubleshooting website you ll see that wemo device do not work well with apple wireless which i now know thanks to hour of completely wasted time and increasing aggravation however since this glitch is never discussed in the product description or in any documentation produced by wemo or belkin i purchased this product in good faith and spent hours yesterday trying to get it to work including rebooting and reinstalling several time reconfiguring my wireless platform etc etc wemo troubleshooting guide are poorly organized and contain conflicting or incomplete information totally maddening i tried for live chat but there wa never a customer service representative available i finally picked up the phone and got a customer service rep fairly quickly which wa good except that she wa unable to spell my first name or last name or get my address correct after several try she wa based in the united states no language barrier just incompetence she wa nice but completely incapable of offering assistance ha she ever used a wemo device i wonder completely frustrating experience if after this experience i thought wemo had good product support i might consider switching to a belkin router my own conclusion however since belkin never actually say that this would be helpful and instead let potential customer twist in the wind however given the abysmal troubleshooting documentation and unqualified technical support i will not take the risk of screwing up my entire home network for the convenience of remote control of a few light switch and coffee pot oh and by the way be careful of the promise that the switch will help you turn on coffee remotely the first feature listed under the switch i can t say for sure because i could never get my switch to work but if your coffee maker doesn t have a switch that will set permanently to on not a button or a spring lever then the wemo switch won t work to turn on your coffee maker perhaps this should be obvious but then again perhaps wemo should engage in a little more honest marketing for it product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: overall i m satisfied the only real limitation is with the lamp
Review: i purchased three of these in a recent sale to automate the turning on off of three lamp in my living and dining room overall i m satisfied the only real limitation is with the lamp and the fact that you need to have them in a permanent on state for the switch to be used properly turning any one of the lamp off manually at the pull chain will mean that the switch is no longer able to turn the lamp on installation installation wa simple download wemo smart phone application plug in switch connect phone to wemo device configure to use your house s wifi you can also rename the device to make it easily identifiable afterwards i wa asked to update the device via the remote a couple of time which all went smoothly make sure you don t unplug your device after hitting the button to allow the update to happen you could potentially cause problem with your device rules setting up rule wa extremely straightforward i went in to the wemo application and chose which device i wanted on off and the time for them integration with amazon echo in the amazon echo smartphone application it wa able to immediately detect the three new switch i wa able to add them to a named group that allows me to turn them all on and off with a simple alexa turn the lamp on or alexa turn the lamp off integration with ifttt i wa also able to configure these switch to work with the ifttt service i created a do button on my phone that would toggle all of these switch at once as an added bonus the do button wa also available on my moto 360 smartwatch which mean i can toggle the lamp on and off from my wrist when i m leaving the house or coming home the one downside to using ifttt is that they can only toggle from on to off and vice versa and not explicitly turn off or on
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great for home with one exception
Review: this product is fantastic with one caveat when i bought this product i wa hoping that i could use it to turn on my air conditioner before i got home from work with these hot summer day i often come home to a sauna and it can take a long a 30 min to cool it down i thought that i could use the wemo switch to turn on the air conditioner in my bedroom right when i finished work so when i got home it would be cool and refreshing regrettably this product did not work with my air conditioner i tried leaving the air conditioner on turning the wemo off and then on again but instead of turning the air conditioner on again the air conditioner stayed off after many attempt and some research i found that some air conditioner have a stay on after loss of power option and that if you turned that option on the wemo switch would work unfortunately my ac didn t have that option i suggest you look to see if your ac ha that option if that is what you want to use this switch for despite this mishap i realized with some fiddling around that my air conditioner already ha a timer to turn on after a set number of hour so now i am using the wemo switch for my lamp i get home late from work sometimes and when i forget to leave a light on in the morning i come home to a pitch black house now i can switch my lamp on before it get dark allowing me to both save energy and avoid stumbling around the house at night looking for a light switch overall this is a great switch that add a little more convenience to life i am very happy with this switch and will likely buy another one in the near future

Review: do not buy find alternative i bought 3 of these a few month back with horrible result if you need something reliable do not buy these if you need something that work remotely while your away from your home network do not buy by far it is one of the most unreliable product i have ever come across please take a minute and go to the belkin support website and read the review about the constantly changing never ending connection issue with these switch primarily remote connection we run both ios and android and see the same connection issue on both belkin doe respond to the complaint verbally but that s were it start and end just lip service no actual solution reset uninstall install app move wi fi closer update hard reset go to this link blah blah blah even if you get the fix to work it s generally short lived if your accessing the switch from within your wifi network they seem to work pretty good but if you need to access these while your away from home forget it the remote reliability is literally under 50 considering we use these a part of a security setup you can see why were switching to something else another reason you might want to look elsewhere a you read the complaint and response you get the impression belkin is walking away from this product line if le than 50 work for you and you like reading device not detected have at it update finally gave up on these tried the tp link outlet and yes there are alternative alternatives that work belkin rather than handing out your sorry cheap worthless lip service why don t you make a product that work 2 year later and your product is still a worthless and unreliable a it wa from the beginning unbelievable i m really surprised there isn t a class action pertaining to this product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: started working better after resetting better product on the market than this
Review: i wa hoping to use this switch to automatically turn my light on in the morning it worked great for a week but it no longer turn on automatically with the other light assigned to the same rule obviously the rule is working because the light switch are turning on off but both of the outlet switch are doing the same thing by not responding to rule or voice command using echo if you look at the app it constantly say the outlet switch is unavailable which is connectivity issue not sure if it s actually a hardware problem or if this can be fixed via firmware hopefully the latter but the several comment i ve sent to customer service over the last few day are being ignored so it doe not appear they intend to be responsive to this situation i will update my review a thing change but i m probably sending one of the two switch i have back a it is obviously a defective product in it current state update 5 31 2016 decided to keep the switch since they did respond and were willing to help i did regain more reliable connectivity after resetting the device but i m no longer using it for my light because the wink hub and it product seem to work much better i ve been using ge link bulbs and a ge z wave switch which are far better than the wemo product admittedly i have not tried the new wemo light bulb however the wink hub can interact with so many product that it make home automation more practical wemo ha extremely basic automation functionality all that said i m giving them another star for the time being because it is working a little better than before update 8 25 2017 wemo work fine these day but the product are overpriced and i am still completely satisfied with the wink system in way wemo can t even perform my entire house now ha automated lighting with echo controlling them via voice command and my 2 wemo switch and 1 still working of 2 originally purchased outlet are the weak link in my setup if my nest protect alarm sound for any reason all my light except for the wemo s will turn on my mood light setting voice command will control everything except for the wemo s so after writing this review i realize that not only do i need to replace the switch cuz seriously out of my entire house it s only 2 more but i also have to lower my rating back down to a 2 star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa
