Header: would not recommend don t bother if your wifi ha username and password even past that it barely work very slowly
Review: yeah the title say all don t even think you might be able to try this if your wifi ha a username and password the wemo only will connect to an open network no password or a wpa2 wpa network at this point this product is useless to me because where i live ha a username password to use the wifi even at a different location where i wa able to test it at a relative s house after toiling around with the obnoxious setup and resetting restoring about 15 time this all took about a half hour it wa difficult to get the stupid thing working once it did finally start working it wa very slow with a very noticeable and prominent lag time of about 5 10 second from trying to turn it on off from the app and when it actually responded and mind you the wifi in that test location get about 130mbps download speed and 55mpbs upload speed for the non technical people this is pretty fast for a basic residential network also the app is horrible lag lag lag freeze crash restart lag some more useless only work about 30 of the time for me many people have left review on the app and tried contacting the company with no help i really wanted to love this because it would have solved several problem but it is definitely not worth the money not at all maybe 10 it s a toy that work once in awhile the company treat it like that and pay no attention to any of the problem i would certainly not recommend this product i only gave it the 2 star because it wa able to almost function a intended on a wifi network though again this isn t even my home wifi that i wa able to get it working on save your money or spend it on something else
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: poor performance with apple extreme wifi modem
Review: if you are getting this item to connect with amazon echo and your home wifi is running off apple s airport extreme router it will not work the wemo switch only work on a 2 4ghz network band while the airport extreme transmits both 5ghz a well a 2 4ghz there is no way to force a network connection at 2 4ghz even though you can force a network connection at 5ghz don t know why apple doe this but it doe what this mean is that the echo will normally be running at 5ghz on your home network band but to connect echo with the wemo running only on a 2 4ghz connection both must be on the same network 5ghz but wemo only work on a 2 4ghz network so this can t be done in order to remotely turn the wemo switch on and off using a smart phone with the wemo app you first must go to the phone s wifi setting and discover the wemo s network and then connect to it rather than your normal home network running at 5ghz once it connects you go out of the settings and open the wemo app and wait 30 sec s to a minute for it to find the wemo switch very slow once it ha found the wemo you can turn the switch on and off very simply work a advertised after that you must go back to your phone s settings and reconnect with your normal home network generally running at 5ghz long and short it is both easier and faster to walk over to the wemo and manually turn the switch on and off which sort of defeat the whole purpose having voice command through echo is not possible using the apple airport extreme until wemo support 5ghz network connection
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: setup is a pain i thought it would never work and then all of a sudden it just worked i don t get it once it wa finally set up though it s been great no issue at all and alexa can turn on my desk lamp for me aside from that it s also bulky it s very bulky i wish it wouldn t hog surge protector space the way it doe i had to buy an extension so that it would fit i can understand why these thing need to be bigger than a real plug but the engineer really need to take usability into account especially on a plug finally no apple home kit integration wtf i know a lot of people don t have apple ecosystem and they like to be super vocal about it but there a lot of u that do prefer apple to everything else it d be nice if siri could access this and it s ridiculous that a company like belkin that s regularly featured in apple store ha not integrated the apple homekit into it smart home line of product the last reason for the 3 star rating is the price this thing is pricey for the wemo branding i got it on an alexa holiday deal for 20 and i couldn t in good conscience pay a penny more than that for this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i felt that i had to write this review about the wemo switch smart plug because of all the misconception i found in the review when i wa researching the purchase i hope this help others looking for a smart plug device i think it is a great device and simple to set up please note i did not receive any incentive nor free product from anyone for this review 1 the wemo switch smart plug take up both outlet i have the decora outlet when i plugged the wemo into the top outlet i wa able to easily plug in a tp 6 outlet surge protector into the bottom outlet it also appears that any 3 prong plug would be able to fit 2 the wemo is difficult to set up it took me approximately 8 minute to set up the wemo smart plug with a rule to boot a i first downloaded the wemo app but did not open it just to have it ready note if you plan to download the app to an ipad make sure to look for iphone only apps the free wemo will not appear if you are looking for ipad only apps b i then plugged in the wemo in to the outlet and followed the instruction on the app for locating the device in settings wifi and then hooking it up to my network it then asked me to update the firmware c i understand that setting up a second switch would go even quicker and would use the same rule a the first one 3 can t turn on remote access i plugged in my lamp and it prompted me to name or take a picture of the device it had the remote access on by default but i turned it off however when i tried to turn remote access back on it would not let me i remembered in my reading of the review that in order to turn on the remote option you must be on the same network i checked my wifi settings and sure enough my iphone switched itself to my regular wifi network and my wemo wa on the wifi extended network an access point when i changed the wifi on my iphone back to the extended network so that it matched the network the wemo wa on it allowed me to turn on the remote access with no problem this actually took 2 of the 8 minute 4 i then set up a rule for turning the light on and off at a preset time what a pleasure and last but not least i wa able to easily link the wemo to my echo dot by going to settings smart home and discover device i can now tell my wemo to turn on or off by speaking to alexa i hope this review help i now plan on purchasing a few more of these for some other lamp that are using timer i would love for belkin to come out with more smart type of device like a water sensor similar to the d link dch s160 wi fi water sensor
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: device seems to work but software is either buggy or poorly documented
Review: setting up the wemo switch smart plug using the wemo app on my lg android phone wa a pain i had to change the wifi to look at the wemo device instead of my local wifi network but it kept automatically switching back to my local network even though i followed their troubleshooting instruction so i blindly stumbled along disabling my wifi and network access re enabling it trying this and that i wa about ready to send it back but suddenly it started working i have no idea why i m running manything on an old ipod touch which i m using a a motion detection camera it alert the wemo device via ifttt when motion is detected then a light that s plugged into the wemo turn on and stay on for two minute using the auto off timer under the rules menu on the wemo app it seems to be working well so far but if i have to spend an hour fumbling around with setting every time something change with my network i m sending it back
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: bought two of these grrrr thinking they would work a advertised they worked properly two out of ten time for the first week then the app on my iphone simply displayed not detected and there wa no way around cried for help and belkin just sent me a poll asking me why would i rate these junk with only one star and explained it wa because there wa no way to give them none and that wa it no further help

Header: i purchased three of these to run appliance in my winter home when i am not there but these wemo switches are useless for any u
Review: i purchased three of these wemo switches all three have exactly the same problem after several day use they lose connection with the wi fi network sometimes the connection last two week sometimes it only last for 2 or 3 day then the light on the switch turn red and everything stop working i thought it perhaps might be a problem with my wi fi router dropping the connection but a quick scan of the report here on amazon reveal that many others have reported the same problem i purchased three of these to run appliance in my winter home when i am not there but these wemo switches are useless for any unattended use i won t be buying a fourth wemo switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: was working just fine until a recent firmware update 10062 which now ended
Review: was working just fine until a recent firmware update 10062 which now ended the lovely relationship wemo wa having with amazon echo it went from working great to not even being discoverable at all it still work in the native wemo app but the whole reason i m using the switch is to have echo control it so i don t have to pull out my phone others are having this issue a well and calling wemo belkin support hasn t achieved anything from this post in the wemo help forum you can see that others are having this issue too first post from 1 8 2016 with the latest firmware update 2 00 10062 amazon echo no longer recognizes any of the 15 switch i have in my house with the exception of some problem in the very beginning when i first installed the switch they have been working flawlessly for month and through several firmware update anyone else have this problem the solution provided by wemo support is hardly a solution just passing the buck on 1 27 2016 amazon ha informed u that there is an issue on their end that something in our 10062 firmware exposed though they haven t informed u exactly what the issue wa or what condition would manifest this issue they have scheduled a patch to echo device for february 2 that they say will resolve the issue with wemo device running 10062 firmware we ve been unable to replicate whatever condition are necessary to expose this issue if we could we d try to analyze for root cause and see if there wa any change we could make to expedite a fix for affected user as it is we are simply waiting for amazon to flip the switch to resolve the problem for those of you who are experiencing it i understand just how frustrating this is i would be quite irked if this were happening in my own home a alexa integration to my switch is one of my favorite thing for those affected next week you should be able to say the same about your own home still nothing work via echo for wemo everything else that i ve got connected to echo work flawlessly this is another example of half baked firmware released too soon by belkin ironicly i wa about to buy a bunch of additional wemo light switch wi fi enabled control your lights from anywhere not compatible with amazon echo until this happened
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: work in process to get wemo going but ala all went well o
Review: wemo work with my android nexus 5x using the latest version 7 0 update i had to use airplane mode on the phone to get the wemo application to work the wemo switch wa visible to my wifi network but it would not connect until the airplane mode on my phone wa turned on i had to unplug the wemo switch and retry the wemo app several time but it finally wa able to see the switch and go through the discovery process in the application and once working i could turn off the airplane mode on my phone i suspect all android device using the later updated version of the android application will have to be done the same my amazon alexa application work now a well after allowing the alexa application to search for the wemo skill then add it to the alexa application and re discover the wemo device under smart home within the alexa application
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not easy to set up or troubleshoot often disconnect from wifi making it useless
Review: initial setup is a bit of a pain but work only if you want everything that interacts with it using 2 4 ghz even allows you to set it to go on and off based on sunset sunrise when it work when i changed my wifi router however modifying this switch wa a pain the reset button did not do what it wa suppose to do no matter how long i held it down or unplugging it and replugging it in while holding the reset button a one site suggested i had to delete the device and follow the instruction a if it wa a new device latee when trying again unplugging and holding the reset button while plugging it in and for 15 second after plugging it in did work after only owning it three month it is often disconnected from my wifi and therefore not turning on when it s programmed to do so makes it useless i thought it wa my router i contacted wemo and they told me it only work with 2 4ghz maybe it doe but when i set it up with my phone in december i wa able to set it up to connect to my router and everything worked great now it can t say if the dsn for my 5ghz router wa listed or not but i connected and everything worked even though my phone wa always connected to my 5ghz wifi dsn and it worked with my alexa enabled device echo dot fire stick fire tablet all of which are connected to my 5ghz wifi dsn there wa a wemo software upgrade a of a month or so ago my light wa no longer turning on a programmed and when i brought up the app the wemo switch wa often greyed out and then a few minute later it wa accessible the light went on a programmed for a few day and then stopped working again one night it just turned on by itself at about 1am no rule to make it do so and no accidental turning on via app or alexa turned it off and about 20 minute later it turned on again figured i need to start from scratch which i did but the light doe not turn on consistently using the rule i set up and it appears greyed out on the app and then is accessible i talked to support but all they did wa tell me it wa never going to find my 5ghz wifi dsn and told me i should change my other device to be on that network really i want the high speed to stream why would i downgrade just i can use this switch my nest doesn t have that problem everything in my house recognizes both my 2 4ghz wifi dsn and my 5ghz wifi dsn but not this device recommend you do not buy this expensive switch unless you never stream and or have slow internet service so you don t care that it ha this restriction and i have serious concern that it would still act erratically a mine is doing after le than 3 month
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: it work well enough if you set it up once never touch it and never have any power outage but changing my wifi network s name essentially bricked this thing you see there is no way to change the wifi setting after initial configuration instead belkin instructs you to do a factory reset well if you have ifttt configured or have more than one of these that could literally take hour and it simply isn t worth the time and effort just to be able to control your light remotely or with your voice with alexa i really wish i would have researched this device better before purchasing i have a tp link switch that work much smoother and changing the wifi setting on that wa just a easy a you think it would be it s almost a if belkin went out of their way to make this thing difficult
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: sometimes the smipliest action is all that s required to fix a complicated problem
Review: i received a wemo switch a a christmas gift a couple of year ago it wa easy to set up and connect to a lamp i could turn on and off remotely with my iphone i liked it so much i bought a second switch and rigged up a second light no problem then i attempted to set up a third i couldn t get my wifi to recognize the device i tried everything i could think of with no result i went online and read what worked for others who d had the same problem i even contacted belkin support and followed their instruction in the process of uninstalling and reinstalling plugging and unplugging my previously installed switch wouldn t work i wa desperate so i decided to call belkin support knowing full well i d most likely be put on hold for a long time i did have to wait a while but it wasn t a long a i thought it would be the wemo switch tech guy i spoke to michael wa incredibly patient with me i did everything he directed some of which i d already done but hoping this time would have a different result nothing worked but michael wa a determined a i finally he asked if i had turned off my modem router that wa the one thing i hadn t done i turned it off even went so far a to unplug the modem router waited a few minute and re plugged it turned it on and with michael s step by step instruction set up one of my switch voila it worked i proceeded to set up the other 3 without a problem before calling belkin i had received question in my research about my router number that i didn t understand but no where wa it suggested something so simple a unplugging the modem router and letting it set before plugging it back in i love my wemo switches and recommend the product without reservation
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: amazon echo integration makes this a must
Review: background i bought my wemo plug for a floor lamp and my christmas tree light and these thing work great i absolutely love the integration with my amazon echo a well app the app is easy to use and easy to set up there are a lot of cheaper off brand of these but i don t trust how they are set up in term of the actual product wifi security a well a the app security how the app handle your sensitive information you can trust belkin you can t trust some of those other apps and company some of which are based in china and may not have security in mind build like i touched on in the app section these thing produce their own wifi signal and if you go with an off brand i believe the access to your router and personal internet security could be easier to access that part bothered me i could totally be wrong but it s definitely a piece of mind using a trusted brand the build itself is pretty sturdy i m don t think it s meant to be used in more extreme condition but i ve been running a wemo smart plug in my uninsulated garage a well for month and it handle cold and hot weather like a champ amazon echo integration now i thought using the app to turn the light on and off would be easy but to be honest i don t even fire up the app anymore the integration with amazon echo is amazing i am able to just turn off my lamp and light with really natural voice command it s a game changer if you re on the fence don t settle for cheaper alternative the wemo line is not purely just quality but is much more secure to me the app is much easier to use and it s integration with amazon echo make this product absolutely amazing
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have two light that plug into a ceiling recepticle i wa hoping to use the wemo to turn the light on and off from the ground unfortunately the device is extremely unreliable it will stay connected only for a few hour or a few day at most before losing signal then i have to get a ladder to unplug and replug it back in i have two unit and they both work this way over the past one year i have done multiple firmware update hoping reliability would improve it ha not made a bit of difference i do also have an amazon echo and it is pretty neat to turn on and off wemo device but what is the point if you have to constantly unplug and plug them in
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: my mom bought me one of these for christmas of 2015 i believe i wa super stoked i immediately ran home downloaded the wemo app wa ready for to set it up to my dismay disappointment i discovered that the wall outlet in the room i had intended for set up needed replaced for reason unrelated to this product irrelevant to this review so i tucked the belkin smart plug into a drawer there it remained until last week nov 2017 when i decided to connect it with my new echo dot so that i could voice operate my bedroom lamp alexa enable wemo alexa turn on the light or whatever command one would use i never quite got that far now perhaps belkin had upgraded their product this particular model wa out of date which would be my guess it whatever the case may be i could not get the wemo to do anything but blink a blue amber colored light the wemo network option would pop up on my phone s wifi list for 0 05sec then vanish it would not connect to my home verizon wifi it would not connect to my echo dot none of the step in the app s set up guide nor any solution on the wemo help page were assisting me in the set up connection of the wemo device to any of the device hardware in the vicinity i should have prefaced by saying that i m not an electrical engineer but i have connected every single computer device of the electronic wireless nature that are found in my home in the past by myself with very little trouble but something wa wrong with this wemo device nothing absolutely nothing i did could get it to stop blinking blue amber just connect after about 2hrs of frustration i yanked the so called smart plug from the outlet whipped it across the room against the opposite wall my frustration had boiled over i had had enough of this piece of well i m sure you get the picture i have a strong feeling that the model i had had become obsolete un upgradeable unconnectable bottom line i think i will be switching manufacturer product on my next very near future purchase i m saying bye bye to wemo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not only useful but fun too
Review: i ve only had this outlet plug for a few day so i m not sure about durability but thus far this is an awesome addition to our home it ha it own phone application so you can turn on whatever is plugged in to it from wherever you are i attached the light in our bedroom to so i will no longer have to navigate our room in total darkness to get to the light and turn it on the first day we had them i went to work leaving my my husband at home still asleep i kept switching them off and on and he couldn t figure out what wa happening yes it not it intended use but it sure wa fun being able to turn on your light when you are out of the house come in handy if you have a pet and are running late and don t want your furry friend to be in total darkness i also own an echo and connected the outlet to that a well so i can turn on the light just by asking alexa to do it for me reminds me of the clapper device that came out decade ago but instead of being slightly goofy this really cool if these were cheaper i d have them in our kitchen living room and our other bedroom i did order this through the echo which saved me 10 but you could only order one at that price otherwise i would have ordered several hopefully a these become more popular and other manufacture start offering them the price will drop if not i will enjoy the one i have and maybe splurge at some point to get a few more the only down side that i have found so far is that the plug is huge so i could not use it in my power strip and ended up having to use the wall outlet i m sure that is probably a better place for it but i had to then plug the power strip i had connected there in to the other power strip i have in the other outlet regardless of that minor annoyance this is a very handy product that is helpful and a little fun a well
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i purchased this device for my boyfriend to use with his amazon echo first thing the setup wa easy to follow we kept having to try and connect to wifi within the app itself we kept getting a password error when we were connecting it to wifi same password wa entered at least 5 time and on the last try it took it once we finally got it connected after numerous attempt to connect it to the device we were finally able to see the device connected that wa a far a it would go after adding the device it kept saying not detected so after my boyfriend failed attempt i tried it on my wifi at my home guess what the same thing happened the only difference wa i wa able to get connected after numerous attempt and numerous hard reset the switch showed up and it would allow me to control if remoteley all of about 4 time even then i had to reset it manually about 3 time i noticed that there wa a firmware update i tried to do the firmware update and nothing happened when i tapped it after tapping it a few time it lost connection with the wemo switch this experience wa horrible i got this for my boyfriend who wanted this for month to use with his amazon echo that i got him for christmas i am sending this back to get a refund i would never trust this device to do what i wanted it to do while i wa away from home honestly it is dangerous
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: amazing device that can make life much easier
Review: i recently purchased an echo so i decided to get a few of these to go with it i use one for each bedside lamp in my bedroom and the other for a crockpot the very first thing you have to do when setting it up is download the app once you have the app it give you step by step direction which are extremely simple all three connected quickly without problem then you can name each plug set schedule turn it on off and all of it worked flawlessly i wa pretty impressed by how quickly it all work being new to smart home device i expected there to be at least a little delay but it work a quick a flipping the switch then i opened the echo app and enabled the wemo section named the device for echo and just a quickly i wa able to control it by voice they work just a good when using your echo device which is even more impressive even using the alexa function built into my 50 amazon tablet work perfectly i have a few tp link smart bulb i bought a well and although they work great most of the time sometimes there is a delay or echo won t work the first time or they just unsync all together and i have to wait a minute for everything to sync back up but that never happens with these switch my fiance also ha the app on her phone and can control it a well and she ha reported no problem she love being at work and having the crockpot start whenever she is ready for it so that it s done right when it s time for dinner i would highly recommend p s i bought my from home depot that s why it s not verified i just enjoy these so much i wanted to let everyone know p s s what s some idea people have come up to use with their switch lamps are an obvious one but interesting idea like the crockpot i ve tried thinking of other item i d enjoy having the switch for but a lot of thing are digital so even if you can remotely give it power you still have to manually turn it on your washing machine for example you can turn the power on and off all you want but someone still ha to manually adjust the setting and press start
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: make sure you get the correct app
Review: after some discussion we decided not to have any smart home device although we have 3 echo device in our house a friend gave u this switch smart plug a a gift though and i fell right to after an ugly hour trying to get it set up from my ipad i gave up and left it today i tried setting it up again and now i feel qualified to give some pointer if you re doing what i did last night the wemo app isn t available for the ipad only for iphone although you can use the iphone version on your tablet i bought the darned wemo switch app because that s the only wemo app i could see set it up using your phone unless your ipad ha a cellular connection otherwise it switch your internet over to the wemo network i think that s why i had network problem setting it up from the ipad it s really very simple i just made a few initial mistake that resulted in frustration if you re using a plug behind a piece of furniture don t move the furniture back until you have it set up with alexa she ll ask you to use the switch so she can find it i connected it to a lamp in the bedroom and now it s working fine alexa turn on the bedroom lamp and click on it go and she say okay very straightforward and satisfactory i ve set it to come on when alexa s morning alarm clock go off so we have immediate light and le opportunity to fall right back to sleep i honestly don t know if i can justify having more of these but a a gift this is very very cool
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love the wemo switch smart plug
Review: this wemo switch smart plug ha worked very well for my purpose a number of our christmas decoration at plugged into a surge protector strip that is plugged in under a table behind a couch in the past i have had to get under the table to turn these light off and on this year i got the wemo switch and connected it to my echo wow this is so much easier i just tell alexa to turn off or turn on the christmas light and it happens my husband laugh at me because i have only avoided crawling under the back table but he didn t have to do it when christmas is over i m sure that i will find another place for this switch but so far i love the convenience it wa very easy to set up in alexa i installed the app on my phone to set it up installed the skill in the alexa app linked the account and it worked
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i own 4 and use them in both of my home one house they are on the ac unit in the den and bedroom the other house they are on the bedroom heater and the bathroom heater well wrap depending on the season and which house i am going to i throw them on an hour before we get there they are great but seems they have two issue 1 i had to use two different phone because they are on two different network it would be good if the app had a internal selector for this 2 long term inactivity required a reset of the device and the device have to be very close to the wireless device for the connection to work here s the proper reset procedure for the model f7c027 switch using a iphone for control unplug hold restore button plug in while holding wait till light is amber let go of restore button wait till light is flashing blue amber first amber then amber flash then blue then blue flash then both flash select device in iphone wi fi setting turn off cellular data in iphone setting open wemo app enter device name whatever you select a a descriptive enter email address your email address click on network and enter password
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: fail buyer beware of security gaps
Review: fail no support for complex password with symbol no support for 5ghz basically to make your home smart you have to use these dumb product basically to get this to work i needed to change and de secure my network password which probably 30 device use and that s a huge issue and not something i am willing to do i had my nest setup in 10 minute you ll be lucky belkin if someone doesn t do this right and cost you million this should be a huge embarrassment to the product team at wemo honestly your telling people to automate their house and network their actual switch and given them base security option to do so wow you should be forcing strong password everything is going back
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought this to use with ifttt and alexa i already use the tp link switch but wa disappointed to learn that they don t already have a good script the wemo plug wa on sale for 19 99 so i decided to get one and only use it for my main light and use ifttt to make it turn on when i wa within 5 mile of home i received the device in good condition and immediately set it up set up wa pretty frustrating but after a couple attempt it finally synced to both my smart phone and echo dot not sure if there is a trick to do this easier but it only took about 4 attempt and i had to reset my router a couple time this is where the problem start at first i thought it wa odd that i had to reset the router but didn t think much of it after about an hour my wifi disappeared and i had to go reset it again and again and again in fact ever since installing the wemo my wifi disconnect like clockwork weird because my router is also a belkin product i disconnected the wemo and i have had no issue with wifi outage i honestly can t say for sure what s going on maybe the wemo ping the wifi router too much and there s a security feature on my router that disconnect it i m sure someone out there could solve the problem but for me this ended up being a waste of money and a pain in the rump
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: just got it could use better direction
Review: works great so far i ve only had it a couple hour but so far it doe what it say it will do only reason i give it four star is the set up instruction which is pretty much a few picture it doe actually set up pretty easy using the app on your phone name the device whatever you want it called i originally named it wemo then i plugged our small christmas tree into it and felt kind of stupid telling alexa to turn wemo on off i went back into the app and renamed the switch christmas tree to set it up with the amazon echo you have to get it on your wifi network and then tell your echo to find devices if you rename the device after your echo ha discovered it under the previous name tell alexa to find devices again it will then work with the new name and forget the old name lots of option such a hooking up with ifttt and your nest thermostat also able to set schedule currently is not compatible with wink hub
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: burned out after a few week s use
Review: i want to add my voice to what some of the other reviewer have reported my wemo switch failed after just a few week s use it wasn t overloaded but it no longer show any indication of being alive when plugged in there is a distinct odor of something that burned inside of the switch i tossed it in the trash the same thing ha not occured with competing remote switch that i own such a tp link and avantek these product continue to operate a expected it s a pity too because i just received an amazon echo and it would have been nice to use the wemo switch with alexa
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the new belkin app from the google play store now
Review: the new belkin app from the google play store now downloads with widgets using these on your android desktop make all the difference in the world a the actual app is too large the only problem is that the belkin switch are just too expensive update up to 4 switch now if you follow the instruction specifically go to your wifi setting and look for the wemo switch connect to that switch after successfully connecting the wemo app will automatically disconnect from that wifi and reconnect to your default ssid home local network don t overthink this works ever time if you wish to have alexa control go to that app in the smart home section and ask it to find the device hope this help
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: fine at first then it became a headache
Review: at first the wemo smart plug wa fine however it doe disconnect sometimes i have two of them and i got them in november i have the amazon dot and worked with alexa for a little while after a while i started noticing disconnect more often now one of th m just click when i turn on the light from alexa or from my iphone 7 or ipad pro what i know is that my iphone and ipad are up to date and that s why i put the model of phone and tablet in this review my hue product work great but the wemo switch are a headache just when i thought i had the light on in the house for there to be some light in the house for when my wife arrives there hasn t been any light from the light i had connected to the wemo outlet my experience with these wall outlet smart plug have been tiresome i ve come to the conclusion to just unplug them and toss them out what s the point in having something that s suppose to be smart and it doesn t work that s dumb on my part i ve tried to like these plug but for me they simply haven t worked out
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: minus 1 star for no window phone app have
Review: minus 1 star for no window phone app have to have android or iphone to configure to connect to home wifi network after that there are some third party window phone apps
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great concept and nice hardware but firmware and app are lagging
Review: this is a great concept the reason i bought it wa because it wa advertised a working with google home however the software and firmware for this device have problem i am sure that this will get cleaned up but right now this is not a stable device the issue i had were 1 android app is very very slow it took a long time for the app to respond to input and there is an issue with how the app interacts with android os with regard to selecting between wifi and cell connection on the latest version of android you need to put your phone into airplane mode and then turn the wifi back on the app tell you to select a setting that isn t there in the latest android build 2 i wa not able to get this to work with google home the device wa never seen by the google home app 3 the app attempted to update the firmware on the switch however this failed and turned the switch into a brick and had to be returned i want one of these thing but it s not yet there
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: flawed setup but once it s up and running thing have been great
Review: since purchasing i have consistently good connection and reliable use not sure if i am in the minority here but it ha been working perfectly for me not that i didn t have a hell of a time setting it up initially a many other reviewer have noted but once i got it up and running it ha been smooth sailing i have a lamp in my den plugged into it and then from there i have my ifttt account connected to the wemo and amazon echo i use my voice to turn the lamp on and off and the response time is incredibly quick i am very pleased with how everything work together those are the pro and they are very big pro but i would remiss if i didn t reiterate what so many others have before me setup can be a nightmare i initially used my nexus 6 initiate setup and wa met with every manner of error no response not able to find the wemo device stuck in setup mode device disappearing and reappearing in the app nightmare after 40 minute and several device reset i decided to try using my fire tablet in a last ditch effort before sending it back it set up and had everything running on the first try easy a pie i d recommend turning off everything but the wifi on your setup device when initiating setup seems to help greatly overall the setup is quirky i m being generous but once it s up i have had no problem whatsoever i will most likely buy a couple more for the bedroom before the end of the year update 5 28 17 still using my switch daily and have had a great experience overall i wanted to update this review to add that i recently switched to an iphone and upgraded to a better home router causing me to have to set everything up again a if new setup with my iphone wa alot quicker though i can t say that the update the device and app have received didn t play a part a well still thing are much better since i first reviewed this so i felt it deserved an quick amendment
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works but very buggy software on android
Review: bought this switch a it wa compatible with amazon alexa had to reprogram it when i changed my router which wa a pain i almost sent it back figuring it might be defective a i had a hard time connecting to it wifi with my android tablet but perseverance paid off where it connected long enough to get it set up the rule button is unreliable when i tried to change it it wouldn t change i had to delete the old rule and start over for it to recognize the change i wanted it started out with turning off the rule and i wasn t able to turn the rule back on for some reason no matter what i tried seems to be a very buggy interface once it is set up it seems to work fine with alexa the one thing i also tried doing is changing the name of the switch although it appears that you can edit it i wasn t able to make the new name stick another annoying thing so to turn it off and on i have to a alexa to turn on wemo rather than something more appropriate
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: needs a lot of work before you should buy it
Review: many problem during setup it could not be connected to from my verizon motorola droid turbo after i connected to it from my older tablet and connected it to my network i could see it on my phone it said there is a new firmware to install then the android app crashed while displaying updating you must guess the cringing feeling of seeing something crash during a firmware update but the device wa fine since it did not install the update after all it responds to the turn on and off command with a severe lag and sometimes it just doe not do it at all the android app frequently loses connection to it and reconnects while i wa talking to belkin support it turned on on it own maybe it wa finally responding to one of the command it did not respond to so the bottom line is that i had way too many issue even during the initial setup this feel like an engineering sample more than a final product you should buy having problem with the device and it android app it seems to be working better with amazon echo dot though the response is still slow and sometimes requires more than one try
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve ever owned the switch is unreliable and show up a not detected on a random basis i am not a novice and the cause is either a weak internal wi fi card or belkin s sever nothing wrong with my router moreover belkin support is useless and clueless l2 and l1 basically read from a script and whatever troubleshooting step you may find you are better off using google to find l3 if you can get your way through to them wa not helpful either belkin ha someone on amazon doing what i consider damage control because the complaint are numerous and they are consistent with the not detected issue i feel compelled to state my displeasure with belkin s crappy product to hit the company back instead of going through their hoop and hurdle to get decent help i recommend you file a complaint with the better business bureau or your state ag consumer affairs department that might light belkin s butt on fire for marketing a beta product don t buy this junk until belkin make it reliable is my advice to you update 5 12 2004 to assist consumer in hitting the company back for your aggravation and forcing a remedy belking is hqed in ca so it most efficient to contact these agency ca state ag consumer complaints bbb of los angeles where belkin is located belkin s address so you can fill out the form properly belkin international inc 12045 e waterfront drive playa vista ca 90094 imo the review across not just amazon but also newegg google play and apple store are consistently bad imo this product suffers from some defect in design and should actually be subject of a class action lawsuit if there is no remedy provided by the company to fix the problem update i came here to document belkin s poor customer service which is infuriating given the hold time and incompetence makes my blood boil at the indifference and poor training from another retailer i bought a switch which happens to be labeled va01 through google i discovered there is a va02 obviously a newer version the people at belkin could not tell me what is the difference and gave cursory answer basically indifferent to my concern when i asked if this meant she wa not sure she finally admitted yes as a consequence i am returning the product this is not to blame amazon but i feel people actually read the review on amazon for the time i wasted i feel that belkin should pay a steep price and that is lost sale if someone were to read this plus the other retailer the electronics last brick and mortar national standing should not be moving old inventory onto unsuspecting customer shame on them
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: of all the smart device i ve ever owned nest alexa lutron harmony smarthome lutron and the dreadfully unstable x10 wemo is the dumbest ever the app setup flat out won t work either due to the device itself or the android app or both within setup my phone wifi can see the device and i can connect to it then i go to the app then hit next then it say attempting to connect please wait and it either try to do that forever fails and say to quit the app and try again or say the wemo app wa unable to connect to my network name please try re establishing your password ok if i re enter my password which i shouldn t have to do in the first place it simply say attempting to connect again and the same nonsense happens can t understand why but there is no browser based setup of any kind no windows app no nothing i don t see any 3rd party apps that work unless you already have it set up which i can t garbage returned
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: thought this would be a great gift
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: a major waste of time would not recommend
Review: this wa actually sent to me a a gift for christmas and i must say it is a total disappointment after downloading a 30mb app that request access to just about everything on your phone for some reason i wa still unable to connect the device to my wifi turns out there is known issue with hidden ssid s ok so after exposing the ssid for my router and finally getting connected it now loses connection and refuse to re connect the app itself is also unstable wasted about an hour messing around with this thing and decided it wa more trouble than it wa worth support wa also terrible it actually sound like they know about these problem and just don t fix them i feel like belkin really messed up with the wemo i don t think i will ever buy another wemo or belkin product for the price they need to do much better i will be looking at other solution it s a shame because i wa really looking forward to getting it hooked up to my echo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the setup is a bit clumsy using the app but once setup the switch worked quite reliably using my amazon echo for a while but recently 2 3 week later it ha stopped working for no reason after much resetting it will work for a while and then stop again this is all using the amazon echo manually turning it on and off work but that s not the point of the device and sometimes the wemo app work while the echo doesn t i can sometimes fix echo problem by performing a discover devices process but this really shouldn t be necessary i feel wemo really need to up their reliability of the product it need to be rock solid for people to rely on it also the app need a lot of user interface improving you should also be able to run the app on different device e g an ipad and samsung android phone and it should be able to see the same device currently you can only see device in the app on the particular device you set it up on
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought 2 of these and they both worked great for a couple of week and then they stopped connecting to the internet i checked my wifi and everything is working just fine i hate these thing edit so every time they lost connection l had to reset them which wa once every couple of day resetting these thing is a pain because there is this button in the back that you have to hold for 5 second now what you have to do is unplug it and then plug it back in while holding the reset button until the light flash this is almost impossible because the button is behind the switch which mean l have to have my hand smashed up against the outlet while l put my finger behind the switch to hold the button and then get massive hand cramp terrible design now it will not connect at all no matter how many time l reset it l have had it with these thing and l am going to take it out back and whack it on my chopping block
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought three plug last december to use with my tree and other holiday lighting including a light in the bathroom up to that time i ve always purchased the smart bulb but this time i wanted to control other thing so i ventured out to the wemo switch some thing have changed since i purchased installed but at that time i thought the app wa clunky it s a little better now however all three plug stopped working lost the connection within 90 day give or take a week or two nothing else changed during that time i m the it expert in this house and i ve read every online community post followed the instruction listed everywhere and spent a great deal of time re setting them what a pita now two work but one of them can t be found by my ipad app wswitch would i buy them again nope too much trouble to keep connected
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: the product itself is actually pretty good once you get it set up therein lie the issue this wa painful to get going first thing first don t bother with wemo tech support they re undoubtedly one of the most useless tech support portal i ve ever had the misfortune of calling they couldn t fix the issue promised me a call back the next day from a senior engineer the call back arrived 4 day later after i fixed the issue myself the setup process wa very painful the wemo app refused to pair with the smart plug and thus join my wi fi network eventually after going through every setting on my router the only way i could get the app to pair with the device and join my wi fi network wa to change my entire network broadcast frequency to wireless b once that wa done the app paired with the device and all wa ok i wa able to change my network back to b g n afterwards and it everything worked i wa able to join the smart plug to my google home and it picked it up with no issue the painful part wa the lack of knowledge from wemo support and the lack of any documentation for the device after trawling through multiple forum with no fix in sight it wa luck on my part that i found the fix
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i got this on sale and together with my echo dot i love this thing first i had it connected to my christmas tree light i just had to say alexa turn on the tree and viola i now have it connected to my living room light and have set it through the wemo app to automatically turn on at dusk and turn off a bit after midnight of course i still get a kick out of asking alexa to turn the light on and off too i wa a bit suspect reading that some people experienced limited wi fi range with this thing i haven t had that problem my router is about 75 foot from the wemo and it ha worked flawlessly so far it wa a cinch to set up the wemo app it took a bit of playing to get alexa work with it wa my first time with a device like this but after i got it up and running it work perfectly the only thing i don t like is it size i wish it were a bit smaller
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i am at the end of my rope with this product i have spent endless hour trying to keep it working i want to say that wemo customer support ha been very helpful even to the point of exchanging the two of these that i purchased for another model but in the end my problem continue getting them to work took hour of repeating the reset process until it finally worked a few week ago i had a brief power outage in my neighborhood and after the power cam back on both switch had stopped working i have been unable to get them working again despite repeated attempt i am sure i have spent at least 4 or 5 hour cumulatively trying to get these to work reliably i am about to toss them in a drawer and try something else it is nice to be able to tell alexa to turn on light in a couple of room but hardly worth all the aggravation and frustration
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: lots of software problem with this and no instruction that help i bought 3 of these and put 2 in our vegas home and one in our tucson home only to find out that the software won t handle 2 location also you can t change the schedule once you load them well you can but they don t work now i have to manually turn them off and on each night what a pain another problem though is no instruction on how to do anything but set up once the setup fails you can t find the wireless account a it won t show up pressing the reset on the device doesn t help and doesn t appear to do anything won t buy any more of these turkey update if you reset the wemo switch to factory setting you can reload the on off setting and change the schedule however there are no instruction that come with the switch and you have to learn on your own
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the dot synced right up and working perfect next came the wemo
Review: i got this and the echo dot for christmas from the wife the dot synced right up and working perfect next came the wemo i m tech savvy and this wemo ha been a complete nightmare to get set up i ve done everything from belkins website and other tip and trick from others around the net to get this running to no avail after hour of fiddling i finally got it to blink amber blue and ready to pair i get a far a selecting my wifi network and entering my password just for it to say please try re entering your password every time i ve even uninstalled the app off my iphone a minimum of 5 time just to get to that same point here it is the monday after christmas and have messed with it a few more hour just to get nowhere so i went to lowes and picked me up the tp link equivalent and bam first try so this wemo will be sent back to amazon for refund
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: nice device work perfectly with echo
Review: i ve had this one day got it so i could control from echo without having to go through a hub so far it doe what i want i programmed a schedule in the wemo app i particularly like that i can time the on and off time to sunset and sunrise which i can t do with an ihome device and app then i linked the device to echo took about 20 second to find it now i just tell echo turn on table light and it work if i don t override the schedule it work per the schedule i have it set for on 15 minute before sunset and off at 11 pm but there are many more option for time offset from sunset 15 30 etc i have yet to find an astronomical timer that doe this reliably i have it grouped with inside light so when i get a few more switch i can go to bed and tell echo turn off inside light and they all turn off for the money it s a pretty good device i m still playing around with hub from various manufacturer and may find a better solution but for now this work perfectly with the echo without a hub
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: terrible just doe not work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: could be easier to setup but certainly a must have for any smart home
Review: i have 3 wemo switch now 1 smart plug and 2 insight plug i am really satisfied overall but i have a lot of networking and computer background and it still seems that these can be touch finicky to setup similar to setting up a google chromecast you make a network connect directly to the device and then it will connect to your wifi i have had to do this to each device a i add them even though the app should keep the network password and so on ultimately this should not stop anybody from buying these but they should be aware that depending on your network and mobile device it may take a touch of messing around to get them up and going however these are amazing product depending on how much thought you put into how you will utilize their magic you can really do some cool thing with the wemo family of product get some ifttt recipe cooking and you can have some real fun with these little gadget
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: wemo switch is a great piece of equipment
Review: the reason why i choose wemo switch instead of many other cheaper product are solely because of compatibility and realiability it work with all the device that i had such a alexa smartthings etc very easy to setup all you have to do is plug it into power source open wemo belkin app and select the wemo temp wifi setting up took about 3 minute for each wemo i have 3 of them connect to smartthing samsung and alexa amazon is pretty straight forward 1 for smartthings open smarrthings app navigate to marketplace at the bottom of the page choose smartthings labs choose belkin wemo switch labs choose connect now wait for 3 5 minute do not close the app just leave it there for 3 5 minute depend on your wifi connect all of the wemo switch previously connected to your wifi will be there to choose click and choose the desire switch 2 for alexa enable wemo skill on alexa and navigate to smart home to discover new device make sure the name for each wemo switch is not too similar to each other it will driving you nut later on if you do so lol international usage note eventhough this product is rated at 120v but i have been using it with 220v in viet nam for nearly 5 week and haven t got any problem since then there is no heating issue i m still alive so i guess everything is working but your mileage will vary use it on 220v with caution it might burn down your house i don t know and i certainly won t take any responsibility if you do so
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: out of box experience initial setup
Review: just got mine for xmas got time to setup opened box surprised there wa really nothing there other than the device until i realizes the quick setup instruction are on the back of a piece of cardboard used inside the packaging the wemo app is required to do anything with the switch app is also required to have amazon echo access it but had to figure that out myself a there were no instruction or even mention of using wemo w echo there s also no information on product registration or warranty info anywhere to be found setup wa relatively easy but i ve experienced better you have to connect to a wifi ssid presented by the wemo first then send it your home wifi setting mine worked w o ssid broadcasting using wpa2 update 2 2016 unreliable product still work but ha had to be reset to factory default reprogrammed 4 time so far also unreliable via echo often needing to repeat command 3 4 time before light turn on off even though echo responds ok meaning that it think it wa able to do what i asked
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: hmm not a pictured i bought this a a gift so it s still in the box it is indeed a wemo switch but it s a belkin wemo switch not mentioned in the description and it say belkin on it not wemo the look is also a bit different i m wondering whether the review here are for the switch pictured or for the switch i received i place my order heavily based on review so all of the review i read for this product might be useless if i received a different updated version giving it 2 star because it might work just fine but it is not a pictured and if i m purchasing a product i expect to receive the one shown
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: bulky yet very useful ha tool
Review: this plug is the perfect solution to unique or otherwise troublesome home automation issue case in point my wife ha a tiffany lamp in the bedroom that she us to read by it us chandelier bulb so rather than replace the wall outlet with a smart one in order to add it to our network this switch integrated effortlessly with both the smartthings hub and the echo if i had to change anything with it i would integrate a rotatable wall plug a the unit is very bulky and depending on your need for the outlet it may require a 2 plug outlet on it s own thankfully that wasn t the case with u a i wa able to flip the other plug over but i just wanted to advise everyone ahead of time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: ample for when needed but doe have a few minor flaw
Review: i have owned my wemo switch since i received it a a gift for christmas we have just one and there have been numerous time i ve looked around the house trying to figure out where to add another one or two of these device but can t find the perfect spot i have too much connected to my entertainment system such a a cable box surround sound system etc in my medium room that need to be powered on every time but upstairs in the living room i just have the standard led tv mounted on a wall with no sound bar or anything attached so a long a the cable box is constantly on to record dvr s this ha worked out perfectly setup wa a breeze if i recall it took some finagling because it s bigger than you would expect and i had to move around some outlet it essentially cover up two spot on a power strip so keep that in mind i haven t downloaded any third party apps because there isn t much extra functionality that i need it for just to simply turn on and off whenever i request it to i turn it on and off remotely for our new puppy so he doesn t feel so lonely throughout the day from the app i also utilize amazon echo a ton to turn the tv on in the morning when coming down the stair and i don t want to fumble around looking for the remote in the couch cushion all great feature and i have no issue there except it doesn t always respond to my voice command to flip on and i don t think that is an issue with echo it work i d say 80 of the time correctly the others it simply doe nothing i m not sure if i ve had any issue when using the phone app only because when it turn green i assume it s on what do others use it for i ve seen for coffee maker clothing iron etc but to me that seems to be overkill if i wa to put it on my keurig it still won t make my coffee because there is another button to press the tv is the perfect spot because that usually requires another device remote for it to work now i have effectively added another way to turn it on besides walking over to the device and pushing the small button on the side of the tv myself if i lost the remote but aint nobody got time for dat it s a glorified power button and the price point turn me off a bit too this should be a 19 99 product not double that for what it doe get one try it out on the most simple of device in your home and hopefully you too will see it doe at least service it purpose
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: owned this about 3 month now using it to schedule a table lamp with the solar programming recipe and turn on off with my amazon echo the app is very easy to use for programming echo operates it seamlessly with voice command i would give it 5 star but i found it not working one time so far i unplugged it from the power and back in again and it started working fine i am not sure if the device wa at fault or if the main power glitched at my home so i can t really place blame on the unit if i encounter future problem or none at all i will adjust the star accordingly this device set up fairly easy it will initially send out it s own wifi signal you use to connect to it so you can enter your home router s ssid and password once that is established you can enter all kind of scheduling recipe from the app so much easier then programming the digital timer i had before since this unit connects to your wifi it keep it time updated via the network make sure your router is set for the correct time or auto update my initial requirement for this purchase were that the unit would store the scheduling recipe and operate on it s own without app interaction and through power failure etc it ha done all of that just fine occasionally on a cloudy day i like to turn the lamp on earlier then the scheduled program so i use our echo device to do that longevity will be the next test for me to really decide
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i received 2 of these a present i have to say that these are the worse electronics that i ve used in age if i could give zero star i would firstly you have to download their app which is really big and asks for access to all kind of personal info on your phone for really no reason other than what i d call to spy secondly after downloading the app you are likely not going to get the thing to work the app is a pain to get going too we tried diligently to get it to work on one the instruction are nonexistent and the online direction are not great nonetheless we did get one to work but only for one day trying to get 2 to work wa hopeless don t waste your money these thing are complete junk
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i like most everything but the size
Review: very fast and easy to set up the device no problem connecting to my network or to my samsung galaxy edge 7 however setting up the connection to my echo wa another story that wa a challenge possibly because i have 2 echos i don t know but the echo couldn t seem to locate the device so maybe the wrong echo wa trying find it and it wa out of range i m just guessing anyway now that it is setup and running i really love being able to turn the lamp across the room on and off with voice command and being able to do it while i am away from home is a great security feature the only thing i really don t like is the size it is way too big next time i will get a mini
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i will use my good ol light switch
Review: i should have paid attention to the other negative comment it worked for a few day with my echo and dot then it stopped i spent several hour over the course of the day to no avail i deleted the application and re loaded it at least 10 time i did a factory re set on the switch at least 20 time i tried it in different place in my home my wifi is very strong i re booted my router several time i re booted my phone several time even thought i have other working device on my network echo cannot find the device i finally called tech support and after they gathered all the marketing info they needed they listened to my problem the young lady wa appropriately courteous then put me on hold for a few minute when she came back she informed me that someone would call me within 8 hour no thanks it is not worth the time i have already invested i will use my good ol light switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use the wemo switch for only a couple thing i have one echo two dot and a tap and utilize my amazon product to control my light and heat now phillips hue is great for light due to being able to dim and change color but there are somethings that i want to control from my echo and thats where the wemo come in i utilize it to control my blower for my wood burning fire place insert i also put one in my daughter room to control her lamp due to me not wanting to keep the electricity going to it all all time great connection never had connection issue easy to set up all and all a great device for making a regular item a smart item
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: very easy to use work like a charm and is kinda fun
Review: we bought two of these and they re great we use them with our alexa for family and bedroom light i wa impressed by how easy it wa to setup took about 3 minute with the app on my iphone to get it on my wireless network with very simple question the alexa app then found it in second just a note pick a name for the switch that make sense to tell alexa i name mine family room lights and then connected all of my light to the plug with an extension cord now i just say alexa turn on family room light and they go on before we would go to each one lean over furniture etc and turn them all off this wa a pain when you fell asleep watching tv they also have a nice app that let you program time including vacation great job wemo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: to begin i purchased a couple of these wemo switch not from amazon but from dell so my review is solely on the device out of the box the packaging is very simple all that wa in it wa the switch and a card with instruction after plugging in the unit connecting my phone samsung s5 to the wemo s wifi signal i wa able to configure it using the wemo app i set it up on my home s wifi network same network that my phone us when i am at home and it wa connected i wa now able to turn the switch on and off from my phone i then had a notice to update the firmware which i did once that wa done i experienced some issue accessing the switch my phone app would be unable to locate the switch so i ended up resetting the unit and redoing the entire process again it ha been a little over a week now and it ha been working a i would have hoped i can turn the switch on off at home on another wifi network or on cellular service my only complaint about it so far is the size it basically cover up both outlet the loud clicking sound it make when you turn it on off and the issue i had initially with setting it up for simple home automation i d recommend this unit i am actually going to set up another one of these switch soon along with a couple of the light switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: should have switch d long ago
Review: i bought this product at a home depot after trying various programmable outlet timer i consider myself a pretty tech savvy guy but the digital lcd display one are needlessly convoluted and complicated some even lock time zone to specific region the wemo is pretty straight forward plug in click the power button connect through your phone s wireless set up and open the app you can have multiple switch unit connected at once with varying timer it is very streamlined and very easy to use my only minor complaint wa that they didn t add in another outlet but that can just a easily be fixed i don t know the range too well but i have one in a basement and one in the upstairs living quarter and the wifi range is always on point
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great device with a couple of downside i like it
Review: i like the device end it wok really well in my home integration a it stand today i use it with amazon echo ifttt and so far worked flawlessly sadly it will not work with apples homekit that is the only reason i never gave it a 5 out if 5 there is an article on the belkin wemo support site regarding why check it out sadly although i understand the logic and reason it is still a unhappy situation and one that i am disappointed in also i find the device a little bulky so when put in a wall outlet that ha 2 socket on it it take over the socket a bit and i occasionally find it difficult of find other plug that will still fit the 2nd socket plus a my socket are vertically aligned i cannot put two wemo switches on the same outlet because the they are taller than will fit maybe a double memo switch unit would be smart too make up for the issue but i cant get anything like that but it work great for me in my home and my automation need at this stage so i am very happy with it will i buy more maybe or i might look for alternative that work with homekit and will fit the socket better right now not sure about that will i get rid of my wemo switch nope they work great for me right now
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it s great when it work
Review: it s great when it work which is about 85 of the time comes in handy for hard to get to plug and for setting up security light timer it doe however take up a bit room at the outlet and it ll go totally brain dead once in a while but a quick reset fix the problem i have a few of the new little guy that only eat up one plug on the outlet a well and they are awesome no issue with them connecting and are quicker to respond to command both work with alexa and that s just nut i ve got little one running around giggling while thing are turning on and off all day because the nice lady in the little hockey puck doe whatever they ask guess they feel empowered by it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: ok wish there wa better programming rule
Review: this is a review of the standard ac outlet switch there are two way to program the control of this switch the wemo app for one phone pad ha some very basic rule that can be set to turn the switch on off then you can associate the wemo switch with an ifttt application and web page i found it easier to use the web page to write simple recipe to control the wemo switch there are probably some very interesting possibility with ifttt recipe if you are using the wemo switch to control light for example if you get close to home when driving the light coupled to the switch could be turned on unfortunately i wanted more complex control and the ifttt trigger are too simple for example i wanted to turn a recirculating pump for a water heater turned on and off every 15 minute between 7am and 10pm thereafter i wanted the pump completely shut off while there is a trigger to set every 15 minute it is active 24 hour per day that is there is no nesting of ifttt trigger anyway this is an interesting introduction to ifttt and it web server note that if you lose the internet connection to the wemo switch the ifttt server and the ifttt recipe will be unable to control it the built in rule of the wemo app are too basic and would require about 30 on rule and 30 off rule to accomplish what i want i am hoping the ifttt folk can improve the day time trigger to add some additional condition so that i can avoid the 60 rule of the wemo app i have been using this for a day so i am not sure of the reliability i have used the wemo app most locally and tested with a cell connection the icon on the button glow blue when the switch is turned on to provide power to whatever is plugged into it the wemo app ha a corresponding green ring around the power button when it is turned on when turned off the icon on the button is dark in the wemo app the green ring around the power button is dark thus you do get some feedback when the switch is on and off the speed with which a cell connection can control the switch is impressive we just need to beef up the program control some one more thing the wemo app is in the iphone store only an ipad version would be nice update after 3 day i went through three firmware update over three day with my older style of ac outlet switch before writing many rule plug in your wemo and wait a few day for all the firmware upgrade the last firmware update rendered my wemo app rule unusable the ifttt recipe continued to work i wa told the remote access being enabled to use ifttt during firmware update caused the problem be sure to turn off remote access when doing firmware update to keep your rule intact
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: worst product ever unintuitive and unreliable
Review: wemo switch is perhaps the worst product i have ever used in my life i say this because i am usually very patient with technology and can be quite persistent when connecting thing to other thing but wemo switch wa able to exhaust me out to receive such a bad rating i wonder how this ha over 6k review anyways so the reason why this smart plug suck is because of the following reason 1 extremely convoluted setup process requiring you to first connect to wemo wifi then head over to wemo app to connect to your home wifi it sound simple but it s not intuitive whoever design this need to review this process and compare to other similar product and why they are so much more intuitive 2 when trying to install the switch first time and on subsequent restore attempt my iphone android another iphone could not connect to the wemo wifi it show up in the list of network but always fails to connect i must have done the restore process at least 75 time over 4 different occasion same result this is what frustrated me the most 3 i have to say that the switch did work when i wa able to complete the setup only to keep dropping the internet every few day requiring me to go through the grueling and useless process of restore see 2 above so today after once again spending an hour trying to restore and failing to complete the setup i decided to give up on this product i cannot recommend this product to anyone if you want to maintain your sanity please look at alternative a i am about to do
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: for those who can t get it to work it s not the switch it your isp
Review: that s right your internet service provider change your ip address every so often thus rendering your switch useless until you reboot your router i to thought it wa the switch but after a couple of time of troubleshooting for 2 hour constantly i wa able to track down the info online if you know how you can set up your switch on a static ip that will help keep it from faulting out otherwise just reset your router when your switch fails and thank your isp for changing again
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa
