Header: great little device work well with app on your phone
Review: great little device work well with app on your phone helps manage light and what ever you may want to manage
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: completely unusable on android do not buy updated
Review: i ve updated this review in which i originally complained about the gaping security hole in belkin s wemo product they ve since closed those hole which is great and it would be even better if i could actually update the firmware on the device unfortunately that s not possible because the android app is one of the worst piece of software i ve laid hand on in year if and when it can manage to connect a switch to my wifi network just a few foot from the access point it then can t find it when it scan the network and yet somehow it can tell me what the firmware version on the device is but is there any way to upgrade it from that screen no the ui is sluggish and constantly freeze at detecting device which it is unable to do belkin failed to publish detail an api to allow other apps to control the device and their own software a usual is complete garbage it s a wonder how these people stay in business i got the two wemo switch device despite a longstanding no belkin policy because they were at a fire sale price and i needed one for a really inconveniently placed air conditioner now despite the dirt cheap price i m stuck with useless junk due to belkin s incompetence i ll know better next time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: decent smart plug setup is easy a big drawback to me is that it stay off after a power outage there is no setting that will allow you to change this default behavior this mean you have to check the app periodically to see if the plug is on if it is not you can manually send the on command i cannot find anyway to change the default from off to on or previous state some other brand of smart plug allow you to set the plug to return to the state it wa in when the power went off i did find that i can use ifttt to automatically send me an e mail if it sens the plug is off
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: got this unit on friday and tp link on sunday had issue from the start getting this set up using android app lost track of how many time i had to reset unit and start over easily spent an hour to get it working but once i did had no issue linking with echo tp link arrived on sunday and had it up in running in minute only took one try i like the wemo app just slightly better but not enough to pay 8 10 dollar more per unit
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: frustrating may require a lot of maintenance
Review: i have 2 of these device the first installed quickly following the direction the 2nd purchased at a later date had issue connecting to wifi after trying a few time and going online found a solution which wa to delete app and then reinstall after reinstalling app the installation worked a it should if that wa it i would have rated higher but then i had a power outage after the power outage both unit would not automatically reconnect to wifi just a blinking amber light again after going online to research the fix wa to do a full reset and reinstall both device looks like it s a common problem if you re prone to power outage i would stay away belkin blame the router but i ve had the issue by simply unplugging the device and moving it to another outlet purchased to use remotely but the power outage problem make it unreliable
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i use wemo device throughout my house 9 plug 2 switch and two camera i have the downstairs light programmed to go on and off at the time i set for them we leave the program on when we are away even on vacation i control all of this from my iphone which also connects to my iwatch which i sometimes use for the fun of it i can check in on my house by looking in on my camera i can program the camera to email me a picture if they detect motion good for checking to see if someone is at the front door we have an electric fireplace in our upstairs bedroom it s great in winter to be able to turn it on a half hour before we turn in i will say i had some problem getting connected initially the stronger your signal from your wi fi router the better belkin need to come out with a rechargeable battery version of the camera which will make it more flexible for installation all in all the product work great i ve been using them for two year or more and they still work just fine its reasonably priced you can just start with a few plug and then add a you want strongly recommend
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: do not buy belkin i bought 2 of the wemo switch smart plugs both in the garbage now and both no longer work after a little over 4 month for one of them and the 2nd one croaked today after just over 6 month now they no longer make this model i guess they knew it wa a lemon can anyone recommend a reliable brand other than belkin wemo switch smart plug wi fi works with amazon alexa
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have 3 of these and they were my first alexa smarthome device at first i thought they were awesome but after extensive use and using comparable unit these are really not that good first off they are slow reaponse rate is so slow compared to generic unit yes generic unit are better second is the app wemo is poor compared to tuya third if you have brownout you have to physically unplug the unit wait a few second then plug it in after being so wonderful i would rather get generic unit that use tuya and cost half the amount they work but thats it to much manual need to rate it any higher
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought one of these 3 month ago from another store that offered a rebate setup is pretty easy setting up on off rule is pretty easy too seems flexible enough for my usage being able to override the timed behavior from within my home is really useful i bought this more because i wanted a remote control switch and le because i wanted a timed switch and this worked pretty well for a while as a minor nit the app ha one button push on push off and there s a delay from when you hit the button to when it update status it would be much easier to use if there wa an on button and a separate off button then i could just hit the button and not have to monitor to see if it actually did what i requested it s been a couple of month now recently when i bring up the wemo app it claim it can t detect the wemo switch and if it can t detect the presence of the wemo switch i can t override the behavior i think it still work reliably a a timed switch but quite unreliably a a remote control switch oh another minor nit the ability to remotely control the wemo switch when my phone is not connected to my wifi ha always been unreliable there s a config choice of whether to allow access when phone is remote and it s set to allow it yet it s unreliable
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i have five wemo device total three light switch and two smart plug my favorite wemo smart plug is the one that i have plugged into a power strip the power switch hold the projector plug and two relay switch for a 12 v trigger on both one relay switch trigger a linear actuator that drop the projector from the ceiling and the other trigger a motorized projector screen that is recessed above my ceiling since my projector ha a feature called direct power when the power switch go on my projector automatically turn on therefore my one wemo plug control three device i named the wemo smart plug projector that way when i tell my amazon echo to turn on the projector the projector drop from the ceiling the projector screen drop from the ceiling and my projector turn on all at once i also used the ifttt app so that when the projector go on all of my light go off needless to say i am very very very happy with my smart plug and have had no problem
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: bought two one installed easily the other device is a complete failure have tried every reset uninstall install fix suggestion on the belkin site and beyond the darn thing will not stay connected via wifi wifi coverage is excellent in the selected location and is approximately 25 foot away from the wemo that work fine received correspondence from belkin about this issue endless effort required from me to remedy this horrible item bottom line one wemo work one doesn t success failure rate 50 only you can judge if this is a fair waste of money

Header: looks like it want a pefect outlet
Review: not sure how to be fair it seems to work although the app is not a user friendly a far a menu option etc i could not get the darn thing to be seen on the network in the app my secure wifi network the wemo network always said out of range the issue i found out when i finally got it to show on the network 100 of the time wa if i put it in a pefectly working 3 pronged outlet it wa on a power strip by apc i put it in a two pronged outlet with the wide blade for grounding by using a two to three pronged adapter this i thought wa acceptable since it did not match the 3 pronged wemo w o intervention so be it yet it did not work in other 3 pronged outlet they must be too old or unsure because it wa tried on the power strip and voila it work now i am not sure why the others are not ok since they have been working fine on appliance with three plug had not yet tried to put a tester or strip or ups that ha a circuit tester to see if the older outlet are not perfect seems odd though

Review: i have several of these including the motion sensor unit a well i purchased back in 2012 xmas time even sent my sister one for xmas however she stop using gave up it became more of an annoyance for her since it only worked half the time which i can understand i ve experienced the very same growing pain a described through out most of the review i ve been avoiding latest update excessive update because it s never an easy process and always requires resetting device it s not a 123 setup ios app not so great sometimes you select a device to turn on off and it will spin it wheel and turn on off or not at all at least 5 time since owning all 3 device i ve had to reset add delete scheduled rule time i had previously setup it s hard to like the product since it work 50 of the time and requires a lot of patience even at this price which is good i m going to pas i m stuck with the others and just don t have the energy or patience s to setup a fourth good luck

Review: it work great until it dy support is non existent from belkin received a a gift in august died in december it refuse to connect to my wifi to reconfigure when i connect to it s network having had to enter an email address every freaking time to receive their spam it then report a problem yet want me to enter my wifi password so it can tell me it can t connect moved it around to different spot reset it repeatedlly sent email to belkin support from the app etc next stop is trashcan and look for a product from a better manufacturer
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve wemo d my house and i don t regret it my spouse like the house cold while i like it warm at night we have the ceiling fan going and i tuck myself under the cover when i wake up i like to lay in bed for a little while but the problem is the fan is going full blast and my eye dry out now i have to get out of bed to turn the fan off which ruin my easy going wake up schedule thats when i found that wemo ha the capability to turn device on off using a smart phone i could turn off the fan when i wake up using my phone i installed it to the light switch and discovered there is a scheduling feature which made it even more convenient i have the fan automatically turn on before we go to bed and turn off at the time my spouse wake up this wa the start of my wemo addiction note the product i used for the ceiling fan wa wemo light switch not wemo smart plug since then i ve been looking for excuse to justifying wemos for my house added another wemo to the bedroom fan to control the light because might a well have the capability to contron both light and fan had a baby last year and on many occasion dealt with the extremely fussy infant that would finally fell asleep in my arm the room would get a little warm and need the fan turned on and light off but standing up to turn on the switch mean waking the baby installed two wemo light switches to solve that wemo team there a great commercial idea for you guy my spouse well maybe it wa me would leave the ceiling fan on in an unoccupied room over night i set up a rule to turn the fan off automatically at 1 00am to save electricity installed another wemo light switch in another room where the window face the street went on vacation and enabled the away mode to make it appear someone wa in the house now for the smart plug i ve turned the christmas tree on at sunset and off at 10 30 my spouse ha these electric scented wax melt that turn on and off according to a wemo programmed schedule i would say to take precaution and evaluate any risk associated with having wemo apply power to a potientally unattended device that purposefully generates heat i ve successfully connected my amazon echo dot to the wemos alexa turn off the living room light and they turn off i wa thinking about buying some wemos a gift for some elder family member who have mobility issue i also have the wemo insight smart plug and specifically bought it because it can monitor energy consumption i thought it would be a solution to monitor when my washing machine ha stopped using electricity it would remind me to move my clothes over to the dryer but wemos currenly do not have that functionality plus i dont know if it make sense to add that functionality in my case i would not use it to turn on off the power it would be on 24 7 but just to monitor power consumption and report when it stopped in total i have 5 wemo light switches 3 wemo smart plugs 1 wemo insight smart plug
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buy a bottle of scotch instead you ll get more enjoyment
Review: seriously how difficult is it to make a wifi enabled device in this day and age what a tremendous piece of trash keeps losing wifi connectivity more than 10 from my ipad try to restart and you have to unplug it and start from the top including dumping and reloading the software fifth attempt wa my last purchased on ebay from a seller that doesn t offer return should have got from amazon lesson learned
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: pretty awesome it work a intended and is pretty easy to set up with the amazon echo pros it work a intended functions natively with amazon echo has a manual on off button allows me to yell at alexa to turn on the nightlight in stead of my girlfriend cons it s kinda big and unwieldy not huge but it s really only suited for the top slot of a wall outlet tried to fit it on a power strip and it would have blocked off 3 slot the connection with the phone wa a tad awkward required me to change some phone setting switch over to it separate wifi then put in my main wifi password other smart device that i own didn t require that not a huge deal and it s doable in under 5 minute but still a bit annoying i can see how a non techy might have a bit of trouble with it overall still a really good product my girlfriend approves
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this is my first home automation type device that i ve purchased setting it up wa simple just plug it in install the app and follow the direction after getting it setup with the application i also wanted to integrate it with my google home and ifttt you have to use the wemo app to link it to your ifttt account once that s done you can easily set it up with custom recipe i m just using a basic recipe that allows me to turn the specific light on or off with my voice via the google home i will buy a few more of these and attach them to more light and other device in the coming week
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: don t waste your money on these
Review: i ve had two wemo smart switches completely fail on me in le than 12 month i followed all the troubleshooting step recommended online by belkin and no joy they are dead a a door nail i called belkin customer service to get the first failed one replaced their technical support is anything but technical it wa clear the woman wa reading from a script and knew nothing about the product she kept me on the phone for nearly an hour asking me the same question over and over putting me on hold multiple time all the while making me more and more angry i m thoroughly convinced that belkin s support line is designed to frustrate you to the point that you just give up and hang up so that they don t have to send you a replacement item anyway now my second smart switch ha failed and there s no way in hell that i ll deal with their customer support again im going to tell the folk at the apple store where i purchased all 5 that i own to stop selling these product because they are utter crap
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: horrible in every way possible
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: waste of money much better system available
Review: i bought one in wall switch and 2 plug in switch the first disappointment wa that none of them allow dimming full on or full off only i have been using x10 switch for over 10 year and they dimmed on almost every product the in wall unit had to be reset by turning off all the power to that section of the house to get it to reset about 3 time in 3 month then it failed to restart at all the plug in switch also need restarting much more often than they should but did so ok until today they lose their timer setting if power go out and that happened a few day ago one restarted with button push today the other one is dead it is found on network and wemo control app but doe not respond nor will it provide power when on off button pushed manually it just doe not work i am out over 100 warranty period passed i am no neophyte when it come to home automation over 20 switch plug in my home more at christmas x10 ha fallen behind time and ha grown undependable wemo won t do the new wink system is proving to be dependable dimmable wall switch and plug in easy remote control much more bang for the buck than wemo i now have a dozen wink ge leviton switch and individually controlled light bulb not perfect but light year ahead of wemo the ge wink capable bulb are a super value
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: works great love this little wifi outlet works great with alexa and very easy to manage the only recommendation i d give is why not include a couple usb port on these outlet if they are smart outlet then they should get with the time and include usb outlet like how many of the dumb outlet are including nowadays
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: go ahead and roll the dice if you dare
Review: will not connect to my new netgear router it see the ssid but won t accept password tried multiple reset a others have suggested spent several hour trying to figure this out i have now completely lost interest glad i didn t spend more than 20 fyi if i have to call or email support to get this to work you have already failed moving on edit for what it s worth i finally got this thing to work by using my old galaxy s3 phone to do the configuration no matter what i did i could not get it to work with my galaxy s7 i followed all the instruction to a tee belkin really need to step up their game on supporting current technology in light of this discovery i am changing my rating from one star to three i now have it working with my echo had this worked first time out of the box it would be an easy five star rating
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: it work but installation is a bit confusing
Review: it took a bit to sync to the wifi but once it did it wa fine directions say to plug device in with lamp or whatever you are using first then sync however i think it will be better to sync it then plug in your item there wa also an update the same time i started using it ugh also the app wa a bit confusing at first to use but once you get it synced double tap the switch icon and rename it also on setting automatic on off leave day you want highlighted or colored i initially thought the opposite since there is no instruction and the switch didn t come on i adjust it and it ha so far worked just fine i bought two of these and now that i know how it will work i will install the second one i left it packaged incase i needed to return them to store i also plan on getting the ring and flat switch for my outdoor light
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: setting this thing up and all other wemo device are a huge pain out of the box you first have to connect a cell phone to the wemo that is never a problem then the wemo connects to the wifi that s a huge problem i have one switch plug and two wemo light switches and they all had issue connecting to the wifi keeps saying it can t connect to wifi wemo support said to me that it s my wifi yeah right everything else in the house ha wifi that work wemo support tell me that the wemo device is too far away from the wifi modem yeah right i have a wemo light switch that is le than ten foot away from the wifi modem and it still can t connect i had to do a factory reset on all my wemo s several time and then try to connect over and over eventually it like it that s my only complaint after the setup fiasco the product work wonderful still i plan to purchase more wemo device for the rest of my house but i already know that i will have so much stress setting these darn thing up
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works well but requires a little thinking up front
Review: firstly i am reviewing a uk 3pin 230v ac version i have had this switch about a week now and so far so good i have this a a trial to see if it is worth getting more of these switch to further automate my home initial impression when getting the unit out of the box is that it is a little large there are several of these type of device on the market now and even people building the wifi capability into the socket itself so it must be possible to bring the form factor down a bit that said it is more than possible to get 2 unit side by side in a 2 gang socket however head clearance or protrusion from the wall could be an issue with some installation behind tv unit for example setup wa quite straight forward using the wemo app on my phone i liked the way that it could port through my wifi info once i wa connected to the device directly this is make the configuration quick and easy i have not experienced any drop out at any time via a bt smart hub so that appears to be quite good a well i am running alexa echo dot in the house also and when trying to bind the 2 i did encounter a few issue firstly the wemo guide will tell you to add the wemo skill to alexa we dont have this skill in the uk skill store so that s not going to happen all the installation guide for the wemo equipment from there web site are for the us market to the extent that they even show all 2pin plug not 3pin uk plug a little playing with alexa and i found that i could search and bind to the wemo directly without the need for a specific skill this work fine however i did also find then that if you rename the device using the wemo app i had to do this a alexa did not get on with the word booth and kept looking for bluetooth you have to delete from alexa and re learn a a new device once working on with alexa i have routine running now on younomi to switch on a i return home etc all in impressed so far however a little more up to date support and guide from wemo and a reduction in form factor and this would have been a 5 star review
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works a advertised if you can get through the setup
Review: seems to work fine it function is very simple but setup wa a major pain using current ios and wemo version had to reset the wemo switch multiple time to keep it broadcasting it wifi ssid long enough to get through the ios wemo app without wemo s wifi timing out then after i had this happen i had to uninstall and re download install the wemo app to try connecting again took almost one hour for the whole thing to work properly and the wemo app never told me that the connection to my home network wa complete i had to terminate the wemo app and restart it to see that thing were working properly
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i wantedi to love this i really did
Review: i wantedi to love this i really did i do love the idea of being able to automate thing in my home the promise of being able to use a name brand product belkin to use it on pretty much any appliance light i wanted being able to control them all from one app on my phone or watch and the ability to integrate with ifttt all sounded wonderful and when it work it is i had one connected to lamp in the living room a space heater in the bedroom and a steamer that my wife hated to have to walk to the other side of the house in the morning to turn on using ifttt interface you can create recipe that do thing like turn on the garage light i also bought a wall switch for there when you approach the house or turn on the light in the living room at dusk or turn on the steamer when you wake up like i say sound great right the problem a others have said is that the firmware and tech support for these device are not up to par i have spent many hour trying to do thing like updating the firmware on the device getting my wifi to recognize the device again and dealing with the frequent interuptions in service seemingly any time there s a glitch in the wifi system and sometimes for no apparent reason the app can no longer recognize the device i ve programmed in and i m off line until i can find the time to re do the process when it doe work it s golden a i say but the headache associated with keeping it working have resulted in four device that are simply more trouble than they are of use for the last few week i haven t even bothered with them and am pretty well done with the belkin wemo experience too bad and once i m over my disappointment i ll probably research other possibility
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: never come home to a dark house again
Review: i have this switch setup on 3 device cellphone kindle and echo works well on all my device i am using the switch only on my home wifi network for around my apartment to turn on light and right before i come home work 20 foot outside my apartment however i did try the remote access feature but that s where the switch became unstable losing connection so i have no need for it and disabled it and it work my application every time with no problem and i have no need to turn on my kitchen light when i am 100 mile away it work well and looking to purchased more switch but i give it 4 star because i find the switch to expensive for what they do if they were half the price i would rate it 5 star
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: does not work a expected a bit difficult to get installed correctly
Review: i have never gotten the away mode to work with more than one device active in my system i worked with belkin on this issue and they believed it wa a software issue after eliminating the router my network andmy moble device a most likely problem all other aspect of the wemo work with a great bit of installation effort this is a complicated installation requiring attention to detail over time i am sure belkin will have this worked out and have a better product to bring to the consumer market
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: buggy performance at a premium price
Review: bought this to control some accent lighting in my loft that wa only reachable by ladder and didn t have a wired switch first tried one of those rf switchable outlet that claimed 50 range but ultimately maxed out at le than 3 foot ridiculous i know i read the mixed review on this unit but i wanted something that worked off wifi so there wouldn t be range issue i only installed this today but it took quite a bit to get it set up setup wasn t bad but at some point the switch lost connection to the router it wa attempting to install a firmware so that might have had something to do with it additionally this doe not seem to work with 5ghz n network which is annoying my phone and other device in the house are all on the 5ghz band where my wemo and similarly my quirky aros ac are limited to the 2 4ghz band luckily belkin ha remote access built into these thing so it doesn t matter what network you are connected to although i wonder if that creates momentary delay anyhow after getting back into the loft and resetting the switch a few time it finally seems to be consistently connected i ll have to keep my eye on it over the next few day and report back if i have any additional problem good news is that my range issue is negated but for 50 i would have hoped it would support 5ghz band and be a bit more stable at setup
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: if the unit is close enough to the wireless router it stay connected and online no problem if there is the slightest bump in the signal it go offline and is almost impossible to bring back without resetting the unit again and again i had it upstairs from my belkin router and on the 300bm medium channel but it wa not able to stay online and i ended up having to reset it three time in 6 hour three name and reset later i gave up on the upstairs light and moved it to one on the same floor a the router and no problem since both the app and amazon echo are turning it on and off regularly with no problem a stronger antenna in the unit might solve the issue although to be fair that part of the house is lousy with my phone and computer too all in all work well if it can stay online
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: i purchased this device in conjunction with my new amazon
Review: i purchased this device in conjunction with my new amazon echo the initial setup of the wemo insight switch using the google play wemo app seemed to connect to the wemo wi fi network but got no further than that the device wa not recognized by the wemo app nor the alexis echo device telephone tech support wa prompt and diligent but unable to resolve the issue i wa attempting set up using my samsung galaxy s7 phone and then at tech support s recommendation we tried using my samsung galaxy tablet neither worked i returned the device to amazon and will choose another vendor
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: love it but app ha some bug
Review: works great i have 3 of these 2 were simple to connect the 3rd wa defective and belkin is replacing it linked to my amazon echo these are perfect easy to turn light on and off without having to walk to the switch yeah lazy buy much easier definitely recommend the switch update received the replacement and still had issue connecting could at least see the switch in my app this time unlike with the previous switch but then my other switch disappeared from my app but all 3 were visible in my wife s app and amazon echo had to uninstall and reinstall wemo app twice to finally get it to work properly app need some work
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: really getting tired of this thing
Review: okay so i changed my wi fi setup and had to set the wemo up again it wa relatively bulletproof once it wa setup but the set up itself is always a nightmare first you go looking for the user guide online oh the link go to an invalid page great 30 minute of searching and i finally found a poorly written guide okay great hold the reset button while you plug it in and continue to hold it for a few second yup flashing orange great factory setting jump on that wi fi run the app give the wemo a name have it search for wi fi network doesn t find my home network which it is sitting 6 foot from okay plug in a power cable and put it on the desk 6 inch from the ap try again yup find the network now says it joining that network and nothing app doesn t find it unplug it plug it back in blue wi fi light go on and then after a short time it go out again reset to factory default again try again and again give up toss it in the trash look for an alternative
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works if you can get past setup
Review: ok so i purchased this from best buy in case it broke i could return it the same day here s there rundown it work well if you can get past the initial setup i have a nexus 6p which would never work with the app i thought it might be a marsh mellow issue but it appears to be a hardware phone issue i ran it on my oneplusone with android m and it worked so if you get the app to load and setup on another phone you can control it from another phone because it will discover it already setup this is an android issue and the app ha a 2 7 out of 5 rating so that should tell you something otherwise it work fine
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: works great with the amazon echo
Review: we used this to control our christmas tree light with the amazon echo simple set up and work great after the holiday we hooked it up to a color changing light in my daughter room and changed the name of it to party so now you can ask alexa to turn the party on and the disco light come on she love it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: when it work it great however
Review: when it work it great however if the device loses wifi connectivity the on off action will not occur they appear to be pushed from the cloud not cached on the device waking up to find the coffee machine ha not warmed up wa not a highlight firmware update are problematic most update result in the wemo plug losing connectivity i have had to hard power off on in many case and in some reset the device and reconfigure it to get it to work again most firmware update report upgrade failed and take repeated attempt earlier firmware really really struggled to connect to a wireless network the newer one seem to be better however this can take repeated attempt lasting minute once bound it seems to stick for at least a period of time the connection periodically seem to go stale and i have to either power off all the wemo switch or force kick them off the access point firmware update will turn off power during a set program and not restore it the on off behaviour is essentially not state managed at all but rather relies on single one off timed trigger a state managed option to say i want this to be on between these time make a lot more sense than hey let try once and only once to turn this thing on at x o clock app interface is pretty clumsy
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: in general i cannot recommend a it too unreliable for everyday use
Review: does not hold solid connection with wifi despite being only 10 foot away from the access point setup wa time consuming device lost connection after update required complete factory reset of the device deleting and reloading the app and complete reconfiguration when it is operational there is a delay between clicking the button on the app or asking alexa to turn light off to when light actually go off in general i cannot recommend a it too unreliable for everyday use
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i bought two of these thinking that if i liked how they work i d buy several more i planned to use them at my work and at home they were pretty easy to set up and worked great at home i took one to work and did a reset to let me reprogram it for my company s wifi quickly and easily added it but then discovered the switch that wa at home no longer showed up on my app a little research online get me to belkin s faq and there it is no you can not use the device on multiple wifi network if you have multiple device on multiple network you have to have a separate device hosting the app for each network this isn t a major issue but doe seem like room for improvement or upgrade update 05 19 2014 have bought more wemo device light switch receptacle the android app is disappointing doesn t see all my device rule do not show up more often than not
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: simple set up plugged into outlet connected through
Review: simple set up plugged into outlet connected through app firmware updated without issue after the update edited device name added rule for on off timing and saved unplugged unit from wall and moved to it s intended location in the garage waited for it to re connect to network plugged in my christmas inflatable work perfectly after christmas i will use it for something else was able to link it with my amazon tap alexa with no issue the network i am using is uverse modem wifi in a 2000 sqft home
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i ve been debating and considering smart home device for some time with most of my energy directed to samsung smartthings looks cool but it also appears to be non trivial investment the wemo smart plug wa a impulse purchase and i m delighted it work well i used an ipad not an iphone to set it up easy and then asked my amazon alexa to discover appliance and just like that i have voice control over my living room light feels seriously cool and it wa so easy
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: does not fully work with hidden ssid making it useless after power cycle
Review: two issue the setup program will not allow to enter a hidden ssid i have to log into my router and unhide it in order for the wemo outlet to see it it will work okay but if i rehide my network the wemo switch won t see the network anymore after a power cycle it s hard to understand why belkin designed it this way none of my other wifi device act this way they all can handle being unplugged and see the hidden network right away after electricity is restored unfortunately this product doesn t seem to be designed properly so i give it my lowest rating
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: love it we have them all over the house paired with our tap and echo device it s so nice to be able to ask alexa to turn on the light in a dark room or to have her turn it off by request and the timer option are great because instead of having to schedule on and off time with those old school timer you can quickly and easily set up either specific time or have the wemo go on and off randomly during any period of time you want on your phone definitely worth it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: can t quite put a finger on the issue or describe
Review: can t quite put a finger on the issue or describe my feeling that this product just need a bit more maturity especially when controlled with an echo dot i d also really be interested in version with small built in ups one version could just have a small battery to keep itself powered long enough to tell alexa that it ha lost power another version could have enough ups to run reasonable device for a few minute so that alexa could perform a graceful shut down
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: we love these switch we currently have one of these wemo plug unit a well a a tplink one and a few of the light switch wemo one i havent noticed a huge difference between the different brand and will just continue to buy whichever is cheaper at the time i need them they work very well with alexa and do a great job helping to make our home a lot smarter we especially like the away feature where it will turn on and off randomly to mimic u being home i would recommend them to anyone
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: wemo saved my life more than once
Review: okay so i m sort of new to the automation stuff i don t really want to invest ton of money to buy the high automation stuff especially when i can do it with wemo and alexa i m more of a diy guy so when i saw the wemo switch smart plug i had to try one well now i have 3 of them one for my tree spotlight in the front yard one to control the string of light on the mantle above the fireplace it also controlled the christmas tree when it wa up and i just bought one saturday because my wife said it would be nice to have her lamp turn on automatically i just got an echo dot that we have ton of fun with alexa work well with wemo i live on a hill and have a steep driveway so i heated it i use the wemo switch to control my snow melt system what a lifesaver that ha been i don t fall and slide to the bottom of the driveway anymore i used to have to call my daughter who life a couple mile away to go and turn on the driveway so it would be clear when i got home from work now i can just do it from my wemo app on my phone i will be adding other wemo smart plugs a i think of more thing i want to do to make life easier
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: all and all a good purchase
Review: i just bought this switch in order to control an array of light that i have in my living room generally speaking this switch is working a it should and i would say even better than the wemo lights product i also bought in an effort to enlighten potential buyer i have scrambled below a list of fact regarding this product 1 the android application need to be revisited by the developer it is very very slow and extremely buggy 2 you need to have a solid router that can handle the constant i o between the device and the internet my tp link 1043nd needed daily restarts so i decided to change that a well as a rule of thumb a good 1900ac router is more than capable to handle the traffic 3 if you have an android phone you only need the device and an ifttt profile in order to be in the position to issue voice command to the device no need for anything extra like google home or even amazon echo 4 the size of the device is quite substantial thus using this in a tight spaced power strip is a no go at least without rendering useless more than one slot all and all i would buy this product again or if you feel adventurous you can have a look at wemo maker
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: wemo smart switch wa not my first choice but it should have been actually i am glad that i bought a competitive product first because it give me a point of comparison trying to set up the other brand wa a nightmare connecting to my network just did not happen when i awakened from my bad dream i immediately bought the wemo there were a few minor problem with setting up the wemo all resulted from my error when i followed the direction everything went smoothly the wemo smart switch wa purchased to work with my echo dot connecting the two device wa a snap and everything is working just a it should would i buy this product again yes i would in fact i just bought a second wemo like the first it is working quite nicely and i discovered that when you follow the instruction setup is a snap
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this wa the perfect solution this christmas to my son hiding the remote control for our christmas tree that started to infuriate me so i chose to pick up the wemo switch when amazon ha the amazing alexa deal this saved christmas easy to turn on and off using the amazon echo linked to all the other light in my house turns on on command and off on command perfect and best of all no more hidden remote for the previous solution i had for my christmas tree light
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: great product with a finicky setup
Review: this product is the answer to every difficult to program light timer you ve ever had once it is setup you can set your light or anything else you may plug into the outlet with your phone you can even set it to go from dusk to dawn and depending on your timezone it will adjust nightly to when that time is it s a fantastic option you can also simply control the switch from your phone turn on your inside light before you get in the house turn them off when you go to bed it is massively convenient and the app is easy to use on iphone the bad part is the setup it took me about 35 minute to get the product working right the process seemed like it should have taken le than five when it first setup it did not automatically download the newest firmware i had to reset the entire system and reinstall the app for that to happen when it did finally download it did it very slowly i sense le technically inclined people may have given up earlier but if you stick with it you have a great product that doe what few item on the market can especially at this price point
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this switch would not work with echo i tried downloading the skill downloading the app and following the instruction to the letter nothing echo claimed it could find no device switch claimed it couldn t connect to the network maybe i had something set wrong but since there are no instruction except a cryptic quick set up and no help offered it went back to amazon if they want people to sign on to this home control future someone need to do a better job at making a plug and go interface
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i absolutely love this device i have two of them the only technical issue i had wa due to the fact that i hide my ssid on my router and wemo couldn t it so you have to be broadcasting tour ssid in order for this device to work even if you bradcast during setup and then switch off you ssid it then stop working this won t effect most people out there as crazy a it sound i use these device with my electric blanket and i have linked them to my amazon echo so i wa able to solve a major issue in my marriage having to get up in the middle of a movie in order to turn on our electric blanket now i just say alexa turn on my our electric blanket and bingo alexa turn it on i know what your all thinking but now i m wondering what other thing i can do with this nifty little gadget

Header: i am a big fan of ha but this
Review: i am a big fan of ha but this plug is driving me nut that is an exaggeration i bought four of these from home depot the ap is intuitive enough and customer support is available but there is a huge but here everytime a plug loses power either from a relocation in house or cycling a circuit breaker i have to reinit the box to get it to communicate with the ap again it exhibit a flashing amber light when this happens cs wa of no help in telling me any workarounds for this it will retain the program it had in at least but a i said you have to spend about 15 minute rebooting the thing to get it back into the ap ecosystem again unsat
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the hardware is fantastic the app ha improved over time and it s
Review: i ve purchased a few of these in recent year the hardware is fantastic the app ha improved over time and it s pretty much all that need to be discussed regarding the product i use the android app and here are my pro and con pros connectivity with more home network configuration ha been improved tremendously i can set them up and see them all the time the app identifies overlapping or conflicting rule cons some feature like motion sensitivity a duration of motion before the wemo motion trigger ha been removed from the app several version ago these utilize the time provided by your router however there is no place in the app to see what time the device ha acquired which is kinda important for a ti on a few occasion i ve noticed my rule are triggering at incorrect time i ve gone from no way to maybe i would trust these to operate delicate item such a anything heating related their packaging is super simple and user friendly although finding info to troubleshoot specific network related issue quirk router setting is an adventure
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: absolute garbage unstable sometimes it responds sometimes not requires frequent reprogramming a brownout or dip in power will render it useless just when you think it s working it will disappoint you anger you and make you want to rip it out of the wall outlet and smash it to piece i put this piece of crap in service so my wife could switch on several slot machine in the gameroom without opening cabinet or having to deal with power strip never again this won t get a second chance it had several of those each time i give it a break it kick me in the mouth again

Review: this is really cool when it work getting it to work is just a frustrating endeavor it frequently go off line and ha to be reset to be noticed i did get it to work with amazon echo once i named the wemo switch fireside i said amazon turn on fireside and boom light on that wa cool unfortunately i haven t been able to get the two to link since my wife and child enjoy watching me fumble around with my phone the wemo app and the network when trying to simply turn on the lamp i have plugged into my wall switch over all a pretty fun gadget but at least on my network it just isn t reliable

Review: was looking forward to trying this switch just to be able to turn on and off a lamp in my living room after initial installation had some problem with connectivity but wa able to get everything ironed out and it worked with the app i wa never able to get it it to work with amazon echo i saw that there wa an update for the app and then it updated the switch and now it is just an electrical outlet that i have to manually turn off and on a lot of money for this to be so poorly designed great idea but not ready for prime time
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: follow the instruction easy set up i have this on the most used floor lamp in our great room and work beautifully it is a fair distance from wifi router but signal is good also connected it with alex app and now can control via voice through amazon echo wemo app is easy to use and super easy to set up on schedule for when away from house for extended time i also bought the belkin wemo light switch to replace outside light switch and same thing all voice controlled and super easy to set up on schedule planning on buying more of both can t go wrong with this switch
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: single plug use and easy to install
Review: just got it easy enough to install and connect it to wifi it wa also easy to connect to alexa app what i like about it it is not an oulet hog it allows for another item to be plugged in under it unlike the other plug advertised to work with alexa i also liked the price a it wa alexa voice order sale price time will tell about fuctionality note this doe not work on a touch lamp the lamp stay off until you touch it
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: don t go wemo cause wemo don t go
Review: i have used belkin product for many decade all the old product were superb i bought this switch at a big box store for a simple application what a disaster i checked out the online discussion board because you can t tell belkin your problem it seems that belkin is no9t the company it used to be the product firmware is riddled with bug the device may or may not connect after a power failure belkin posted a solution to that problem put your router on a wemo switch and if the device don t connect after a power failure cycle the power to the router that is pretty tricky because if you shut off your router remotely using the wemo you will never be able to access the swith again because your network is gone another simple minded problem easily fixed but not fixed the wemo switch doe not remember it s state after a power failure it always come up off anybody who ha even minimal technical capability know how ridiculous this is even their own product year back ip controlled receptacle restored their state after a power failure i read a lot of review before buying many people say how great the product is so i discounted the bad review big mistake the good review were probably written within day after buying and before experiencing a power failure the long term robust standard for home control is z wave it is even used by commercial security company there are many controller that support z wave including wink i highly recommend going with z wave device and forget about wemo
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: and from my android galaxy s6 i could happily turn on and off the switch and the lamp
Review: i just received and installed this wemo plug the install went smoothly and from my android galaxy s6 i could happily turn on and off the switch and the lamp connected to it success okay now let program a rule make all the setting and go to save it and i get a spinning wheel forever that s when i did a search and discovered that lot of my android brother and sistren have the exact same problem and belkin ha provided no solution luckily i have an ipod that i wa able to create and save rule with this is a glaring issue that need resolved
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: good but still have connection issue
Review: i recently purchased two of these smart plug and am thrilled they finally got on with google home and google assistant however i have constant connectivity issue with the wemo app i ve updated the software and it didn t help that i can tell i don t seem to have any issue regarding google or alexa and i know it s not my network a i don t have any issue with my lifx bulb or any other smart wifi item i own
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: bought this smart plug for a simple use of turning a light on and off from a smartphone unfortunately i couldn t get it to reliably work a it wouldn t consistently connect to my wifi network i m an electronics enthusiast and network administrator and tried everything eventually i narrowed down the problem a being with the device itself having extremely poor wifi range and performance it would only connect to my network when it wa within about 6m 20ft direct line of sight of my router and even then it wouldn t stay connected reliably outside that range or with any wall etc between it and it wouldn t connect at all after searching online it seems that many other people are experiencing poor wifi connectivity with their switch and that it seems to have been made much worse after a recent firmware update taking it back to the store for a refund asap really disappointing belkin i liked the sound of what you were offering and it s integration to other service but this is not a working reliable product
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: customer support is useless they reply to first message for application problem
Review: device work well application doe not you are not able to delete or make change to rule due to application problem i had to delete the application and reload and then reconnect the device to the network if you have to do a software update it will hang for hours and never finish you guessed it delete the application and start over customer support is useless the reply to first message for application problem then close out the issue if they fix the issue then i would rate a solid 4 star due to limited programming application and customer support a solid 1 star people other user on the forum are very helpful and friendly

Header: i wa able to switch my phone back to my regular wifi network with the complex password and the app still work fine
Review: i had a difficult time getting this to work on my wifi network because i use a complex password and wpa2 it turn out that the wemo app switch won t connect to the network if your password ha any symbol in it only letter and number are allowed it really should say that somewhere in the box rather than buried on belkin s website rather than changing my password and updating every device in the house i made a guest network through my apple time capsule with a simpler password once i switched my phone to that network and went through the wemo setup it worked without any problem once i enabled remote access through the wemo app i wa able to switch my phone back to my regular wifi network with the complex password and the app still work fine
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i operate an electrical business i use the wemo switch for a variety of application such a switching outside flood light lamp post column light even area lighting around swimming pool and outdoor spa my customer love it because of the convenience it provides and because it is a cost effective solution for adding a switch i have used wemo product in my personal residence and i am very impressed with the product works just a it say it will and the installation process is easy also i have consulted with customer service a few time and found them to be polite and helpful real people not automated recording telling you what website to go to for help i highly recommend this product the only complaint i have heard is that the device doesn t offer a dimmer function while i believe wemo doe offer a light bulb that dims the switch doe not have the function a part of it operation if this option wa added to the device capability it would be perfect
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: update it worked fine until i moved and set up a new router now i can get the app to recognize the wifi making the plug useless customer service is no help unless you speak a foreign language this wa my first smart plug to use with my alexa i love it other than the size of this plug being a bit on the large size it s easy to see when it s plugged in and working i haven t had any problem and will be getting more in the future

Header: i did love the ease at which one could connect with the
Review: i did love the ease with which one could connect with the app however i find changing the setting a bit cumbersome one ha to start over and delete a prior setting in order to change the time setting for example if i had a setting for one hour at 5 30 am and i wanted to come back and change it to 515 i d have to delete the original setting and then go back in and do a new setting there is no easy way to change once you have something set up all they need to do is change the app

Header: works great with easy set up
Review: this is exactly what i wa looking for and it work great i wanted a wifi switch i could control my light not only when i am away from home but also when i arrive the room light are located in awkward part of the room and at night in the dark it is hard to maneuver around the room having the ability to switch on the light even when i am leaving from an engagement and headed home eliminates the problem of busted knee it also integrates with the ring doorbell camera system if my ring doorbell or motion sensor go off and i am not home there is quick access to the wemo app within the ring app which allows me to activate my light with no hassle lights go one person at the door or lurking around the house think someone is home easy to set up and work like a charm
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: this worked great until we lost power for a minute last week no big deal if all i had to do wa walk over and push the button to re pair it however since i wa using this to control a pump in our attic i had to go up there to do it and my wife won t do this when i am away tp link doesn t have this problem though i do terribly miss the auto off function that is in the wemo sottware
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: look there s 101 different smart plug you can buy but by far this belkin wemo is the best why feature wise on par if not better than the rest but that s not where this plug excels it excels a no hub required with hive smart heating and arlo camera what i really really do not need is yet another hub to stick next to our router that s right this is a home so i don t want to be building a rack up for all this router hub purely to tidy thing up now not having a hub could be a bit rubbish if you couldn t connect this to service like ifttt simple app that let you set up if this then that command to get your smart product talking to one another thus my belkin wemo is used to turn on a floodlight if motion detected with one of my arlo camera works a treat and will be buying more to use for other thing like i said because you can use ifttt the possibility are endless
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Review: i received two of these a gift and love them way easier to use than the old style plug in with dial and little peg and easy to change to precise time of the day i use mine with my iphone i don t yet have amazon com s alexa but this will be in my future i found the wemo s relatively easy to program and i always know what the lighting situation is at home when i am traveling
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: to couch every where im sorry lol
Review: i have to say sorry to my couch because omg the wemo switch ha to be one of the best thing i ve seen come from belkin for quite sometime this thing is a game changer i never have to get up again to cut off the light i wish i do the same for being thirsty lol ive forgotten many time to cut off the light in the living room and have been to lazy to get up so i just pull out my phone and with a quick touch click it off and im sound asleep the wemo switch is my best friend when im on the couch though and im sure my couch want a breather sometimes but with the conveniency of pairing it with alexa this make a simple take even simpler one thing that i wish could be fixed is that when it turn on and off it make a clicking noise that take the surprise factor away from me but other than that this is man s new best friend lol i recommend everyone try one i have to thank my friend often for this amazing gift
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: the dumbest person for buying a smart product
Review: it s possible i m a total moron it would not be the first time but for a device that is self described a being being smart and so simple to install this is the worst even a moron on a good day ought to be able to install an app plug in a lamp and make a light bulb turn on not with this thing i am on my 3rd hour and still it either can t find the network or when it finally doe it tell me to turn on smart switch im using an android device or after all this then doesn t find itself on the network i mean seriously after spending 40 buck to turn on and off a light bulb and after this many hour with it not working i feel more dumb than smart for a advanced a we are with technology sometimes we are absolutely no where

Header: good idea that doesn t execute on the concept
Review: i have a fair amount of home automation and i m not afraid of technology the wemo smart plug work for a few day and then it just stop after a reset it seems to work but then it stop again a day or two later i don t have a problem with my echo or nest or iris or any other home automation product so it isn t my network or this wemo is super sensitive the most frustrating part of this switch is that one reason that i bought it wa to save electricity and i programmed the light to go off at 1 am and when it stop working you wake up in the morning and the light is still on that s the only way you know that it stopped working overall this is a good idea that just doesn t execute on the concept

Review: i don t love inanimate object but i like this a lot it wa easy peasy to set up it connected to my echo easily it work unless echo ha a burp and isn t cooperating which happens seldom the wemo app is a great help because it work a long a the phone or tablet is connected to wifi i go away and using the app turn my light on and off though 300 mile from home

Review: this is something people in the past have missed out on there s room for improvement though the first thing i want to address is the pairing with the app i m an ios user and i downloaded the app a i wa instructed to do the misery started when i opened the app the app crashed constantly and made the pairing very difficult the second problem with the pairing wa the pairing wifi network that didn t show up for a long time this wa another thing that made the pairing a problem but after this troubleshooting i finally got to enjoy the wonder of this smart plug i could eventually turn on my light with the push of a button i also purchased an amazon alexa which made the turning of part even easier now it wa voice controlled and i didn t even have to pull out my phone to turn of my light overall a great product but only when you are past the setting up part

Review: i had high hope for this little device this is the first wemo device i ve owned i have apple product and two nest thermostat so i m a little spoiled on the ease of use cons very poor range for wifi i wa in the very next room and had poor reception buggy setup it did set up correctly but only after several try and retries no remote access to be honest i wanted this the most but after looking across the internet this is a common problem pros it doe work a advertised if i m on my wifi network with almost instant off on control overall this is a good try but i don t feel a if it ready for prime time yet i hope they improve thing i really want to like it

Review: works well and i can integrate it with my google home using ifttt using ifttt i am able to set the switch to turn on when i enter a certain parameter around my house i can also set a schedule on the wemo app which is useful for appliance with hard switch an example of this is that my coffee machine ha a physical switch to toggle it on off therefore i leave the switch in the on position and have my wemo switch scheduled to turn on at a certain time every morning this allows my machine to automatically start making my morning coffee this will not work with an appliance such a a keurig a the switch is electronic press the on button on the screen the only change i would prefer is that the wemo link directly to my google home app so i can consolidate all the apps on my phone into one smart home app
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: solved my problem with no fuss
Review: i have a remote video camera in a maine cabin when the power go off the camera boot up before the router and will not connect to the network i then lose my view of the lake until my next visit when i just unplug and plug the power to the camera with the wemo switch smart plug i go on my phone open the simple wemo app and power off and power on the camera boot and i have my view i have a amcrest hd camera that work great the switch wa simple to install do not rush just follow the picture the only negative i found wa that the wemo plunged into the top outlet and did not allow me to plug anything into the lower outlet i would also look at the wemo mini thank you

Review: i have this setup in my alexa controlled smart home and so far have had no issue with it i used it during christmas to use my basic old school christmas light to smart controlled light this really helped out a the only plugin that would work is located on the wall in the middle of where my couch sits meaning we had to pull couch back and reach behind to unplug no more hassle with the wemo

Review: overpriced and underperforming i have become used to seeing attempting to connect still working please wait but not to controlling my 6 wemo switch without them dropping off the network not being contactable and being unable to correct problem without being in the same room a the wemo hard a i m often in different country at the time i also have hive hub and socket which work more reliably can be controlled by windows and android wemo is android ios only which don t lose the network and whose customer service is 100 time better than wemo s forget wemos particularly if you are in a rush or not a high level techie hive is cheaper easier and more reliable

Header: great product with room for improvement
Review: the wemo light switch is a great concept with room for improvement i like being able to control the light inside my home when i m away at night time i have five wemo device and will continue to expand i would like to see a camera for indoor and outdoor added to their already impressive lineup i am able to use their light switch inside my home however i wish i would be able to use it without the neutral wire required i have an older home and not all of my wiring ha a neutral i also would like to see a dimmer switch available with room to improve i can t give wemo a five star review however with what it is now and the potential that is ha i would absolutely recommend it to anyone wanting control over their lighting inside their home

Header: thank goodness for amazon belkin customer service stink
Review: i ordered this through my amazon echo on a special deal of the day i wa very excited to get my first echo smart plug so far it s been a joke just setting the thing up is ridiculous it would not connect to our wifi so i called belkin customer support after holding for 23 minute i spoke with a gentleman and he kept getting me to do the same action over and over change room same action change plug in the same room repeat after a hour yes really a hour i mention that this could be a defective unit he put me on hold and get approval for me to pay to have the unit sent back pay for the shipping on the new unit because yes it is a defective unit thank goodness i m a prime member because i wa hot terrible customer service they need to own up to their mistake

Header: works great can be used a a great safety device
Review: the female in my home tend to leave the house with flat iron on having this to be able to turn it off away from home is a great safety device i also use one to turn my outdoor landscape lighting on and off you can also set a schedule for the device to turn on and off i just think the device should be a little bit cheaper set up is so easy no computer needed just download the wemo app to your mobile device or tablet and put the device into an outlet the wemo app ha great instruction just connect your device s wifi to the wemo and open the wemo app if the installation fails which it did for me just restart the process it seemed to work every time on the second try the device will most likely require a firmware update after set up the wemo app will let you know the app also let you keep track of usage of the deviced that is plugged into the wemo switch i would recommend this to a friend

Header: noisy high pitched whine but easy to setup works great with alexa and iftt
Review: easy to connect works great with alexa and iftt really really really noisy pros it s very easy to setup plug it in wait until you can find it s wifi signal connect to it and open the wemo app after that setting it up with alexa is even more simple just go to the smart home menu in the alexa app and tap discover device you don t even need to enable the wemo skill cons i wa excited to get this item however right after i plugged it in a really high pitched piercing whining sound started emitting from it i continued to set it up thinking it ll go away but now that i ve completed setup and it s connected to my wifi regardless of whether the output power is on or off it continues to make the high pitched noise it can be heard across the room see video for recording of the noise sorry to your ear it doe what it s designed to do but ala i cannot recommend this
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: connectivity issue ended up going with insteon starter kit instead
Review: for starter i m an it professional i ve been working with computer and network for 18 year i have an older home but i ve been wanting to dip my toe into home automation i figured the belkin wemo switch would be a good start i purchased two of the switch at best buy for 50 each and brought them home i plugged them in downloaded the wemo app on my iphone 5 running ios 7 and switched over to the wi fi network created by the switch i proceeded to enter in my home wi fi network credential for the 2 4 ghz band and then i updated the firmware on the switch per the prompt the firmware update took a few minute and then the wemo rebooted on it own as an aside i have two airport extreme router one extending the range of the other i have my router set up for 2 4 ghz a b and g and 5 ghz n band but the wemo is not compatible with 5 ghz when belkin say it s not compatible with 5 ghz they re not kidding i ve interacted with other device cross band on my wi fi network before with no problem but somehow belkin ha engineered a product that cannot be interacted with from a smartphone that s technically within the same network but is running on the 5 ghz band so i had to forget the 5 ghz network on my iphone and join the 2 4 ghz network in order to interact with the wemo over wi fi with my iphone 5 on the 2 4 ghz band and the wemo also on the 2 4 ghz band i launched the wemo app again tapped the on button for the switch and the light attached to the switch came on neat i tapped the button again to turn the light off and the light stayed on hmmm not good i closed the app entirely on my iphone and went back in and now the power button for the switch wa grayed out on my screen i figured power cycling the wemo would fix this so i unplugged it waited a few second and then plugged it back in this time i wa able to turn the light off but when i went to turn it back on a few second later nothing happened the wemo had seemingly lost wi fi connectivity again thinking a reset of the wemo would fix this issue i reset it connected to it own wi fi network again and reconfigured it to join my 2 4 ghz wi fi network after completing the setup again i had the same result the wemo would stay connected long enough for me to interact with the switch immediately but then it dropped the connection keep in mind that all the other 2 4 ghz device in my home had full signal strength when sitting directly in front of the wemo so signal strength wa not the problem maybe i just got a bad unit but it left a bad enough taste in my mouth that i didn t even bother opening the second wemo switch i d purchased i took them both back to best buy and exchanged them for the insteon starter kit i brought that kit home and within 25 minute i had the ios app downloaded the insteon hub hooked up to my router and talking to both my 2 4 and 5 ghz network and the two included dimmer switch fully operational both inside and outside my network if you re looking to dip your toe into home automation a little bit at a time like i am do yourself a favor and read up on the insteon system for only 20 more than two of these wemo switch you get two dimmer switch and the insteon hub the dimming is optional by the way you can just use them in either off or full on mode but being able to also dim a light is a nice touch the dimming even work with the energy saving curly cue bulb the insteon system simply ha a lot more expandability for the long term than this wemo system from belkin and in my experience the insteon system is much easier to set up and is much more reliable than the wemo system
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa

Header: not reliable for security us wrong technology architecture choice i e zigbee mesh better than wifi
Review: i purchased to use a security lighting while away from home programming on off time with ifttt the intent wa to replace inexpensive lamp timer my experience is that wemo connectivity is completely unreliable because of totally random wifi connectivty to ifttt sometimes they turn on often they don t if they do turn on it is random that they turn off at the ifttt programmed time i have similar problem with nest thermostat but they are le critical since they are not timing dependent a are ifttt program i think this is due to a serious architectural flaw ie each module depends on it own separate wifi connection there are alternative wireless networking technology other than wifi which appear much more reliable for this particular application purpose ie the zigbee mesh wireless network in which each device can talk to another device a implemented with the philips hue led bulb product i have had no connectivity reliability problem with using philips hue led bulb timed by ifttt program

Review: i bought a couple of these belkin switch not on amazon the installation wa not easy a the wemo app leaf you on your own before installation and firmware upgrade is done in my case i had to repeat the installation and the firmware upgrade twice for each switch before it wa finally complete the led indicator just add to confusion a the seem to blink almost randomly the switch did not work on my guest wi fi the indicator kept blinking amber which wa supposed to mean no connection however the switch responded if my phone wa on the same guest network the switch were not detected over the phone cell connection though i had to re set the switch to move them to my non guest wi fi the response time to a turn on off request varies sometimes it is almost instantaneous sometimes it take 3 7 second especially over the cell connection the switch hum noticeable especially during the setup and when not loaded you can hear a switch in a quiet living room they turn on and off with a loud click away mode rule doe not work reliably for instance when it wa time to turn on only one switched turned on the other stayed off even though both switch were included in the away rule but the worst part is that the switch turn on and off randomly during the day without any visible reason this make the product practically unusable for me i hope this will be fixed either by the firmware the app or the backend software upgrade
Product: WeMo Switch Smart Plug, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa
