Product: D-Link Smart Plug, Energy Monitoring, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant (DSP-W215)

Review: this smart plug is not very smart every other smart product i have used ha allowed one to establish automation rule with triggering condition where a basic action on the device such a turning it on or turning it off is a valid triggering condition not so on this device so for example if you wanted to set a rule of when this smart plug is turned off also turn off my other dlink device or when this smart plug is turned on turn it off 10 minute later to conserve elecricity you cannot on top of that setup wa unreliable i had to perform every single step at least twice to get it to work and some step never succeeded my modern smartphone wa unable to successfully perform the first step scanning the qr code on the device the qr code wa not only tiny but the ink wa smeared such that my phone wa unable to interpret it manual setup without the qr code requires you to know what hardware version you have there is no hardware version label on the device so you have to look for any random letter number combination on the back of the device to see if any of those match the hardware version choice you are presented with in the setup app one step requires you to enter a pin it failed to accept the pin and i had to kill the setup app restart the smart plug unplug it and re plug it and only after all of that did it accept the pin not to mention that the pin is on the back of the device which you cannot see when the plug is plugged into the wall overall the setup experience wa frustrating at best if you do decide to purchase this device take a photo of the backside you ll need several bit of information such a the device pin during setup all of which you will be unable to see when the device is plugged into the wall
Product: D-Link Smart Plug, Energy Monitoring, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant (DSP-W215)

Header: get the dsp w110 instead it will save you time and you can get on with your life
Review: what a mistake in buying this i should have stuck with the dsp w110 version which i haven t updated firmware yet let me start by saying this booger had problem from day 1 hard to connect compared to the 110 would drop out repeatedly during the day when the 110 is 3x further from the wifi router and it stay connected then it had a mandatory update which i tried per their app instruction what a waste of time it can t figure out if it connected or not then want you to try different thing like turn off mobile i had a direct and persistent wifi connection from my android phone to it all the app offer you is to try different thing but still failed to connect it to the wifi router i want to trade this in for the 110 i m done with this piece of work how did this pas internal quality check i m guessing it doesn t before i forget when i did wifi into the 215 i started walking into the other room and the connection fell to 1 bar right barely 25 of range pity it could be much better but it isn t no i m not upgrading my other one and don t force me to either at least it reliable

Product: D-Link Smart Plug, Energy Monitoring, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant (DSP-W215)

Header: worked fine for me am i one of the lucky one
Review: i almost didn t buy this because of the review if you have ever read a list of review before you know that the star rating might go down because somebody gave it 1 star due to the fact that they didn t read the manual or didn t think to plug it in however the d link smart plug had many review saying it wa hard to set up won t detect firmware update loop registration code is invalid when it went down 5 i took it a an omen and bought it prepared to spend two hour jacking with it nah plug it up wait for green light hit wps on it and the router annnd done it did require a firmware update after it wa already set up from 1 22 to 1 23 but nothing went wrong i timed it local or remote if you hit the power button for it on the mydlink home app it will power off in under 4 second i do wish it had the capability to turn off at a certain time this device ha my wife s hair dryer plugged into it and i would like for it to power off at 9am well after she ha already left for work i m sure the iftt integration will have that recipe update yeah ifttt work great with this if for some reason my wife is still home after 9am when it shuts off she can just hit the power button on the smart plug no biggy
Product: D-Link Smart Plug, Energy Monitoring, On/Off, Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant (DSP-W215)
